長庚醫學科技

org.tc:
長庚醫療體系
長庚醫學科技

info.tc:
長庚醫療財團法人創辦於1976年，先後在台北、林口、基隆、高雄、嘉義、桃園與雲林設立了7所長庚醫院，並受政府委託經營鳳山與土城醫院，每日診治病患32,800人次以上，擁有病床數10,000床，落實「人本濟世，病人優先」是本院的經營理念。長庚具急重難症病患照護能力，長久以來持續進行醫療品質優化改善，多次榮獲SNQ國家生技醫療品質金獎的醫院，持續創新提升品質達國際醫療水準，以維護及促進病人健康是長庚非常重視及在乎的事。
本次展覽長庚醫療財團法人以「特色醫療、智慧醫院、創新研發、公益榮耀」四大主軸呈現，含括癌症診斷、精準定位與治療、照護品質、醫療創新的成果與運用等，參展主題豐富，充份展現醫療照護的軟實力，現場並提供主題互動及體驗，歡迎民眾共同參與以了解科技治療的魅力！
長庚醫療財團法人本次參展主題包括：
一、特色醫療
1. 細胞治療
2. 尖端質子治療
3. 運動醫學
4. 微創手術
二、智慧醫院
1. 物聯網
2. 遠距醫療
3. 智能照護輔助
三、創新研發
精選創新且具臨床應用性之專利成果
四、公益榮耀
醫者仁心，全方位社會關懷＊獲獎榮耀肯定

The Foundation has also been entrusted by the governmentto operate Feng-Shan Hospital and Tucheng Hospital, as well as to assist in the operation of Dali Jen-AiHospital in Taichung. org.tc: 中國醫藥大學暨醫療體系

info.tc:
中國醫藥大學附設醫院自1980年創院，現已發展為2,076床規模的醫學中心(含兒童醫院)，共有11棟醫療大樓，員工規模5,844名，每月業務量門診25.8萬人次、急診1.3萬人次、住院8,000人次、手術5,900人次，為中部地區深受民眾信賴的醫療重鎮，並與國際醫療發展接軌，透過全人、優質及安全之醫療環境，致力提升國內整體醫療水準。
依循「建構具永續精實的中國醫療體系」之發展目標，秉持永續經營理念，全力建構更完備之醫療體系，落實以病人為尊、以員工為重、以醫院為榮的共榮價值。現況醫療體系共有8家，5家附設機構：中國醫藥大學附設醫院、兒童醫院、北港附設醫院、臺南市立安南醫院、新竹附設醫院，及3家附醫分院：臺北分院、台中東區分院、豐原分院。另有12家合作支援院所、2家策略聯盟機構。
info.en:
Since its establishment in 1980, the Affiliated Hospital of China Medical University has evolved into a 2,076-bed medical center (including a children's hospital) with 11 medical buildings, 5,844 employees, and a monthly business volume of 258,000 outpatient visits and 13,000 emergency department visits. With 8,000 hospitalizations and 5,900 operations, it is a medical center trusted by the public in the central region. We are proud to align with international medical development, bringing global perspectives to our local community and striving to improve domestic medical standards in a holistic, high-quality, and safe medical environment.

org.tc: 聖安生醫股份有限公司

info.tc: 聖安生醫股份有限公司，次世代抗癌新藥之開發為己任，於成立短短不到5年的時間，已開發出「三特異性T細胞銜接抗體技術平台」及「標靶外泌體藥物遞送技術平台」兩個次世代藥物開發技術平台。以「三特異性T細胞銜接抗體技術平台」所開發出來的三特異性抗體新藥- SOA101 奈米三特異性T細胞銜接抗體，已成功通過US FDA 及 TFDA IND核准，於今年5月在台灣進行一期/二期臨床試驗，為台灣第一個通過多國監管單位的三特異性抗體抗癌藥物。另外以「標靶外泌體藥物遞送技術平台」所開發出來的標靶外泌體產品- SOB100 HLA-G靶向性外泌體藥物遞送平台，亦成功通過US FDA IND核准，於今年5月在美國進行一期臨床試驗，為台灣第一個通過US FDA的標靶外泌體產品。

org.tc: 聖展生技股份有限公司

info.tc:
研發團隊開發出使用特定細胞製造出經工程改質的外泌體(Exosome)，可作為藥物的載體，且毒性較低，不僅能穿越BBB，也因為外泌體是由細胞產生，其免疫抗原性較低，不易產生抗藥性，並具導向的專一性；可以藉由建立穩定的細胞庫(Cell Bank)，確保製程參數可以控制，穩定生產出品質一致的外泌體藥品。
目前，已經開發出兩個外泌體靶向平台，dEV 外泌體應用於巴金森氏症，而iEV應用於受損的神經細胞以及阿茲海默症；其衍生的外泌體產品，已經開始進入老鼠的實驗，且觀察到顯著的改善。
此研發成果「開發具多巴胺神經元靶向工程化細胞外囊泡用於巴金森氏症治療」於2024年獲頒「第二十一屆國家新創獎－學研新創獎」。
info.en:
Two exosome targeting platforms have been developed: dEV exosomes are used for Parkinson\'s disease, and  iEVs are used for damaged nerve cells and Alzheimer\'s disease. Their derived exosome products have begun to enter mouse experiments, and significant improvements have been observed.

info.tc: 長聖國際生技擁有高水準的細胞製程開發及生產技術，進行幹細胞及免疫細胞兩大類新興藥物研發，應用於新適應症開發及細胞製劑產品製造等多元化服務。
info.en: Ever Supreme has advanced research and developing capability in cell gene manufacturing processes of both stem cells and immune cells drugs.

org.tc: 長聯科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
生成式照護先鋒｜Eirbot愛寶AI照護機器人 — 結合ASR, TTS、LLM與HIS打造行動式AI助理護理站！
長聯科技與中國醫合作的「愛寶」生成式AI照護機器人，可導覽、衛教、送物與遠距查房，減輕護理負荷30%；第二代新增非接觸式生理量測與環境監控，實現代理人式照護機器人，更能減輕護理負荷50%。
當前醫療產業痛點：五大專科醫師招生比率驟降；世界衛生組織(WHO)預測，到了2030年將會有1,800萬名醫務人員短缺，其中一半缺口，就是900萬護理師和助產師。根據護理師護士公會全國聯合會最新調查發現，醫學中心2024年，護理師平均離職率10.7%，急診9.7%。
台灣高齡化快速加劇，護理人力長期不足，已成嚴峻挑戰。護理人員須應付大量重複性與高壓力工作，導致過勞與照護品質下降。此外，護理工作仰賴人力支援，缺乏智慧系統，導致效率降低、錯誤提高。
現有醫療機器人多僅具物流運送功能，缺乏語意理解與即時互動能力，難以支援實際臨床需求。長聯科技生成式AI醫療照護型機器人，第一階段目標：結合生成式AI、大型語言模型、語音辨識，提供病患環境導覽、衛教諮詢、訂餐服務、遠端查房、遞送物品、遞送器械服務。第二階段目標：結合多模態互動技術，提供非接觸式生理量測與AI異常警示服務，搭載智慧巡房與同步監控功能，即時偵測心率、呼吸率關鍵生命徵象。
首款產品預計2025年第三季亮相，2026年第三季量產，同步規劃醫療器材認證申請，提升智慧醫療照護普及率。
info.en:
The healthcare industry is under increasing pressure. In Taiwan, enrollment in five key medical specialty schools has dropped sharply. According to data from the World Health Organization (WHO), there will be a global shortage of 18 million healthcare workers by 2030, including 9 million nurses and midwives. In 2024, the average turnover rate for nurses in Taiwan’s medical centers reached 10.7%, with emergency room nurses experiencing a 9.7% turnover rate.
Taiwan’s rapidly aging population has further exacerbated the shortage of nursing staff. Nurses face repetitive and high-stress tasks, leading to burnout and declining care quality. The lack of intelligent support systems reduces efficiency and increases errors.
Currently, most medical robots focus solely on logistics, lacking semantic understanding and real-time interaction capabilities, making them inadequate for real clinical needs. EverBot generative AI medical robot is designed to fill this gap.
In the first phase, it integrates generative AI, large language models, and speech recognition technologies to provide functions such as patient navigation, health education consultations, meal ordering, remote ward rounds, and the delivery of items and instruments.

org.tc: 智捷醫學科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
Anatomy Cloud 是一款基於 人工智慧（AI） 的 快速全自動立體醫學影像轉換與處理平台，專為 MRI、CT 影像分析設計。透過先進的 深度學習技術，本平台可自動進行 三維影像重建、器官分割、智能標註，提升醫療影像處理的準確性與效率。

主要功能：
 • 2D 轉 3D 影像重建：快速將 CT/MRI 切片轉換為高精度三維模型。
 • 自動分割與標註：智能識別器官，不需要專業人員手動標註，減少作業時間。
 • 支援多平台裝置：使用者可以隨時隨地在行動裝置、電腦或MR頭戴式裝置上使用Anatomy Cloud。
 • 雲端運算與協作：支持遠端診療與減少醫療 AI使用成本 。

Anatomy Cloud 適用於 病況診斷、手術規劃、醫學影像研究、遠距醫療與醫學教育。透過 高效能 AI 運算，助力醫療機構提升影像分析準確度，推動醫療 AI 智慧化發展。
info.en:
Anatomy Cloud is an AI-driven platform designed to quickly and automatically convert and process 2D CT/MRI scans into 3D medical images. Powered by advanced deep learning, it performs 3D reconstruction, organ segmentation, and intelligent labeling to enhance accuracy and efficiency in medical imaging.

Key Features

・2D-to-3D Reconstruction: Rapidly transforms CT/MRI slices into high-resolution 3D models.
・Automated Segmentation & Labeling: Accurately identifies organs without manual tagging, saving valuable time.
・Multi-Platform Support: Access Anatomy Cloud from mobile devices, PCs, or XR headsets anytime, anywhere.
・Cloud Computing & Collaboration: Facilitates remote consultations while reducing the overall cost of AI in healthcare.
Anatomy Cloud is ideal for clinical diagnosis, surgical planning, medical imaging research, telemedicine, and medical education. By harnessing high-performance AI computing, Anatomy Cloud helps healthcare institutions improve imaging accuracy and drive intelligent healthcare innovation.

info.tc: 超基因不僅僅是臍帶血保存的領導者，已發展成為一 家多元化的生技公司。營業項目及產品不僅整合臍帶 血、臍帶、胎盤等多項儲存技術、幹細胞及再生醫療 技術，擴展至幹細胞研究、外泌體開發及 NK 免疫細 胞癌症療法領域，以進一步專注於幹細胞領域的儲存、 研發及臨床應用。
info.en: Supercell Biotechnology Corporation is not only a leader in cord blood storage but has also developed into a diversified biotechnology company. Our business operations and products integrate various storage technologies for cord blood, umbilical cords, and placentas, as well as stem cell and regenerative medicine technologies. The company has expanded into stem cell research, exosome development, and NK immune cell cancer therapy, further focusing on the storage, research, and clinical application of stem cells.

org.tc: 英華達股份有限公司

info.tc:
英華達以現今醫療及健康管理導向為發展目標，英華達投入雲端健管、智慧醫療以及精準醫學領域。
產品包含: 

1. 全家寶全方位生理量測系統，個人及家庭健康管理的雲端生理量測系統
2. 思邁輸液系統，結合互聯網技術的醫院醫療設備，可提升輸液安全、提高工作效率、推動醫院成為下一代智慧醫院
3. Chiline CATCH循環腫瘤細胞全自動檢測系統，早期、快速、簡單、準確且全自動化的循環腫瘤細胞檢測，用以篩檢及追蹤癌症
info.en:

info.tc: 由臺中榮總邀集臺北榮總、高雄榮總及屏東榮總參展，將展示產、官、學、研界，導入資訊科技，加速融合科技，發展智慧醫療、細胞治療等精準健康照護等亮點
info.en: Taichung Veterans General Hospital has invited Taipei Veterans General Hospital, Kaohsiung Veterans General Hospital, and Pingtung Veterans General Hospital to participate in the exhibition. The event will showcase highlights from the industry, government, academia, and research sectors, integrating information technology to accelerate technological advancements in the development of smart healthcare, cell therapy, and precision health care.

org.tc: 高雄榮民總醫院

info.tc: 2017年，高雄榮總高齡醫學中心與高雄市政府衛生局合作，推動出院準備無縫接軌模式，讓住院長輩在出院前即享長照服務，獲得SNQ銅獎與政府服務品質獎。2023年推出「御曲同工全人整合照護溝通協作平台」，結合陽明交通大學與九日生公司技術，並獲得總統盃黑客松肯定。2024年底，賴總統讚許該平台在促進照顧團隊、個案與家屬溝通方面的成效。隨著高齡社會來臨，「御曲平台」將進一步試辦「安心御老平台」，強化社區獨居長輩的照顧服務。
info.en: In 2017, Kaohsiung Veterans General Hospital's Geriatric Medicine Center, in collaboration with the Kaohsiung City Health Bureau, launched a seamless discharge preparation model, offering long-term care services before discharge. This initiative won the SNQ Bronze Award and the Government Service Quality Award. In 2023, the "Life Concerto' integrated communication and collaboration platforms" was introduced, combining technology from National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University and 9 Rise International Mobile Health Technology, and received recognition at the President’s Cup Hackathon. By the end of 2024, President Lai praised the platform’s effectiveness in improving communication among care teams, patients, and families. As Taiwan faces an aging society, the platform will further pilot the "安心御老平台" to enhance care for elderly individuals living alone in the community.

臺北醫學大學

info.tc:
臺北醫學大學創立於1960年，歷經60餘年努力耕耘，在不斷的擴展、蛻變創新下，發展至今共有11學院、1通識教育中心，在校學生人數逾6,000名，已培育超過47,000名畢業校友，分佈海內外各醫療機構、學術單位及產業界。本校擁有臺北醫學大學附設醫院、市立萬芳醫院、部立雙和醫院及新國民醫院，2013年整合三院癌症醫療系統成立「臺北癌症中心」；2017年成立「臺北神經醫學中心」以臨床為主軸，發展整合性神經醫學，共有六所優質附屬醫院。
本校秉持「人文關懷、誠信正直、創新卓越、團隊合作、社會服務」之核心價值，近年來致力於教學卓越、研究拔尖、產學績優、接軌國際與服務社會等發展面向，奠定本校以「醫學教育為本，生醫臨床為用，具社會影響力之創新型大學」為定位，以創新轉譯醫學為主軸，致力於厚實基礎研究、整合六附屬醫院臨床資源及推動生技醫療產業為目標。
info.en:
Established in 1960, over the past century, Taipei Medical University underwent the process of continuous expansion, transformation and innovation. Today, TMU has expanded into a world-class university with 11 Colleges and 1 General Education Center, 6000 students per year, 47,000 alumni around Medical Academic Institute, Medical Industry and six affiliated hospitals which are TMU hospital, Wan Fang Hospital, Shuang Ho Hospital, Hsin Kuo Min Hospital, Tapei Cancer Center and Taipei Neuroscience Institute.
Based on the core value of humanistic empathy, honesty and integrity, innovation, teamwork and social service, TMU is dedicated to excellent teaching, outstanding research, industry-academia collaboration, international participation and social service, in order to integrate clinical resource of affiliated hospitals and meet the visions of translation medicine innovation, biomedical industry development, research advancement and positive social influence. 3 main strategies of future development are below.

org.tc: 三軍總醫院

info.tc: 本次展覽匯聚智慧醫療、精準醫療與跨領域臨床創新的成果，展示多項人工智慧在診斷、治療與照護上的應用，包括AI心電圖預警系統、胸部X光輔助診斷平台、婦科手術決策支援系統與智慧藥局等。展覽亦涵蓋CAR-T細胞治療、高通量癌症藥物篩選模型、器官移植團隊合作與減重代謝手術等尖端醫療技術。此外，延展實境在醫學教育的應用、糖尿病遠距照護機器人、創新護理技術與智慧導引系統，展現醫療人員與科技結合的創新實力，共同打造以病人為中心的智慧健康照護新未來。
info.en: This exhibition brings together achievements in smart healthcare, precision medicine, and interdisciplinary clinical innovation, showcasing a wide range of AI applications in diagnosis, treatment, and patient care. Highlights include AI-powered ECG early warning systems, chest X-ray diagnostic platforms, gynecologic surgery decision support systems, and intelligent pharmacies. The exhibition also features cutting-edge technologies such as CAR-T cell therapy, high-throughput cancer drug screening models, multidisciplinary organ transplant teams, and metabolic surgery for weight management. Additionally, it presents innovative uses of extended reality in medical education, interactive chatbot systems for remote diabetes care, advanced nursing technologies, and intelligent spinal navigation systems. These projects reflect the strong synergy between medical professionals and emerging technologies, collectively shaping a new era of patient-centered, intelligent healthcare.

Utilizing AI Avatar Technology to Create Realistic Physician Models for Enhancing Patient Trust in Telemedicine
Leverage STT (Speech-to-Text), GPT, and TTS (Text-to-Speech) technologies to generate lifelike conversational experiences.
The AI digital twin can provide 24/7 consultation and health education services, unrestricted by geography and scalable for one-to-many interactions.

org.tc: 國軍花蓮總醫院

info.tc:
一.結合3D製程之擺位輔具優化腰椎斜位X光影像品質
腰椎椎弓裂（spondylolysis）是年輕人及青少年下背痛的重要原因。歐美醫療體系多依賴 CT 或 MRI 進行診斷，但在資源受限的地區，傳統 X 光仍是主要檢查方式。然而，教科書建議的斜位攝影(oblique view)角度為30–50°，範圍過於寬鬆且並未針對亞洲族群腰椎前凸角度較小的特徵進行調整，常導致影像品質不一與需重複拍攝的風險。本研究旨在檢視最適合亞洲族群的腰椎斜位攝影角度，並驗證輔助定位裝置在提升影像品質上的可行性。
二.利用融合AI進行最佳化牙科全口X光片拍攝擺位之調控策略
本研究主要目的是利用融合人工智慧(fusion artificial intelligence, fusion AI)技術分析牙科全口X光片(PANO)擺位錯誤。透過轉移學習訓練後之CNN產生擺位錯誤之融合預測值，用以提供臨床全口牙擺位錯誤調整措施。因此，本研究將六種CNN模型經轉移學習後整合為融合AI系統，將其輸出之六種擺位錯誤影像機率值加總，得到錯誤種類的預測值，再執行相關性分析求得相關係數矩陣，用以評估錯誤擺位之樞紐機制，做為後續臨床全口牙擺位之調控策略與措施。實驗結果證明，融合AI系統對於不同擺位錯誤類別均具有良好且具統計顯著性的預測能力。此外，本研究提供擺位錯誤相關性路徑圖，通過分析錯誤之間的關聯性，找出關鍵樞紐點，提供放射師進行擺位改善或影像品管時提供校正策略。綜上所述，本研究成功地將多種AI分類模型融合，將能提高牙科全口X光片常見拍攝正確率，並為相關專業人士提供了有價值的參考資料和策略建議。
info.en:
一.Combining 3D modeling with positioning aids optimizes the quality of lumbar oblique X-ray images.
Spondylolysis is a significant cause of lower back pain in young adults and adolescents. While Western healthcare systems rely heavily on CT or MRI for diagnosis, traditional X-rays remain the primary diagnostic method in resource-constrained areas. However, textbooks recommend an oblique view angle of 30–50°, a range that is too broad and fails to account for the smaller lumbar lordosis angles characteristic of Asian populations, often leading to inconsistent image quality and the risk of repeat imaging. This study aims to examine the most suitable oblique lumbar view angle for Asian populations and to validate the feasibility of using auxiliary positioning devices to improve image quality.
二.Optimization Strategy for Positioning in Full-Mouth Dental Radiography Using AI
The primary objective of this study was to analyze placement errors in dental PANO (Panel Orthogonal Angiography) radiographs using fusion artificial intelligence (fusion AI) technology. A CNN trained through transfer learning was used to generate fusion predictions of placement errors, providing clinical adjustments for these errors. Therefore, this study integrated six CNN models into a fusion AI system after transfer learning. The probability values ​​of the six types of placement errors were summed to obtain predicted values ​​for each error type. Correlation analysis was then performed to obtain a correlation coefficient matrix, which was used to evaluate the pivotal mechanisms of placement errors and to provide subsequent clinical control strategies and measures for PANO. Experimental results demonstrated that the fusion AI system had good and statistically significant predictive capabilities for different types of placement errors. Furthermore, this study provides a correlation path diagram of placement errors, identifying key pivot points by analyzing the relationships between errors, providing radiologists with correction strategies for placement improvement or image quality control. In conclusion, this study successfully fused multiple AI classification models, which can improve the accuracy of common PANO imaging and provide valuable reference data and strategic suggestions for relevant professionals.

org.tc: 馬光醫療網
org.en: Ma Kuang United Clinics of Traditional Chinese Medicine

info.tc: 「馬光中醫」深耕台灣至今三十餘年，第一家中醫診所於1991年創立於澎湖縣馬公市，當時是澎湖地區唯一的中醫院所，不僅提升了當時馬公地區的醫療品質，也廣受澎湖民眾的高度肯定，「馬光」即取自「馬公之光」為名，馬光中醫由此誕生。馬光標誌也代表著一個深遠的含意期許能幫助病患『遠離病痛，邁向健康，迎向光明』，從澎湖這個海島開始，迎向光明的海鷗承載著人們，邁向健康的未來。目前全台共有24家診所，在台北地區共有2間院所，包含位於信義區的品牌旗艦院所—信義馬光中醫診所和位於大稻埕的迪化馬光中醫診所，舒適寬敞的空間，以溫潤的木質調設計襯托中醫沉穩底蘊，並持著「善待患者」的核心理念，提供最友善的候診環境。未來馬光中醫將持續拓展規模，提供國人最完善的中醫醫療服務，「臺灣人的健康，由馬光來守護」。
info.en:
“Ma Kuang United Clinics of Traditional Chinese Medicine” has been deeply rooted in Taiwan for over 30 years. The first clinic was established in 1991 in Magong City, Penghu County. At that time, it was the only Chinese medicine clinic in the Penghu area, significantly improving the quality of local healthcare and receiving high recognition from the community. The name " Makuang " is derived from the phrase "The Light of Magong," symbolizing its origins and mission. The Makuang logo also carries profound meaning, expressing the hope of helping patients "escape illness, move toward health, and embrace the light." Starting from the island of Penghu, the seagull flying toward the light represents guiding people toward a healthy future.
Currently, there are 24 clinics across Taiwan. In Taipei, there are two locations: the Xinyi Makuang Chinese Medicine Clinic, which serves as the flagship branch in Xinyi District, and the Dihua Makuang Chinese Medicine Clinic, located in Dadaocheng. Each clinic offers a comfortable and spacious environment, featuring warm wooden design elements that highlight the serene essence of traditional Chinese medicine. Upholding the core philosophy of “treating patients with kindness,” the clinics provide a welcoming and patient-friendly environment.
Looking ahead, Ma Kuang United Clinics of Traditional Chinese Medicine will continue to expand its scale and strive to offer the most comprehensive traditional Chinese medical services to the people of Taiwan. " Makuang safeguards the health of the Taiwanese people."

org.tc: 台灣整合醫學推廣協會

info.tc:
隨著社會的進步與生活品質的提升，傳統上將「沒有生病」視為健康的狹隘觀念，已逐漸被更全面的「全人健康」（Wellness）理念所取代。事實上，早在數十年前，世界衛生組織（WHO）便已將健康定義為「身體、心智、靈性與社交層面的完全健康狀態」，強調健康是一種全方位的平衡與和諧。

台灣整合醫學推廣協會更進一步，將全人健康的理念延伸至六大核心領域，包括：功能醫學、營養、運動、身心靈整合、長期照護與生態環境。協會廣邀來自各界志同道合的專業夥伴，共同推動整合醫學與健康生活模式，並透過「全人健康學苑」的教育課程，系統性地培育「全人健康管理師」，以實踐「整合醫學 × 預防保健」的使命。

本次活動中，台灣整合醫學推廣協會將攜手優秀合作夥伴共同參展，全力推廣整合醫學的理念與實務技術，期望讓更多人獲得正確的健康知識，邁向真正的全人健康。
info.en:
With the advancement of society and the improvement of quality of life, the traditional view that “being free from illness” equates to health has gradually been replaced by a more holistic concept of Wellness. In fact, as early as several decades ago, the World Health Organization (WHO) defined health as “a state of complete physical, mental, spiritual, and social well-being,” emphasizing that true health is a comprehensive balance across all aspects of life.

The Taiwan Integrative Medicine Promotion Association (TIMPA) has further expanded the concept of wellness into six core areas: functional medicine, nutrition, exercise, mind-body-spirit integration, long-term care, and ecology. TIMPA brings together like-minded professionals from various fields to promote integrative medicine and healthy lifestyle practices. Through its educational platform, the Holistic Health Academy, the association systematically trains Holistic Health Managers to fulfill the mission of “Integrative Medicine × Preventive Healthcare.”

In this upcoming event, TIMPA will join hands with outstanding partners to participate in the exhibition, working together to promote the concepts and techniques of integrative medicine. We hope to empower more people with accurate health knowledge and guide them on the path toward true holistic well-being.

org.tc: 彰化基督教醫療財團法人彰化基督教醫院

info.tc: 本產品致力於研發基於邊緣運算的智能螢光檢測系統，透過整合螢光檢測技術與高效能影像處理演算法，以數據化管理為核心，提供即時回饋與清潔成效評估，將洗手後的潔淨程度以影像與數據呈現，強化手部衛生的遵從性。預期可有效提升醫療機構手部衛生執行率，降低院內感染風險，並展現智慧醫療防控的應用價值。最終目標為推廣至非醫療場域，帶動精準健康產業升級與國際化發展，並依循 WHO 2023 最新指引，全方位提升手部衛生教育，減少感染傳播風險。

org.tc: 世延生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
(1) 世安®  MMP-1 ELISA 檢測試劑組
-定量、可應用在臨床檢測實驗室
-完成1,031例口水檢體之臨床驗證
-靈敏度: 85.6% (95% CI: 81.4–89.0%)
-特異性: 78.7% (95% CI: 75.5–81.6%)
-精准度: 80.9% (95% CI: 78.4–83.2%)
-使用情境：搭配醫療院所內的ELISA reader儀器使用，可用於輔助口腔癌診斷，以及預後追蹤
-取得歐盟CE、新加坡、澳洲、香港、泰國和越南的醫材上市許可證

(2) 世安® MMP-1 快速檢測試片組
-定性、適合個人化檢測
-完成1,029例口水檢體之臨床驗證
-敏感度: 79.8% (95% CI: 75.1–83.8%)
-特異性: 86.2% (95% CI: 83.5–85.6%)
-精準度: 84.2% (95% CI: 81.8–86.3%)
-使用情境：第一線的口腔癌篩檢，可於院外使用
-取得歐盟CE許可證；另外新加坡、澳洲、香港、泰國和越南的醫材上市許可證正送件審查中
info.en:
(1) EarlyFound®  MMP-1 ELISA kit
-Quantitative data (concentration)
-Easy performed in clinical lab
-Suitable for high throughput test
-Validation in 1,031 saliva specimens
-Sensitivity: 85.6% (95% CI: 81.4–89.0%)
-Specificity: 78.7% (95% CI: 75.5–81.6%)
-Accuracy: 80.9% (95% CI: 78.4–83.2%)
-Use scenario：Utilized with ELISA reader equipment within hospitals for the auxiliary diagnosis of oral cancer and for monitoring the prognosis of oral cancer.
-Obtained medical device approvals from CE (IVDD), Singapore HSA, Australia TGA, Hong Kong MDD, Thailand FDA, and Vietnam MoH.

(2) EarlyFound® MMP-1 Rapid Strip Test
-Qualitative data 
-Easy performed by oneself
-Suitable for point-of-care test
-Validation in 1,029 saliva specimens
-Sensitivity: 79.8% (95% CI: 75.1–83.8%)
-Specificity: 86.2% (95% CI: 83.5–85.6%)
-Accuracy: 84.2% (95% CI: 81.8–86.3%)
-Use scenario：For first-line oral cancer screening and suitable for use in out-of-hospital settings.
-Obtained medical device approval under CE (IVDD); registration reviews are currently in progress with Singapore HSA, Australia TGA, and Hong Kong MDD.

org.tc: 京碼股份有限公司

info.tc: 京碼提供微米級激光雷射解決方案，三項核心技術為微蝕刻、微鑽孔、及微切割。京碼致力於以自研雷射技術來製造重要領域之關鍵組件，包含：數位健康及精準醫療、矽光子及光通訊、半導體先進封裝、機器人及動物、智慧農漁業、電動及自駕車等。
info.en: Hortech provides micron laser solutions. We specialize in laser etching, drilling, cutting, and engraving at both micron and sub-micron levels. We develop precision laser machines by ourselves to provide laser processing and finishing services. You can ask us to produce heterotypic microvia patterns on specific materials, form circuits, or micro-structurize or micro-texturize your materials. We also design precision laser systems and machines that achieve stable mass production for manufacturers in diverse industries.

org.tc: 利優生醫科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
利優生醫專注於霧化給藥技術的研發與整合，自主打造的 AIRHYPER 吸入平台涵蓋臨床前動物試驗、體外氣霧沉降模擬及藥械合一設計，精準解決吸入藥物開發難以量化的痛點，降低風險與成本，加速新藥上市。公司由兼具藥物設計與應用力學背景的李皇德博士創立，深耕氣霧領域逾十年，已推出三大產品線：AniFree 實驗動物霧化設備，用於新藥評估與動物吸入試驗；NEBreath 振動篩網噴霧器，對接臨床吸入療法及藥械合一應用；Breezone 個人亞健康照護裝置，提供全面且精準的霧化體驗。
自 COVID-19 疫情後，利優生醫積極將氣霧技術拓展應用至肺部感染、院外急症、癌症及慢性疾病等領域，推動氣霧平台與生技療法及藥品的跨域整合。目前，我們正與多方產學研夥伴合作，進行小細胞肺癌、抗生素及腦神經疾病等吸入療法的聯合開發，持續拓展氣霧吸入治療的應用邊界與未來可能性。
info.en:
AeproMED is a pioneer in aerosol drug delivery. The AIRHYPER Platform integrates preclinical animal exposure, in vitro deposition testing, and co-designed drug devices to accurately quantify inhaled doses and accelerate the launch of new therapies. Its main products include AniFree for preclinical research, NEBreath vibrating mesh nebulizer, and BREEZONE for sub-health care.
Since the COVID-19 pandemic, AeproMED has been actively expanding the application of its aerosol technology to areas such as pulmonary infections, emergency care outside hospital settings, oncology, and chronic diseases. We are driving the cross-disciplinary integration of our aerosol platform with biotechnologies and pharmaceuticals.At present, we are collaborating with a wide range of academic and industry partners on the joint development of inhalation therapies for small cell lung cancer, antibiotic delivery, and neurological disorders. Through these efforts, we continue to broaden the boundaries and future possibilities of aerosol-based treatments.

org.tc: 千才生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
【GRID適用於光子刀品保作業系統】
利用一台GRID來完成光子刀治療系的每日/每月/每年品保工作的最佳解決方案，其中，「快速、精確」是最重要的兩個參數，導入GRI可大幅縮短在每日/每月/每年品保作業驗證時間。
光子刀（Photon Knife）的品保作業（Quality Assurance,QA）系統對於保證治療質量、安全性以及設備的穩定運行具有至關重要的作用它不僅能提高治療效果、延長設備使用壽命，還能保障者的健康和安全，並確保醫療機構符合相應的法律規範。
info.en:
【GRID for Photon Knife Quality Assurance System】
The optimal solution for completing daily/monthly/annual quality assurance tasks for the Photon Knife treatment system using a single GRID unit. “Speed and precision” are the two most critical parameters. Implementing GRID significantly reduces verification time for daily/monthly/annual QA procedures.
The Quality Assurance (QA) system for the Photon Knife is critical for ensuring treatment quality, safety, and stable equipment operation. It not only enhances treatment efficacy and extends equipment lifespan but also safeguards patient health and safety while ensuring healthcare institutions comply with relevant legal regulations.

org.tc: 博太生技醫藥股份有限公司

info.tc: 博太生技醫藥股份有限公司(Botanicure)致力於失智症新藥研發，秉持「務實、積極、善念、人道關懷」的企業核心價值，並以「濟世救人」為願景，將醫學創新延伸至大眾日常。

org.tc: 台灣骨王生技股份有限公司
org.en: Taiwan Main Orthopaedic Biotechnology Co., Ltd.

info.tc:
本術前規劃軟體專為骨科脊椎椎根弓釘與骨創傷植入物設計，整合自動3D建模技術，提供高效率解剖重建與精準手術模擬。透過參數化植入物資料庫與直觀引導介面，醫師可快速模擬椎根弓釘與骨板配置，生成詳細器械清單，提升手術準備效率與精準度。
並且透過擴增實境智慧手術眼鏡沉浸式觀看3D解剖模型及術前規劃植入物規劃結果，使其可以更精準以及可達到模擬結果重現性的可能。達到提高手術精確性、縮短手術時間、縮小傷口促進術後恢復。
info.en:
This preoperative planning software is tailored for orthopedic spine pedicle screw and trauma implant applications, leveraging automated 3D modeling to provide efficient anatomical reconstruction and precise surgical simulation. Featuring a parameterized implant database and user-friendly guided interface, it enables surgeons to swiftly configure pedicle screws and bone plates, generating detailed instrument lists to streamline surgical preparation with high accuracy. 
Integrated with augmented reality (AR) smart surgical glasses, the software allows immersive visualization of 3D anatomical models and preoperative planning results, ensuring enhanced precision and reproducible simulation outcomes. By improving surgical accuracy, reducing operating time, and minimizing incisions, it promotes faster postoperative recovery.

org.tc: 合盈光電科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
EZ caring PX 智能檢測系統 - 全方位智能檢測，助力高齡健康管理
EZ Caring PX結合視覺辨識影像辨識與功能性動作檢測（Functional Movement Screen），進行肌肉能力功能性檢測。藉由 AI 演算法進行數據分析與健康評估，能即時生成個別化的檢測結果。此技術方案有效解決傳統檢測過程繁瑣、耗時且需要專業人員的限制，讓醫療院所、長照中心及居家照護環境皆能快速部署並持續監測。透過數據自動化與即時回饋，使用者可更早發現潛在健康風險，降低症狀惡化的可能性，並輔助專業人員制定精準的照護計畫，提升檢測效率與照護品質，同時降低醫療與照護資源的負擔。
info.en:
EZcaring Health Test - Smart Health Detection Empowering Aging Management
EZ Caring PX combines visual recognition and functional movement screen (FMS) to assess muscular capability and functional performance. Through AI-driven algorithms for data analysis and health evaluation, it can instantly generate personalized test results. This solution effectively overcomes the limitations of traditional assessments, which are often complex, time-consuming, and reliant on professional personnel. It enables rapid deployment and continuous monitoring across medical institutions, long-term care facilities, and home care settings. By leveraging data automation and real-time feedback, users can identify potential health risks earlier, reducing the likelihood of symptom progression while supporting professionals in developing precise care plans. This enhances testing efficiency and care quality, while alleviating the burden on healthcare and caregiving resources.

org.tc: 國家科學及技術委員會中部科學園區

info.tc:
由國家科學及技術委員會中部科學園區領軍下，串聯中部地區生醫廠商以微創醫材、智慧輔具及生醫產品為主軸進行聯展，以情境式展現醫材產品及醫療問題解決方案，用視覺連結體驗，讓參觀者快速了解各類醫材產品特色，展現中部特色醫材產業聚落成果效益。
國家科學及技術委員會中部科學園區今年率領5家廠商，共同投入精準用藥、精準照護、癌症精準診斷及AI智慧醫療檢測技術等精準醫療與醫材產品研發與製造。
info.en: Under the leadership of the Central Science Park, biomedical manufacturers in the central region will be exhibited with minimally invasive medical materials, intelligent aids together. In this exhibition, the biomedical products are the main axis. The medical problem solutions will be presented in a situational manner. Also, the medical materials used in the medical device will be exhibited. This experience is enable Visitors quickly understand the characteristics of various types of medical material products by visual connections. The show will be benefit of the central medical material industry settlement.

org.tc: 國家科學及技術委員會南部科學園區管理局
org.en: Southern Taiwan Science Park Bureau, NSTC

info.tc: 南科精準健康產業聚落共有81家廠商進駐，為臺灣重點發展的生醫產業聚落之一。南科精準健康產業聚落的發展分布，臺南園區以發展製藥、生技研發為主；高雄園區發展牙/骨高階醫材；嘉義園區為智慧醫療、植物新藥產業；橋頭園區則是生物相似藥產業；屏東園區以生物製劑、動植物用藥為主。
info.en: There are 81 tenant companies in the iBioMed Cluster of the Southern Taiwan Science Park (STSP), one of the largest research and development sites of advanced biomedical technologies in Taiwan.

org.tc: 國家科學及技術委員會新竹科學園區管理局

info.tc:
國家科學及技術委員會新竹科學園區管理局
新竹科學園區轄屬六個衛星園區，分別是新竹、竹南、銅鑼、龍潭、宜蘭與新竹生物醫學園區等科學團區，總開發面積1,375公頃，目前所有衛星學園區已有廠商進駐並開始營運，截至目前，核准廠商數已經超過600家,員工超過16萬人,近年平均營業額均突破兆元，園區產業共分六大類：積體電路產業、電腦及周邊產業、通訊產業、光電產業、精密機械產業及生物技術產業，其中積體電路產業之產值佔園區總產值達7成，為園區第一大產業，光電產業營業額佔園區總產值近2成，為園區第二大產業；餘為精密機械產業、電腦及周邊產業，通訊產業及生物技術產業等。

It does not contain any western medicine ingredients, but can quickly and effectively reduce inflammation and swelling. It can especially quickly heal large wounds and diabetic bedsores.

org.tc: 惠合再生醫學生技股份有限公司
旺北科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
旺北科技有限公司創始於民國95年7月14日，是一家以研發為導向的公司，96年進入清華大學創新育成中心，99年自育成中心畢業並進駐新竹科學工業園區，公司發展的方向以結合電子產業與生物科技為永續經營的目標，目前以醫療產品為主要營業項目，並已通過衛生福利部的嚴格審查，為國內醫療產品優良製造商，已開發並獲得衛福部醫療許可字號的產品有多參數生理訊號監視器、可攜式心電儀、脈搏血氧濃度計等。這些產品並已銷售進入台大醫院、成大醫院、衛生福利部聯合醫院、國泰醫院、亞東醫院、敏盛醫院 等等國內各大型醫療機構。
目前旺北科技正準備進軍國際醫療市場，工廠已通過ISO-13485的審查，具備歐盟醫療製造廠的要求，所申請的產品於2016年11月全線通過CE認證，於歐盟核准上市。 2018年底更取得美國FDA 510K之認證，認證號碼:K173036，使得我們的多參數生理訊號監視器產品可於美國核淮上市。
info.en: North-vision was founded in 2006 from the Incubator of National TsingHua University in Taiwan. We are a Company with strong Innovational and Creative Capabilities. We mainly focus on the Design and Manufacture of Medical and Bio-Electronic Application. In 2010, we moved to the current location in HsinChu Industrial Science Park. Our Lab and Factory have been certified by TFDA and received the Manufacture and Sales Licenses of Medical Devices. We were also qualified by DNV Organization with ISO-13485 Certification and all the Products have been Qualified by CE. Moreover, Multi-parameter Patient Monitor has been approved by US FDA 510K certification. Now we have the Products including Patient Monitor, Pulse Oximeter, ECG, and PCR Machine in the market. They have been used and certified in Clinics and Hospitals. Hydrogen & Oxygen Generator by Applying Electrolysis of Water is brand-new product from us. Through our Design and Manufacture, we like to create the international business with you, not only a provider of your products but becoming the truly and closely operational partners to both. Hope to have the Business with you in near future.

org.tc: 泰陞國際科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 泰陞科技此次參與醫療展，展示五大產品系列：『術後傷口系列、急慢性傷口系列、減壓預防系列、皮膚預防保護系列與傷口急救系列』。產品強調結合創新材料技術與生物醫學實驗成果，並透過臨床回饋不斷優化、落實療程概念，致力於提供完整且高效的傷口照護解決方案。
info.en:
TAICEND Technology is participating in this medical exhibition to showcase its five major product lines: Postoperative Wound Care, Acute and Chronic Wound Care, Pressure Injury Prevention, Skin Protection and Prevention, and Emergency Wound Care.
The products emphasize the integration of innovative material technologies with biomedical research findings, continuously optimized through clinical feedback to support effective treatment implementation. TAICEND is committed to delivering comprehensive and efficient wound care solutions.

org.tc: 源點生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
源點生物科技專注於酵素與核酸的創新技術，涵蓋 NGS 片段篩選、雜交探針、即時定量 PCR、抗體與藥物接合，以及表面固定化等多元應用，致力於提供高效、可靠的解決方案，加速分子診斷與生物研究的發展。
我們推出的 ssDNA End-Labeling Kit，能快速、精準且穩定地修飾 ssDNA，廣泛應用於新一代定序、分子診斷及生物感測。
Rapid 5’-End ssDNA Labeling Kit採用公司專利的共價偶聯技術，可有效接合螢光染料、半抗原或點擊化學標籤，同時維持探針功能。單次反應可達 8–10 nmol，標定效率超過 90%，僅需數小時即可獲得高純度、穩定耐用的探針。
Rapid 3’-End ssDNA Labeling Kit則可直接標定 20 – 120 個核苷酸的 ssDNA，無需特殊修飾，每次反應可處理 4 nmol，回收率高達 80–95%，亦支援多重標定與快速純化，方便後續應用。
這兩款產品相輔相成，為研究人員提供靈活的工具，透過這些技術，源點生技協助合作夥伴加速研發，推動基因體學與臨床檢測的創新突破。
info.en:
YD Biotech focuses on innovation in enzyme and nucleic acid technologies, offering solutions for NGS enrichment, hybridization probes, qPCR, antibody/drug conjugation, and surface immobilization. To accelerate molecular diagnostics and research, we developed the Rapid ssDNA End-Labeling Kit series, enabling fast, precise, and stable probe modification for genomics, diagnostics, and biosensing.
The 5’-End Labeling Kit uses our patented covalent technology to conjugate fluorophores, haptens, or click-chemistry tags with >90% efficiency, producing 8–10 nmol of high-purity probes in just hours.
The 3’-End Labeling Kit directly labels 20-120 nt ssDNA without prior modification, processing 4 nmol per reaction with 80–95% recovery. It supports multiple tags and rapid purification, ensuring flexibility and high performance.
Together, these kits provide powerful tools that help researchers accelerate development and drive innovation in genomics and clinical testing.

org.tc: 潤雅生技股份有限公司

〉原料藥生產：提供包括臭氧化反應、硫醇化反應、透析、生物偶聯(醣-蛋白偶聯)、蛋白質及天然物管柱純化等。
〉安定性研究及分析科學服務
info.en:
Amaran Biotech provides a range of drug development services, from initial process development & optimization, supply chain management, to clinical and commercial cGMP-compliant manufacturing with a comprehensive range of analytical and regulatory support, its CDMO solution includes:
〉AB-801 Vaccine Adjuvant: It has similar application capabilities to the widely used QS-21 adjuvant and is GMP-grade.
〉Drug Product Manufacturing: Taiwan\'s first fully automated robotic aseptic filling line, the SA25, provides high-quality, low-waste filling solutions for high-value new drugs.
〉Drug Substance Manufacturing: include ozonation, thiolation, dialysis, bioconjugation (glycoprotein conjugation), column purification of proteins and natural products.
〉Stability Study and Analytical Science Services

org.tc: 瀚生醫電股份有限公司
org.en: 瀚生醫電股份有限公司

info.tc: 本公司主要提供具價格優勢及高性價比之生物晶片及設備整合服務。本公司數位化高靈敏阿茲海默症生物標記Tau蛋白檢測平台，透過磁珠、試劑反應，運用微孔陣列晶片設計與相應的微流控方法，達成高效率磁珠分散與隔離，透過數位化偵測與Possion統計方式，使Tau蛋白檢測靈敏度可達2pg/mL以下，完全符合血液樣品中Tau蛋白檢測需求。本公司的商業模式在於提供具價格優勢及高性價比之生物晶片及設備整合服務給客戶，目標客戶為醫院、診所、第三方檢驗所、藥廠、及科研單位。收入的來源主要是檢測服務、晶片及設備的銷售、或經銷權的權利金。
info.en:
A cost-effective and high-performance dELISA platform for the Alzheimer\'s disease biomarker blood detection.
Our company primarily offers cost-effective and high-performance biochips and integrated equipment solutions. We have developed a highly sensitive digital detection platform for Alzheimer’s disease biomarker Tau protein. With digital detection and Poisson statistical analysis, our platform reaches a Tau protein detection sensitivity < 2 pg/mL, fully meeting the requirements for detecting Tau protein in blood samples. Our business model focuses on delivering competitively priced, high-value biochip and equipment integration services to clients, including hospitals, clinics, LTDs, pharmaceutical companies, and research institutions.

org.tc: 翔安生醫科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
Rockbox 醫療用雙模閘道器被設計應用於遠距照護系統中。適用領域包括遠距健康管理照護、長照病房、老人遠距照護和復健病房等需要進行遠距持續照護的患者。
經由閘道器將生理量測數值持續傳輸，以網頁平台即時呈現各項生理參數，並提供給個案管理師使用。管理師能夠即時收到病患最新的量測資訊，一旦發現生理參數異常，系統將立即發出預警和提醒，使個案管理師能夠透過遠距電話對居家病患進一步關心。
經由所有量測資訊自動上傳至網頁平台，透過收集並累積大量生理量測數據，提供個人化的長期生理資訊趨勢圖，以提供精準的照護模式。在資料累積足夠病患生理量測資料的情況下，未來還可以搭配我們的人工智慧技術，提前通知醫護人員可能存在的問題風險，達到發生前的預防處理和保健措施。
info.en:
Rockbox Medical Dual-Mode Gateway is designed for use in telecare systems. The applicable areas include remote health management care, long-term care wards, remote care for the elderly, rehabilitation wards, and other settings involving patients who require remote continuous care. 
The physiological measurement values are continuously transmitted through the gateway, with various physiological parameters displayed in real time on the web platform for case managers to review. Managers can receive the latest measurement information from patients and once abnormal physiological parameters are found, the system will immediately issue warnings and reminders, allowing case managers to further care for patients at home through long-distance calls. 
All measurement information is automatically uploaded to the web platform. By collecting and accumulating a large amount of physiological measurement data, a personalized long-term trend chart can be generated to support an accurate care model. Once sufficient data has been collected, we can also use our artificial intelligence technology to notify medical staff in advance of potential health risks-enabling preventive treatment and proactive health care measures before issues arise.

org.tc: 能資國際股份有限公司

info.tc: 能資國際股份有限公司(Energy Resources International Co., Ltd.，簡稱 ERI)成立於 1999 年 12 月 8 日，總部設於台灣新竹，為專注於醫療影像設備與先進 X 光技術研發之國際化企業。能資投入奈米碳管冷陰極 X 光管之研究，為全球率先掌握此項關鍵技術之少數企業之一。
info.en: Energy Resources International Co., Ltd. (ERI) is a global innovator in medical imaging equipment and advanced X‑ray technology. ERI is among the few companies worldwide to master nano carbon tube cold‑cathode X‑ray technology, enabling faster response, lower heat, and longer lifespan. This breakthrough supports the development of portable, energy‑efficient, and high‑precision diagnostic systems. With a commitment to innovation and healthcare advancement, ERI delivers solutions that enhance diagnostic efficiency and expand access to quality care.

org.tc: 艾克夏醫療儀器股份有限公司

info.tc:
Excelsius Medical-艾克夏醫療儀器
艾克夏是全球唯一由台灣自主研發製造的眼科醫療儀器品牌，通過ISO13485、CE等國際認證，專注於為全球眼科醫師和患者提供穩定且有效的手術體驗。
MICRON M7準分子屈光雷射眼科手術儀
專為眼科治療需求打造，結合自動對焦與Robotic Arm控制，實現手術流程自動化，減少人為誤差，提升效率、視力穩定性與營運效益。
FEMTON F1飛秒雷射眼科手術儀
新世代眼科儀器，採用SectorScan 微創三維切銷技術，僅需2-4mm的手術傷口，低不適感，術後復原迅速。醫師藉此單一平台即可執行屈光與白內障等多樣手術，並以更合理價格惠及患者，達成全面照護視力需求的目標。
info.en:
Excelsius Medical – Aikesha Medical Instruments
Aikesha is the only ophthalmic medical instrument brand in the world independently developed and manufactured in Taiwan. Certified with ISO 13485 and CE, it is dedicated to providing stable and effective surgical experiences for ophthalmologists and patients worldwide.
MICRON M7 Excimer Refractive Laser 
Specifically designed for ophthalmic treatment needs, it integrates auto-focus technology with robotic arm control to automate surgical procedures, reduce human error, and enhance surgical efficiency, visual stability, and operational benefits.
FEMTON F1 Femtosecond Laser
A next-generation ophthalmic device featuring SectorScan minimally invasive 3D cutting technology, requiring only a 2–4 mm incision. It offers low discomfort and rapid post-operative recovery. This single platform enables surgeons to perform a wide range of procedures, including both refractive and cataract surgeries, at a more accessible cost, fulfilling the goal of comprehensive vision care for patients.

org.tc: 訊聯細胞智藥股份有限公司

info.tc:
訊聯生技集團創立於1999年，深耕「再生醫療/細胞治療」、「精準健康/基因醫學」、「數位醫療/AI智慧研發」三大核心領域，旗下核心企業「訊聯細胞智藥股份有限公司」，專注於再生醫療與智慧細胞藥物的開發製造，為集團帶來全新動能！

訊聯開發的臍帶間質幹細胞外泌體原料，已獲美國 PCPC 核發國際化妝品原料名稱（INCI Name），成功打入國際高端保養品市場。

此外，訊聯也建立跨物種外泌體巨量資料庫，訓練「外泌體功能預測AI模型」，再加上全新導入PIC/S GMP醫藥級自動化系統的外泌體代工廠，配置上200位製藥、AI、生命科學領域碩博士大軍，單日可量產破萬瓶高度活性的外泌體，能針對不同需求提供客製化服務，不需自建產線，就能擁有自家的外泌體研發製程中心。

org.tc: 豐譽永續科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
一、臭氧微氣泡系統/醫療抗生素廢水處理：
本系統在應用與學術上具全球首創性，利用臭氧微氣泡進行醫療廢水預處理，有效降解「抗藥性基因」並去除異味。此系統已成功在亞東醫院運行。系統具備自動刮除污泥功能，減少人力需求，適合遠端控制，提升環境衛生，並且結合AI 控制系統，業界首創醫療廢水預處理系統極具市場獨特性。
二、獨家MediFlow UV+ ／消滅退伍軍人菌
醫護人員是我們的健康守護者，尤其在疫情之後，打造更安全、永續的醫療環境已是當務之急。
MediFlow UV+ 採用創新的 UVC LED 取代傳統汞燈管，實現更高效率、更環保的消毒。它不僅能節省至少 33.3% 的能源，更徹底解決汞廢棄物問題。透過獨家 石英透鏡 技術，MediFlow UV+ 增強聚光與穿透力，讓殺菌效果更為卓越。
我們的解決方案已廣泛應用於：
ICU 病房用水： 確保醫護人員與病患的用水安全。
醫院空調系統： 減少空氣中的細菌傳播，提升院內空氣品質。
醫院廢水排放： 殺滅廢水中病菌，保護自然環境，守護全人類健康。
info.en:
1.Ozone Finebubble System for  Medical Antibiotic Wastewater Treatment
This system is a global first, using ozone finebubbles to pretreat medical wastewater. It effectively degrades antibiotic resistance genes and removes odors. Already running successfully at Far Eastern Memorial Hospital, it features automated sludge removal and remote control, reducing labor and improving hygiene. Combined with an AI control system, this innovative solution is the first of its kind in the industry.

2.Exclusive MediFlow UV+/ Legionella Disinfection
Healthcare workers are our health guardians. After the pandemic, a safer medical environment is a top priority. MediFlow UV+ uses innovative UVC LEDs to replace mercury lamps, offering an eco-friendly and efficient disinfection solution. It saves  at least 33.3% energy and eliminates mercury waste. The exclusive quartz lens technology enhances its sterilization power. Our solution is used in ICU water supply to ensure safety, hospital air conditioning to improve air quality, and wastewater discharge to protect the environment.

org.tc: 達運精密工業股份有限公司

info.tc:
專為藥物與化妝品研發設計的皮膚晶片平台，以皮膚晶片模型為核心，重建三維組織結構並支援長期動態培養，真實模擬藥物反應。系統整合動態灌流模組，提供穩定且可控的流體循環，模擬血液供應與營養交換。同時搭載電極感測模組，即時監測皮膚屏障功能，並結合光學影像技術，同步追蹤細胞形態、活性與藥物反應，提供完整的多維度監測能力。

整體效益
• 長期模擬：支援 14 日以上的動態培養，可再現慢性刺激與複合反應。
• 多維監測：同時量測屏障完整性、細胞活性、代謝與炎症反應，數據全面精準。
• 應用範圍：覆蓋藥物研發、皮膚刺激性評估、皮膚疾病模型與個人化醫療。

? 加入我們，共同推動更安全、更快速、更符合倫理的試驗平台。
info.en:
The Skin-on-Chip Platform is a standardized in vitro testing system for drug and cosmetic development. The platform rebuilds 3D skin tissue and supports long-term dynamic culture. It can realistically simulate both acute and chronic responses.

The system integrates a Dynamic Perfusion Module that provides stable and controlled fluid circulation. This design mimics vascular supply and nutrient exchange to maintain cell activity. It also includes a TEER Sensor Module for real-time monitoring of skin barrier function. In addition, an optical imaging module tracks cell morphology, viability, and drug responses. Together, these functions provide complete and multi-dimensional analysis.

Key Benefits
• Long-term Modeling: Supports more than 14 days of dynamic culture for chronic and complex response studies.
• Multi-dimensional Monitoring: Measures barrier integrity, cell activity, metabolism, and inflammation with precision.
• Broad Applications: Suitable for drug development, cosmetic safety evaluation, skin disease modeling, and personalized healthcare.

? Join us to build a safer, faster, and more ethical testing platform.

org.tc: 錫安生技股份有限公司

info.tc: 質子治療是癌症精準治療的新技術，利用布拉格峰特性，針對癌症腫瘤精準擊殺、精確打擊癌症細胞，亦不會傷害其他正常組織細胞。錫安生技的iProton®質子標靶癌症治療系統，以同步加速器作為核心，與典型的迴旋加速器質子治療系統相比，它擁有最緊湊的設計之一。 iProton®的設計旨在最大限度地減少空間需求、營運成本、人員需求、維護費用、中子污染和安全需求。錫安生技於2020年6月通過 ISO-13485 : 2016認證，品質政策為「錫安創造高品質、落實安全高標準」，為專業醫療器材製造商。

info.tc: 開物科技將展示兩大核心產品：呈色分析儀與膠體金快篩試劑。呈色分析儀能快速解析試劑結果，廣泛應用於人醫診斷、食品安全與毒品濫用篩查等領域。快篩試劑具高靈敏度與操作便利性，與儀器結合後可於短時間內獲得準確數據，協助使用單位即時反應與決策。
info.en: Kaiwood Technology will showcase two core product lines: rapid test readers and colloidal gold rapid test kits. The rapid test readers provide fast and accurate interpretation of test results, with broad applications in clinical diagnostics, food safety, and drug abuse screening. The rapid test kits offer high sensitivity and user-friendly operation; when integrated with the analyzers, they deliver precise data within a short time, supporting timely response and decision-making for end users.

info.tc:
工業技術研究院是國際級的應用研究機構，擁有六千五百位尖兵，以科技研發，帶動產業發展，創造經濟價值，增進社會福祉為任務。自1973年成立以來，率先投入積體電路的研發，並孕育新興科技產業；累積超過三萬件專利，並新創及育成，包括台積電、聯電、台灣光罩、晶元光電、盟立自動化、台生材等上市櫃公司，帶動一波波產業發展。 
在醫藥與醫材領域除扮演技術研發的角色，更建立完善的CRO (Contract Research Organization)和CDMO (Contract Development & Manufacturing Organization)服務，以「生醫領域一站式服務平台」，協助研究開發、雛型轉譯、GXP試量產、臨床前驗證、臨床試驗到輔導上市，幫助國內廠商降低產品開發先期投資成本，加速研發期程。
info.en:
ITRI is a world-leading applied technology research institute with more than 6,500 outstanding employees. Its mission is to drive industrial development, create economic value, and enhance social well-being through technology R&D. Founded in 1973, it pioneered in IC development and started to nurture new tech ventures and deliver its R&D results to industries. ITRI has set up and incubated companies such as TSMC, UMC, Taiwan Mask Corp., Epistar Corp., Mirle Automation Corp., and Taiwan Biomaterial Co.
ITRI is committed to driving the development of various industries with its outstanding technology and research abilities in hopes to create economic values and promote social well-being. In addition to playing a role of researcher and developer in the fields of medicine as well as medical devices, it has also established a complete structure of CRO (Contract Research Organization) and CDMO (Contract Development & Manufacturing Organization) services. The one -stop biomedical services platform of ITRI provides assistance in a wide range of scopes, including research and development, model translation, GXP trial production, pre-clinical / clinical trial, post-marketing consultation, etc. This mechanism makes it possible for domestic manufacturers to lower their initial cost of investment, and accelerate their research and development.

info.tc: 彰基以「AI生成預見，彰基智慧創健」於2025台灣醫療科技展精彩亮相。展現AI與大數據在臨床、護理、遠距醫療等創新成果。從癌症治療到智慧照護，體驗數位轉型的健康新未來。邀請您走進彰基展區，感受智慧醫療、創新研發與百年傳承，共創健康新世代。
info.en:
Changhua Christian Hospital Shines at Healthcare+ Expo Taiwan 2025.
 
Changhua Christian Hospital (CCH) made a stunning appearance at the 2025 Healthcare+ Expo Taiwan (台灣醫療科技展) with the theme: "AI-Generated Vision, CCH Smart Health Innovation."
The hospital proudly showcased its innovative achievements in AI and Big Data across various fields, including clinical practice, nursing care, and telemedicine.
Experience the future of digital health transformation, from cutting-edge cancer treatment to smart care solutions.
We sincerely invite you to visit the CCH exhibition area to witness the fusion of Smart Healthcare, Innovative R&D, and a Century-long Legacy as we collectively create a new era of health.

org.tc: 永悦健康股份有限公司

info.tc:
H2U pano 數位健康平台 
規模化實踐數位健康新生態系的個人福祉應用
H2U為台灣數位健康第一品牌，旗下擁有「eXpert」、「eXamine」、「早安健康」、「運動筆記」、「iFit愛瘦身」等品牌， H2U透過建置H2U pano將會員相關健康、運動、消費到閱讀行為與數據進行串聯，藉由B2B到B2B2C，在平台上導入百間優質健檢機構，協助企業員工進行從健檢預約，到檢後報告匯總；在使用者授權下，能完整呈現個人數位健康旅程。pano願景在於透過健康數據的貫通，打破數據孤島，為個人提供透明、連續的健康資料追蹤；並由AI資料力驅動分析提供使用者個人健康指引，在pano平台上享受多元的健康優化方案，讓每個人都能透過大數據的力量做出最佳的個人健康和福祉選擇。
info.en:
H2U Pano- Digital Health Platform
H2U, Taiwan's leading digital health brand, presents the H2U pano, a comprehensive personal wellness application designed to scale and revolutionize the digital health ecosystem. With sub brands like "eXpert," "eXamine," " Everydayhealth," " SportsNote," and "iFit," H2U continuously receives data from tens of thousands of users every minute, encompassing physiological examination data, exercise metrics, browsing behaviors, purchasing patterns, and more. Through B2B and B2B2C models, the platform collaborates with numerous high-quality health check institutions, assisting corporate employees from appointment scheduling to post-checkup report consolidation. Upon user authorization, it offers a complete digital health journey. The vision of H2U pano is to break down data silos, providing transparent and continuous health data tracking. H2U's AI engine personalized health service recommendations, aids users in managing their health proactively and making informed decisions for their personal well-being.

org.tc: 明根股份有限公司

info.tc: 「TURTLE GYM特多勁」的創立希望像烏龜般的慢生活、慢運動、慢樂活， 一步一步透過精準運動促進健康來達到活力長壽的目的。我們提供最專業的心血管訓練、平衡訓練、等速訓練、骨關節炎訓練、骨質疏鬆訓練、熟齡族運動與行動不便者居家運動訓練，並搭配 AI智慧銀髮運動健身管理系統，導入AIOT和雲系統，可以全面追蹤管理您的運動狀態，制定精準運動處方，藉由長期追蹤健康&運動紀錄，評估與調整適當的運動方式，讓您達到理想的運動目標。
info.en: TURTLE GYM was founded to be like a turtle with Slow Living, Slow Exercise, Slow LOHAS and. Step by step through exercise to promote health to achieve vitality and longevity. TURTLE GYM provides a variety of services for exercise, comprehensively track, and manage your exercise status. Formulate precise exercise prescriptions, evaluate, and adjust appropriate exercise methods by tracking health & exercise records for a long time, so that you can achieve your ideal exercise goals.

org.tc: 仁寶電腦工業股份有限公司

info.tc:
本次展覽由集團整合旗下七家醫療相關子公司共同參展，展出多項智慧醫療與再生醫學創新成果。
1.神寶醫資提出一套貫穿「診斷－治療－復健」全流程的數位化解決方案，整合 AI微型影像系統與 OPEN SHOULDER 智慧肩復平台，實現從臨床影像判讀、資料雲端同步、遠距訓練處方派發，到後續復健進度即時回傳的閉環照護流程。
2.品醫生技推出「積層製造生物陶瓷骨移植替代物」，採用3D列印技術打造具仿生孔洞的高強度植入物，有助於骨細胞再生與癒合，加速臨床重建流程。
3.承寶生技聚焦CAR-T細胞療法，開發DashCAR®技術，主力產品ARD103針對AML具特異性，已取得FDA一期/二期臨床許可並獲孤兒藥資格。
4.奔騰智慧生醫推出結合AI技術的手持式超音波裝置，實現攜帶即用、自動量測與即時診斷，適用於多元醫療場域。
5.瑞河再生醫學專注於iPSC幹細胞庫建置，開發符合國際標準的再生醫療製劑，導入PIC/S GMP製程，創造台灣再生醫學新契機。
6.宏智生醫以AI腦波技術評估憂鬱與失智風險，協助醫師進行早期偵測與心理健康監控，回應高齡社會挑戰。
7.  瑞寶生醫在台北與高雄設有通過衛福部認證的 GTP 細胞製備中心，支持幹細胞儲存、CIK 免疫療法等臨床應用，結合豐富細胞治療經驗，提供高品質、具追溯性的細胞產品。
info.en: This exhibition unites seven healthcare subsidiaries under the group to showcase breakthroughs in smart healthcare and regenerative medicine. Highlights include SHENNONA’s AI imaging and rehab platform for a closed-loop care process, Precisely Printed Medical Ltd’s 3D-printed bioceramic bone grafts, and ARCE Therapeutics' CAR-T DashCAR® for AML. ACO Healthcare presents an AI-powered handheld ultrasound. River Regeneration and Rejuvenation Biotechnology focuses on iPSC stem cell banking with GMP. HippoScreen offers AI EEG tools for the early detection of dementia and depression. Raypal provides certified cell centers for advanced therapies, thereby strengthening Taiwan’s biomedical landscape.

org.tc: 奔騰智慧生醫股份有限公司

info.tc: 奔騰阿帕契超音波系統是結合了超音波技術及軟體，提供醫療專業人員無限的便利性。只需與行動裝置連線，即可開始掃描超音波及影像輸出。奔騰手持式超音波的輕巧設計完美，完全不售空間及時間的限制。無論是在醫院、診所、床邊，或是外診，醫療專業人員都可即時提供患者完善的醫療服務。
info.en: The Apache Wireless Ultrasound System is designed for medical professionals to enhance portability and efficiency in daily workflows. The lightweight design and its accessibility bring real-time imaging to mobile devices and tablets. Featuring advanced software technology with customizable settings, regular software updates, and optimized imaging presets to ensure better patient care.

org.tc: 品醫生技股份有限公司

info.tc: 積層製造3D列印生物陶瓷骨移植替代物
info.en: Additive Manufacturing 3D Printed bioceramic bone graft substitute

org.tc: 宏智生醫科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
根據世界衛生組織統計，至2020年全球已有超過2.64億人口患有憂鬱症。憂鬱症是造成失能的主要原因，也是導致全球疾病負擔的一個重大因素，最嚴重甚至會導致自殺。心理健康成為現代社會刻不容緩的重要課題，而如何提供客觀可量化的心理健康評估方式，也是目前需要克服的一大挑戰。
宏智生醫科技利用與國內三家醫學中心合作收集的憂鬱症腦波資料所開發出來的SEA腦波壓力評估系統，包含了負責訊號收集與處理的腦波儀、流程控制的使用者圖形介面、雲端分析的AI演算法，透過記錄90秒腦波訊號(EEG)並加以分析，提供客觀、可量化的壓力評估指標以及直觀的壓力數據分布圖，輔助醫師提供更有效率、更精準的診斷，是專業醫療人員在心理健康篩檢及臨床上的得力AI幫手。
info.en: HippoScreen\'s Stress EEG Assessment (SEA) System was developed using depression EEG data collected through collaboration with three major medical centers in Taiwan. It records 90-second brainwave signals to analyze with an AI algorithm and then provides an objective and quantifiable SEA index in the assessment report. With this report, it can assist doctors in providing a more efficient and accurate diagnosis. SEA system is designed to be a powerful AI tool for professional medical personnel in mental health screening.

org.tc: 承寶生技股份有限公司

info.tc: 承寶生技專注於開發次世代CAR免疫細胞治療技術，已建立DashCAR®、MaxCAR®與OneCAR®三個技術自主開發嵌合抗原受體T細胞(CAR-T)及嵌合抗原受體自然殺手細胞(CAR-NK)之技術平台。ARD103為承寶主力產品，為經DashCAR®快速製程技術所製備之自體CAR-T細胞，能專一性地標靶急性骨髓性白血病(AML)細胞上之CLL-1 抗原，並瞄準無有效藥物治療的復發/難治型急性骨髓性白血病(r/r AML)病人。ARD103導入第二代CAR基因結構並進行篩選及優化，經DashCAR®細胞技術平台，可在3-5天內生產出高品質CAR-T細胞，保留CAR-T 細胞的幹細胞源性(stemness)，較不易衰敗，有利於 CAR-T 細胞在體內的生長及持久性(persistence)，正是細胞活藥的關鍵。DashCAR®快速製程解決臨床上復發或難治型癌症病人病情無法等待的窘境，製造時程較已上市細胞治療產品(約2-3周)大幅降低，能有效為病人縮短等待細胞治療時間。ARD103 已獲美國FDA AML孤兒藥資格認定(ODD)，並於2024年通過美國FDA人體試驗新藥審查(IND)，准予進行一/二期臨床試驗，預計今年第一季啟動臨床試驗並納入收案，有望成為首創(first-in-class)治療 AML之細胞治療藥物。
info.en: ARCE, a global biotech company specialized in developing immune cell & gene engineering technology, announced earlier today that the US FDA has cleared its IND application for ARD103, an autologous CAR-T therapy, for phase 1/2 clinical trials in patients with relapsed/refractory acute myeloid leukemia (r/r AML). ARCE plans to launch its phase 1/2 study and enroll qualified patients by Q1 2025. ARD103, our priority product, is an autologous CAR-T cell manufactured by DashCAR® technology with high transduction, stem cell-like phenotypes and ultra-fast manufacturing in 3-5 days.  In addition, FDA has granted Orphan Drug Designation (ODD) to ARD103 for treatment of acute myeloid leukemia (AML). It may be a first-in-class CLL-1 CAR-T therapy. We look forward to administering ARD103 to our first patient within the next few months. We are thrilled that ARCE is well-positioned to achieve a key program milestone.

org.en: River Regeneration and Rejuvenation Biotechnology Co. Ltd

info.tc: 瑞河再生醫學生技股份有限公司（River Regeneration & Rejuvenation Biotech Co., Ltd.）致力於誘導性多能幹細胞（iPSC）之研發生產與臨床應用。秉持「引領iPSC療法，開創精準再生醫學新紀元(Pioneering iPSC Therapy, Transforming Precision Regenerative Medicine)」的精神，建立符合PIC/S GMP標準的臨床等級iPSC細胞庫，透過嚴謹的生產環境與品質管控，確保細胞產品的安全性、穩定性與可靠性。並提供客製化iPSC製造與保存服務，滿足學研醫療機構與產業界的多元需求。瑞河再生醫學堅持專業、品質與實用的態度，與您一同攜手迎接精準再生醫療新世代。
info.en: River Regeneration & Rejuvenation Biotech Co., Ltd. focuses on the development and clinical application of iPSCs. We are building a PIC/S GMP-compliant clinical-grade iPSC bank to ensure safe, stable, and reliable cell products. River also provides customized iPSC manufacturing and preservation services to support academic, medical, and industrial needs, advancing the new era of precision regenerative medicine.

org.tc: 神寶醫資股份有限公司

info.tc:
本次展出包含兩項智慧醫療創新產品，分別為「AI微型影像系統」與「打開你的肩OPEN SHOULDER」。
「AI微型影像系統（Diminutive PACS）」專為中小型醫療單位設計，具備高度整合的影像管理功能。支援DICOM格式並可與HIS系統無縫整合，讓臨床流程更為順暢。使用者可透過網頁平台即時編輯報告與管理工作清單，並透過雲端或本地備份，確保資料安全與可回復性。此外，影像分享功能讓醫護人員能快速將資訊傳遞至他院或病患端，提升診療效率。其小巧機體與低功耗設計，適合各類臨床場域部署，是推動智慧醫療的理想解決方案。
「打開你的肩OPEN SHOULDER」是一套肩部運動訓練系統，提供個人化、模組化的復健方案。使用者可依需求選擇不同訓練內容，並由APP逐步引導每個動作，確保動作正確完成。系統具備即時視覺回饋與數據追蹤功能，強化訓練動機。醫療人員可針對個別使用者調整內容，並透過後台即時查看運動成效，作為治療與評估的重要依據，協助患者安全、有效地恢復肩部功能。
info.en: Our showcase features two smart healthcare solutions. The AI Micro Imaging System is a compact PACS designed for small to mid-sized clinics. It supports DICOM, integrates with HIS systems, and offers web-based report editing, cloud/local backups, and secure image sharing to improve diagnostic efficiency. The Open Shoulder system provides personalized shoulder rehabilitation guided by an app. Users follow step-by-step exercises with real-time visual feedback. Medical professionals can customize routines and track progress through a backend system, supporting precise treatment and recovery monitoring.

info.en: Moxxu FIR massage instruments uses exclusive patterned material that could release far infrared ray. FIR has ability to penetrate skin; increases blood circulation and soften rigid muscles and pains. Moxxu FIR massage instruments are easy to use and effective in best result. org.tc: 昌辰鑫生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
從醫療產品的設計、工程開發，到製造與銷售，我們是您醫療科技（MedTech）事業的加速器。
Transin Biomedical 是一家全球性的醫療科技裝置與耗材製造商，為建名精密集團（Janman Precision Group）旗下的全資子公司，提供新發明與新創改良各式的的醫療器材，從醫院使用的高精密器械，到家庭用的創新護理保健醫材。
Transin 成立於 2020 年，為建名精密集團底下全球醫療科技品牌的研發與銷售部門，而建名精密自 1985 年創立以來，已深耕精密金屬與塑膠製品近 40 年，是台灣前三大精密金屬與塑膠供應商之一。
TRANSIN 於 2020 年正式獨立為公司，專注於醫療科技產品的設計、開發與銷售服務，致力於以科學為基礎的醫療工程持續改善人類健康。
憑藉雄厚的技術背景，TRANSIN 與來自美洲、亞洲、歐洲的全球醫療領導品牌與新創企業合作，針對人與動物的需求，提供具競爭力的解決方案。
info.en:
Transin Biomedical is a global manufacturer of MedTech devices and supplies. We are a wholly-owned subsidiary of Janman Precision Group, offering a range of MedTech devices for humans and animals, from precise surgical instruments for hospitals to innovative rehabilitative devices for homes.

Founded in 2020 as the Research & Development division of various global MedTech under Janman Precision Group, which was established in 1985. Janman Precision Group has been dedicated to precision metal and plastic products for nearly 40 years and is recognized as one of Taiwan\'s Top 3 precision metal and plastic providers.

TRANSIN officially became a standalone company in 2020 specializing in MedTech designing, development, and distribution services company for keep improving healthcare by scienced-based medical engineering

With our strong technological background, TRANSIN has worked with well-known global healthcare pioneers and startups in America, Asia, and Europe to offer our competitive solution for humans\' and animals\' needs.

org.tc: 財團法人醫院評鑑暨醫療品質策進會

info.tc:
財團法人醫院評鑑暨醫療品質策進會於2019年成立「台灣智慧醫療創新整合平台(HST)」，匯集超過250件台灣優秀智慧醫療科技產品，以及歷年國家醫療品質獎-智慧醫療類競賽獲獎的優秀解決方案，透過案例分享與專案資源支持，促進醫院間標竿學習，以及產業間的交流合作。
淨零排放已成為許多國家目標與趨勢，更加上賴總統2050淨零碳排政策，醫療機構推動淨零排放，落實推動永續發展任務，故醫策會今年度以「醫療淨零智慧科技應用」為主軸，邀集5家機構聯合策展，期望呈現醫院及產業界於科技進展下，透過數位轉型，如何進行淨零碳排、環境永續及能源轉型，打造低碳永續的醫療環境，讓觀展者深入了解目前醫療機構於淨零的作為，提升台灣品牌知名度。
info.en:
The Joint Commission of Taiwan (JCT) is a government-funded and non-profit organization. JCT has committed to promoting healthcare quality and patient safety and using quality management tools and training to help health administrators enhance healthcare quality in the past 2 decades.
JCT established the Health Smart Taiwan (HST), a one-stop portal designed which gathers over 200 successful cases selected from the National Healthcare Quality Award (NHQA). HST catalyzes the existing digital solutions scalable through offering a range of consultations, campaigns, acceleration services etc. It provides integrated services for healthcare institutions to achieve digital transformation, shaping a quality, safe, and efficient healthcare environment.
In this exhibition, HST will feature \

org.tc: 秀傳醫療體系

info.tc:
秀傳醫療體系是臺灣目前最大的的私人醫療集團，擁有50年的醫療專業經驗，在全台擁有10家醫院、4500多張床位與7000多名員工。由黃明和總裁創立以來，使命即期望將領先的技術和服務提供至資源不足的地區。 
近年來，我們專注於智慧科技應用，例如人工智慧整合、手術數位化以及個人健康和居家護理物聯網設備。秀傳醫療集團以旗下醫院為示範基地，致力於打造國際化的人工智慧手術訓練中心，引領亞洲醫療數位轉型。我們加速醫療科技創新進程，涵蓋研發、效能驗證、法規認證和國際市場推廣。
info.en:
Show Chwan is a hand-in-hand “family” healthcare system. With 50 years of medical expertise. Show Chwan Health Care System operates 10 hospitals with a current number of 4500 beds, and 7000 employees. President Huang Min-Ho advocates the spirit of “Mayo Clinic” by establishing a “sound rural hospital” system, allowing even the people in the most remote of areas to enjoy the quality and cordial medical care found in cosmopolitan cities. In recent years, our focus has been on smart technology applications such as artificial intelligence integration, digital surgery, and remote care IoT devices for personal health and home care. These applications span clinical healthcare, nursing care, and continuous care for discharged patients. 
Using its hospitals as demonstration sites, Show Chwan Health Care System is dedicated to establishing an international AI surgical training center, spearheading the digital transformation of healthcare in Asia. We accelerate progress in medical technology innovation, covering research and development, efficacy confirmation, regulatory certification, and international marketing.

info.tc:

台灣精品獎（Taiwan Excellence Award）是我國經濟部自1993年設立之獎項，每年經嚴格選拔機制，依據「研發」、「設計」、「品質」、「行銷」4大專業項目，同時考量「臺灣產製」條件，綜合評選出具「創新價值」之產品，授予台灣精品獎，作為臺灣產業的表率，由政府在國際市場推介，形塑臺灣產業創新形象。
info.en:
Exhibits medical-related products that have won Taiwan Excellence Awards.
The Taiwan Excellence Awards were established in 1993 by Taiwan's Ministry of Economic Affairs (MOEA) to recognize and celebrate the exceptional achievements of Taiwan's most innovative products. Each year, eligible products go through a rigorous selection process that assesses their products based on four important factors: research and development, design, quality, and marketing with the key criterion of being Made in Taiwan. 
The Taiwan Excellence mark has gained global recognition as a prestigious symbol of quality and design, effectively showcasing Taiwan's impressive product innovation. For more information, please visit https://www.taiwanexcellence.org/en

org.tc: 中美萬泰科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
中美萬泰是台灣領先的醫療和工業電腦製造廠，擁有自主設計研發和開發觸控平板電腦，包含工業級、醫療級、食品級、防爆等高設計涵量電腦，透過自主設計及整合供應鏈，提供適用於醫療、工控等相關行業應用。
此次展出高效醫療應用，滿足市場需求:專為醫院手術病房設計，搭載 27 吋 4K 高解析顯示器，具備亮度鎖定與三種色溫選擇，確保醫療影像清晰準確。內建 Intel 第 13 代 Core i7-13800HE 處理器 及 Iris® Xe Graphics，提供強大影像運算與 AI 支援，確保低延遲、高解析的影像傳輸，滿足智慧手術與精準醫療需求。2. 便利、安全的人因設計:內藏電源供應器與不斷電電池設計，確保全天候穩定供電，並具電源固定裝置，降低手術中因線材脫落影響運作的風險。無風扇設計降低噪音，支援雙螢幕輸出，可整合手術房醫療設備，實現即時影像處理與數位化儲存。允許鎖定螢幕即可清潔，提升醫護使用便利性。3. 卓越性能與穩定可靠:符合 UL/EN 60601-1 醫療認證。支援 醫療影像擷取卡與 AI 運算加速卡，具備 Isolation LAN、COM、USB 設計，滿足多元醫療應用需求。
info.en:
Wincomm is one of Taiwan’s leading manufacturer of medical and industrial computer with relative embedded computing products. Wincomm designs and develops all in one panel PC, selected monitor, rugged box PC and embedded software products for a broad range of medical to industries applications. 
Designed for hospital operating rooms, it featured a 27-inch 4K display that supports three color temperature options and a brightness lock for accuracy. Powered by Intel 13th Gen Core i7-13800HE and Iris® Xe Graphics, it delivers low-latency, high-resolution imaging for intelligent surgery. Its built-in power supply to ensure stable 24/7 power, while secure cable fastening prevents disconnection. A fanless design keeps the environment quiet. It supports dual-screen output and bidirectional image input/output, integrating with medical devices. PCI-E x4 expansion, Isolation LAN/USB, and medical certifications ensure high performance and safety. Antibacterial aluminum design resists 95% of MRSA, and IP65/IP54 protection ensures hygiene. Energy Star compliance reduces power consumption.

org.tc: 安盛生科股份有限公司

info.tc: 安必測®多功能檢測系統(血脂)為結合硬體量測與軟體數據管理之智慧居家血脂檢測解決方案。採用安必測脂質檢驗試片搭配安必測多功能分析儀，並利用安盛生科專利之影像感測技術，以內建之裝置鏡頭結合軟體演算法，精準分析出試片呈色濃度，定量檢測指尖血或靜脈全血中的脂質濃度。安必測多功能分析儀為市面上少數具可攜性之掌上型專業分析儀(110g)，除供醫療專業人員用於定點照護，也可供個人居家自我檢測使用。安必測®多功能分析儀只需單一試片，三分鐘內即可出四項血脂數值，大幅降低民眾取得檢測報告所需之時間。分析儀內建藍芽數據傳輸，使用者可將檢測數據同步至個人手機，智慧APP提供檢測紀錄管理、血脂變化趨勢圖及生成式AI智能問答功能，解決過往缺乏長期個人化血脂追蹤管理之照護方案，同時實現智慧健康管理與無紙化之目標。此系統為一可擴充檢測平台，除已推出之血脂檢測，未來可開發適用於各式檢驗試片，降低資源浪費。安必測®利用軟硬整合之優勢，發揮行動照護及智慧醫療之價值，持續發展「數位醫療」新健康照護模式。
info.en: The PixoTest® Vision Analysis System (Lipid) offers at-home lipid tests with digital health management solutions. Designed for both point-of-care by medical professionals and personal home use, this palm-sized portable analyzer (110g) provides four lipid parameters in three minutes using a single test strip, which significantly reduces result time. The analyzer has built-in Bluetooth, which enables fast data  transmission to smartphones, and the companion App offers data management, trend charts, and generative AI Q&A service, to address the need for long-term personalized health management. This system is extensible for multiple testings on the same device. Globally, PixoTest® Vision stands out as a smart at-home digital testing solution for easy lipid health monitoring and disease risk management.

org.tc: 建菱科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
高滲透水冷光艙採用獨家Hydrolight專利技術，保留600-1400奈米波段，把對皮膚有害的紫外光及對眼睛有害的藍光波段濾除，並提升對人體有益的波段能量3 至 5 倍，讓光能深入人體內部，激活線粒體，提升核心體溫，啟動身體自癒功能。大部分類似的設備，皆是採用兩三種不同「單波長」的LED燈做組合，效果較為單一；而水冷光艙是「全波長」，對人體吸收光能量的效果更加全面。
遠紅外線設備與水冷光艙的差異在於「穿透性」，遠紅外線只能穿透皮下組織不到0.5公分，而採用 Hydrolight 技術則能達到15公分。另一個差異則為發熱機制，遠紅外線設備是「由外而內」的熱，透過大幅提升環境溫度促使身體排汗，這樣所排的汗為一般「汗線」的汗，目的是為了「降溫」；水冷光艙是「由內而外」的熱，採用冷光低溫運行，艙內控制在溫和的34~36°C左右，卻能讓身體核心溫度達到38~40.5 °C，並透過「皮脂腺」排汗，排出身體深層的有害物質。重點是對身體或皮膚不會有灼熱等不適感。
info.en:
Hydrolight Detox Capsule is a medical device that uses near-infrared for treatment. With Hydrolight technology, the spectral range can be controlled from 600 to 1400 nm while filtering out harmful ultraviolet and blue light, ensuring a safe experience for both skin and eyes. And it significantly increases the beneficial energy bands for the human body by 3 to 5 times. The main function of this device is to allow the energy of light to enter the deep body, activate mitochondria, raise human core body temperature, and activate the body's self-healing function.
Hydrolight Detox Capsule belongs to the medical auxiliary device. Inside the cabin, the temperature is maintained at 34-36°C, yet it can effectively raise the core body temperature to 38-40.5°C.
The biggest difference between Hydrolight and far-infrared is “light penetration”. Far-infrared can only penetrate less than 0.5 cm into the subcutaneous tissue, but with Hydrolight technology can achieve 10cm.

org.tc: 晉弘科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
晉弘的手持式視網膜光學斷層掃描儀具備輕巧便攜與強大效能，能在無需散瞳的情況下，快速捕捉高解析度視網膜影像。
人體工學握把搭配腳踏開關設計，結合三軸自動定位下巴托，實現全自動掃描流程，大幅提升臨床工作效率，同時提升病患檢查時的舒適度。
不論是手術應用、居家照護或社區篩檢，皆能靈活因應。特別適用於偏遠地區、醫療資源不足的環境，亦為高齡者、行動不便者及需定期追蹤的病患提供更便捷的眼底檢查方式。
結合診斷多元性與臨床高精度，此設備是各類醫療場域中不可或缺的智慧利器。
info.en:
Compact, portable, and powerful, the MiiS handheld OCT scanner captures high-resolution retinal images without the need for pupil dilation. Designed with an ergonomic grip and footswitch, it pairs seamlessly with a 3-axis auto-positioning chin rest to deliver fast, automated scans—streamlining workflow and enhancing patient comfort.
Ideal for surgical settings, home care, and community screenings, the MiiS handheld OCT extends accessible eye care to patients in remote or underserved areas, particularly the elderly, those with limited mobility, and individuals requiring follow-up examinations.
Combining diagnostic versatility with clinical precision, it is a valuable tool across a wide range of medical environments.

org.tc: 華廣生技股份有限公司

info.tc: 華廣生技專注於糖尿病照護，成功研發並取得許可的首款國產「瑞特安活連續葡萄糖監測系統（CGM）」。不同於傳統的指尖採血，瑞特安活CGM以植入器將感測器軟針置入皮下，並透過專屬App連續10天監測血糖，讓使用者與照護者能隨時掌握變化，即時採取措施，同時減少頻繁扎針帶來的不適。第二代 iFree 2 CGM 全面優化，具備15天長效佩戴、免校正、抗干擾及可充電重複使用等特色。產品結合電子、生化、軟體與智慧製造等核心技術，累積超過450項全球專利，並整合80多項跨領域技術。華廣亦導入2000道以上品質控管程序，建構工業4.0自動化產線，展現穩定的量產與技術實力。秉持「優質平價的CGM，讓該用CGM的人，用得起CGM」的使命，華廣致力推動普及化，實現「安心控糖，自在生活」的願景。
info.en: Bionime focuses on diabetes care and developed the first domestically approved RIGHTEST iFree Continuous Glucose Monitoring System (CGM). Unlike traditional finger-prick testing, iFree CGM uses a soft sensor inserted under the skin and works with a dedicated app to continuously track glucose for 10 days, allowing users and caregivers to monitor changes in real time while reducing the discomfort of frequent pricks. The second-generation iFree 2 CGM is fully optimized, offering 15-day wear, calibration-free operation, anti-interference performance, and rechargeable reusability. Combining expertise in electronics, biochemistry, software, and smart manufacturing, it integrates over 80 technologies and holds more than 450 patents across multiple countries. Bionime has also implemented over 2,000 quality control procedures and established an Industry 4.0 automated production line, ensuring stable manufacturing and high reliability. Guided by its mission to provide high-quality, affordable CGMs, Bionime strives to make CGM widely accessible and fulfill its vision: Better Health for More People.

info.tc:
經濟部商業發展署（以下簡稱本署）組織法奉總統112年6月7日制定公布，主要任務為以推動商業服務業發展及優化公司治理環境為主軸。

本署在公司治理、商業管理，公權力執行等業務，持續優化精進服務效能外，更將強化商業服務業輔導發展，以協助我國近百萬家商業服務業掌握經濟發展趨勢，健全發展成長。

本署致力協助我國服務業提升軟實力及科技力，推動服務業品牌海外輸出，同時活絡內需市場發展動能，更強化小型店家發展；並結合法規、政策與實務，落實數位化國家政策，以提升電子申辦服務比例，營造企業開辦友善環境。
info.en:
Administration of Commerce (AOC), Ministry of Economic Affairs (MOEA) was enacted and promulgated by the President on June 7, 2023, with the mission of promoting the development of service industry and optimizing the corporate governance environment.

In addition to continuing to improve the effectiveness of our services in the areas of corporate governance and business management, we aim to further stimulate the country’s service industry growth. We aspire to assist the industry in grasping the trends of economic development, fostering its development towards a more robust and sustainable goal.

We are committed to enhancing the country’s service industry by bolstering its soft power and technological capabilities. We endeavor to facilitate the export of local brands as well as revitalize the domestic market. Moreover, to create a friendly environment for starting a business, we implement the national digitization policy, integrating regulations, policies, and practices to improve the process of electronic application service.

org.tc: 普生股份有限公司

info.tc: GBC普生研究和開發的CellBio技術用於從血液中分離腫瘤細胞並隨後使用螢光染色，利用螢光顯微鏡觀察細胞表徵。 CellBio試劑及儀器經過優化，可用於循環腫瘤細胞 (CTC) 的計數，做為臨床輔助檢驗項目。GBC普生擁有的CellBio技術，可同時利用物理性濾膜的方法和螢光染色，根據細胞的大小和不同的表面標記，將CTC自人類血液樣本中分離並回收，回收率超過 90%，優於現有的市場技術。高靈敏度和特異性使研究及臨床人員能夠進行可靠和準確的分析，並提供了解腫瘤進展的有效利器。
info.en: GBC, as a pioneer and manufacturer in the diagnostics and pharmaceutical industry, has innovated CellBio technology performed as a game-changer for isolating circulating tumor cells from blood and subsequently uses fluorescent staining for cell characterization by fluorescence microscopy. CellBio technology has demonstrated the CTC recovery efficiency of>90 % with in-vitro samples. Within high sensitivity and specificity, CellBio provides an effective tool for understanding tumor progression.

info.en:
Founded in 2003, it is a professional service robot company in Taiwan. It has a professional team of R&D, design and planning. With the ability to continuously absorb and integrate innovative technologies, it is committed to providing high-quality robot automation solutions and has successfully built a complete robot platform to provide high-quality software and hardware integration solutions in the fields of Industry 4.0, medical care, department store retail, catering, accommodation, education and scientific research. Bojun Technology has established Taiwan\'s leading brand of independent research and development of service robots, injecting new blood into the service robot industry, and successfully promoted its solutions to the world, demonstrating Taiwan\'s robot research and development capabilities.

info.tc: 《善笙生物科技股份有限公司》由台灣釀造食品業前輩 許澄清先生於1998年創立，以過去近80年發酵生產經驗與技術為雄厚基礎，結合生技領域相關技術與人才，堅持自產自銷，致力生產“對人類健康、環境永續經營有幫助之生技產品”，成立至今已榮獲許多獎項，如「國家新創獎」「台北生技獎」等，並擁有33個多國專利，不僅提供優質的產品更提供專業的技術服務。[一、]各類保健食品: ●膠囊產品: 牛樟芝菌絲體、葉黃素 ●保健飲品: 樟芝發酵濃縮液、西洋蔘發酵濃縮液、穀蔬發酵濃縮液、褐藻醣膠濃縮液 ●其他保健品: 益生菌、益生元等 [ 二、]機能性保健原料:  發酵菇菌類、動植物性小分子胜肽 、幾丁聚醣/寡糖、人參皂苷、益生元配方等 [三、] 重組蛋白產品，包括農業、食品、醫藥/檢測工業所使用之各種工業用酵素及重組蛋白質產品。以上各種產品之代工生產及代客研發服務，為您量身訂做，使您的商品更具優勢與競爭性。
info.en:

Simpson Biotech has received numerous awards such as the "National Innovation Award" and the "Taipei Biotech Award," and holds 33 multinational patents. In addition to providing high-quality products and professional technical services.

org.tc: 伊達醫療器材科技股份有限公司·

info.tc:
伊達醫療器材（EDA Medical Devices Technology Inc.）研發製造專業醫療光電設備，展現粒線體活化技術在預防醫學上的前瞻應用。專為慢性病與退化性疾病設計，強調「無藥物、低副作用、可日常化使用」的創新照護模式。
透過提升粒線體功能，該設備能有效促進細胞能量代謝、減少慢性發炎，並支援組織修復，有助於減少患者對長期藥物的依賴，降低藥物副作用與抗藥性風險。臨床應用面向涵蓋慢性疼痛、心血管疾病、神經退化、代謝症候群等領域，為亞健康與高齡族群帶來新的照護選擇。
info.en:
EDA Medical Devices Technology Inc. specializes in the research, development, and manufacturing of professional medical photonics equipment, showcasing the forward-looking application of mitochondrial activation technology in preventive medicine. Designed specifically for chronic and degenerative diseases, the devices emphasize an innovative care model that is drug-free, low in side effects, and suitable for daily use.
Using Low-Level Laser Therapy (LLLT), PBM the device stimulates cellular energy production, reduces inflammation, and accelerates tissue repair. These effects enable reduced drug dependence, fewer side effects, and improved outcomes for patients with chronic conditions, including cardiovascular diseases, neurodegenerative disorders, chronic pain, and metabolic syndrome.

This product consists of recombinant human lectin proteins produced through genetic engineering, retaining their natural glycan-binding activity. With high purity and activity, these proteins provide reliable quality for scientific research and drug development purposes.

info.tc:
德威國際醫療體系是一個完整垂直及平水整合的醫療體系，其中包含牙醫醫院、牙科診群、牙體技術所、牙材事業、西醫診所、藥局、醫務管理、數位醫學影像整合及教育中心。
自西元1989年德威第一家院所在台北成立，至今院所群遍布全台北、中、南、花東、離島、偏鄉地區，及海外地區如日本、馬來西亞與美國等共近40家院所。以「一家看診，海內外服務」的精神，提供優質、專業的口腔醫療服務。
2021年成立全台灣第一家牙醫口腔醫院，具有全台最完整的牙醫專科團業，擁有最先進的牙醫設備及對病患最好的醫療照顧。醫院整合了牙醫11個專科，設有十二大中心：顳顎關節中心、矯正中心、口腔內科與感染及不明疼痛中心、精準睡眠呼吸中止治療中心、顯微根管治療中心、植牙中心、特殊需求專科中心、家庭牙醫科、口腔顎面外科治療中心、顎顏面中心、牙周治療中心、贋復補綴牙科治療中心，提供個人化精準醫療服務。
並於2024年成立口腔護理產品品牌，以成為口腔醫療照護的領導者為使命。

First Dentway Dental clinic was established in 1989. There are nearly 40 clinics in Taiwan (the northern, central, southern, eastern, remote islands), and overseas areas including Japan, Malaysia, and the United States. Provide high-quality and professional dental services in the spirit of "service at home and abroad".
In 2021, the first dental hospital in Taiwan is established. It has the most complete dental specialty group in Taiwan, with the most advanced dental equipment and the best dental care for patients. There are twelve centers in the hospital to provide personalization precision dental services, and its mission is to become a leader in dental care.

info.tc: 昆弘實業股份有限公司是一家醫療塑膠零件專業製造廠，於西元1993年成立。本公司具備模具開發與設計能力，以生產血液透析迴路套、IV set零件、壓力監測保護罩、點滴筒、插入針、公針基、母針基、人工鼻過濾器、細菌過濾器...等而聞名。全廠23台塑膠成型機、模具監測器、連續式泡殼封口機、醫療瞬熱封口機、專業庫板潔淨空間且於2011年七月由SGS輔導取得ISO13485認證，深耕醫療零件之開發，秉持道德良知，以永續經營為目標，在專業的領域內持續不段的開發與改進。
info.en:
We are a medical components manufacturer based in Taiwan.

 

We, Kuen Horng Industrial Co.,Ltd. established in 1993 and well-known by production of blood line set for hemodialysis, IV set, transducer protector, drip chamber, female male luer connector, artificial nose filter, bacteria filter ...,etc. We have mold development and design capabilities. We overcome all kinds of hardships and steady grow and get into R & D in 2000. We produce medical parts in our own and there are 23 plastic injection machines, mold monitoring equipment and professional clean warehouse. We also obtain ISO13485 certification in July 2011 by the SGS counseling. Kuen Horng Co., Ltd develop medical parts of the development, uphold the moral conscience to continue long-term development as the goal. We welcome every partner oversea join us and establish a cooperation relationship.

info.tc:
1.鴻盛精準檢測服務中心
本團隊由醫藥專家與技術人員組成，提供臨床代謝體檢測、抗癌藥物伴隨檢測、中草藥與小分子藥物分析等標準與客製化檢驗服務，支援生技研發與臨床決策。本中心通過 ISO/IEC 17025 認證，確保方法科學性與結果準確性，提供符合國際標準的專業分析。
2.鴻盛精準生物功能實驗室
提供客製化實驗與細胞功能檢驗，包括流式細胞儀分析與分選服務、細胞功能測試、基因與蛋白質表現分析、客製化細胞模型建置與合作開發專案(CRO服務)等，為各界之研究提供精確且高效的實驗結果。
歡迎前往攤位，我們將進一步介紹服務內容。
info.en:
1.Testing Service Center
Our ISO/IEC 17025 accredited center offers standardized and customized testing services,including clinical metabolomics,companion diagnostics for anti-cancer drugs,and herbal/small molecule analysis,supporting biotech R&D and clinical decisions.
2.BioFunction Lab
We provide custom experiments and cell-based assays,including flow cytometry,gene/protein analysis,and CRO projects for precise,efficient research support.
Visit our booth to learn more.

org.tc: 奈捷生物科技股份有限公司
org.en: 奈捷生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
奈捷生物科技股份有限公司坐落於南港國家生技研究園區，是一家專注於精準醫療檢測的先驅企業，並於美國與荷蘭設立子公司，展現全球佈局與技術領導力。

奈捷生技（Instant NanoBiosensors） 以嵌入式精準醫療為核心發展方向，結合全球首創的光纖粒子電漿共振（Fiber Optic Particle Plasmon Resonance, FOPPR）技術與專利微流體晶片，打造出非侵入式、快速、超高靈敏且具成本效益的阿茲海默症早期偵測與追蹤血液檢測平台。該技術已導入荷蘭 Amsterdam UMC 醫學中心，並獲歐盟 TAuimMunE 專案 採用為核心檢測工具，彰顯其在神經退化疾病領域的國際認可度。

此外，奈捷亦推出專為癌症領域設計的 INLab NGS 精準醫療解決方案，提供從樣本處理到報告產出的完整一站式軟硬體整合平台。該方案已導入美國 Yale School of Medicine 及多家台灣主要醫學中心，並應用於通過美國病理學會（CAP）認證之臨床實驗室服務中，進一步鞏固奈捷在全球臨床精準檢測領域的專業地位與競爭優勢。
info.en:
INLab NGS Solution: Tihs automated  solution  is a fully automated, end-to-end next-generation sequencing (NGS) system designed to optimize precision medicine workflows and accelerate clinical decision-making. The platform delivers seamless integration across the entire process, ensuring accuracy, reproducibility, and efficiency for laboratories and healthcare providers.
The solution incorporates:
 A. iNA Automated Nucleic Acid Purification Platform – featuring automated FFPE deparaffinization and high-yield cfDNA extraction (up to 8cc) for superior purity.
B. iNA NGS Library Preparation Workstation – providing reliable, hands-free automation for complex library workflows.
C. High-Performance NGS Multiplex Panels – tailored for cancer monitoring, mutation detection, and therapy guidance.
D.  One-click CAP-certified Reporting Software – integrated with LIMS to generate standardized, actionable reports.

org.tc: 光玥實業有限公司

info.tc:
光玥(中國、台灣、新加坡)為專業特種材料加工製造廠，多年來在半導體玻璃晶圓MEMS特種玻璃加工、Biotech測序生物科學玻璃應用、車用LED封裝玻璃晶片、微流道反應器、鐳射光學產業、與各產業龍頭開發新產品。
    光玥專精於「玻璃微流道」，有別於市面上微流道材質，提供少量、多樣且客製化生產方案，其中，低螢光生物測序玻璃應用提供國外測序設備龍頭，採用先進制程，高潔淨清洗與包裝方式，全方位提供各類生物低螢光玻璃產品與微流道化學反應器，實現國內自給自足的生物測序玻璃晶片供應鏈。
info.en:
WaferPlus, starting from 1978, with factories located in China, Singapore, and Taiwan, a leading ISO 9001 and ISO 13485 certificated manufacturer, providing Cutting-edge solutions for products made by Glass, Quartz, Silicon, Sapphire, SiC, ALN, and Optical materials.
    Focusing on SEMI, BIO, MEMS, Microfluidic, Electronic Packaging, Optic-electronics, LED, Display, WaferPlus utilizes the advanced processing capabilities with Laser Invisible Cutting, Laser Drilling (0 chipping), Laser Marking, CNC, Dry Etching, Wet Etching, Grinding + Polishing, Anodic Bonding, Laser Direct Bonding, Glue Bonding, Optical coating, Ultrasonic Washing with Cleanroom Class 100, offering product dimensions from Dia. 50mm to Dia. 300mm based on Customized design.

org.tc: 凌陽科技股份有限公司
實芯生物股份有限公司

info.tc:
實芯生物
實芯生物前身為上市 IC 設計公司的生物晶片開發小組，於 2025 年 9 月正式獨立，現為位於新竹的新創公司。
團隊成員來自生命科學、電子工程與醫材開發等領域，結合生物技術與半導體優勢，專注於提供快速檢測流行病源的半導體生物晶片解決方案。
我們自主開發的 AttoSense 生物晶片檢測平台，包含可拋棄式生物檢測晶片、手持式檢測儀與自動化分析儀，可檢測核酸、蛋白及微生物。從樣品前處理到檢測結果，僅需 30 分鐘。精準、快速、便捷是我們產品的核心優勢。
實芯生物於 2024 年榮獲 國家新創獎，並於 2025 年獲 國家藥物獎銅獎 肯定。除了經濟動物流行病檢測，我們也持續研發人體健康應用，如 Albumin、cTnL 及 Cortisol 等生物標的物。
歡迎蒞臨 L603a 展位，親自了解我們的創新技術與產品。
info.en:
BIONIQUE
BIONIQUE, an independent startup since September 2025 in Hsinchu, Taiwan, develops fast and reliable semiconductor biochip solutions.
Our AttoSense Platform includes disposable biochips, a handheld reader, and an automated analyzer, detecting nucleic acids, proteins, and microorganisms in just 30 minutes.
Awarded the National Innovation Award (2024) and Bronze Medal of the National Pharmaceutical Award (2025), we advance applications in livestock epidemic detection and human health biomarkers. Visit us at Booth L603a to know more.

org.tc: 法德利科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
法德利科技的科學資訊事業：以超越原廠及業界標準服務品質，提供完整及在地化資訊與合規解決方案，是國內少數提供完整高端科學資訊服務的在地團隊。以科技產業為主，包含生技藥業、醫療服務、電子半導體、能源石化業等，提供從R、D、Q、到M一貫之資訊解決方案。產品及服務項目涵括--
＠製程、化學品配方之研發解決方案：生命與材料科研軟體及資料庫：委託研究／實驗室合規管理系統／系統整合維護與硬體資源提供
＠符合法規之電子系統確效與整合實驗研究成果之資訊解決方案：實驗室合規管理系統↙電腦系統確效服務／系統整合維護與硬體資源提供
＠合規的文檔及品質管理與臨床資訊解決方案：企業品質及文檔管理系統／電腦系統確效服務／電子送件提交系統／系統整合維護
＠數位轉型與數位連續：將工業自動化與合規場域進行完勝的結合
＠ESG智慧健康管理平台建置：協助醫護專注健康關懷與促進職業健康安全

info.en:
As a solution provider for digital transformation, VtR is dedicated to bringing cutting-edge informatics,intelligence,and data science solutions to its clients. Specializes in providing end-to-end informatics solutions encompassing Research,Development,Manufacturing and Quality,from it partners around the world to industries such as biopharma,chemical,material,andhi-ech.
Also provides full range of localized services including training,consulting,customization,and computerized system validation.

org.tc: 鼎峰科學有限公司

info.tc: PreciGenome 的 NanoGeneratorTM 使用微流體方法以連續模式合成納米顆粒。 該系統已廣泛應用於藥物遞送領域的各種應用，如脂質納米顆粒（LNP）、脂質體、PLGA納米顆粒等由於其對尺寸和形狀的出色控制，通過微流控技術合成納米顆粒比傳統的批量合成更具有優勢。從實驗室藥物篩選開發到臨床研究GMP等級，滿足客戶不同需求。
info.en:
NanoGenerator® is a high-performance nanoparticle synthesis system for formulation and preparation of nanoparticles, including lipid nanoparticles (LNPs), liposomes, PLGA, etc. Lipid nanoparticle synthesis is the process of creating lipid nanoparticles, a type of drug delivery system that encapsulates therapeutic molecules in a lipid shell. LNP synthesis plays a crucial role in drug delivery and therapeutics. 
NanoGenerator produces nanoparticles with improved size uniformity and lower polydispersity index (PDI). It offers scalable production, ranging from ultra-low volumes of 0.1 mL for early-stage screening to large-scale batch production of hundreds of liters, enabling seamless, continuous GMP-compliant manufacturing.

org.tc: 卡洛生物醫藥股份有限公司

info.tc: 卡洛是開發新式Chimeric antigen receptor T cell (CAR-T)的細胞治療新創公司，秉持著追求卓越的精神，逐步補足現有CAR-T的弱點。卡洛的首發產品開發方向是針對B細胞淋巴癌的自體CAR-T，我們選擇的腫瘤標的抗原，不論是否已經接受CD19 CAR-T的治療或是產生CD19 CAR-T抗藥性，皆可適用。此外，我們亦透過雙重嵌合抗原受體(Dual CAR with OR gate)的方式進一步改善腫瘤微環境並降低腫瘤逃脫的可能性。

org.tc: 巨晶科技有限公司

info.tc: 紫外線消毒技術是一種乾淨，無毒的滅菌方式，它採用純物理殺菌，利用UVC 波長範圍內的紫外線照射，可瞬間破壞細菌病毒的DNA 及RNA 令其喪失活力及繁殖能力，該技術常運用於醫院，實驗室等科技領域。敝公司致力於紫外線滅菌產品及技術研發，提供消費者高品質的紫外線滅菌產品：紫外線手持式滅菌燈、點鈔機除菌裝置、紫外線拖把式滅菌燈、紫外線空間滅菌燈、空氣/空間二合一除菌機。
info.en: Ultraviolet (UV) disinfection technology is a clean, non-toxic sterilization method that uses purely physical germicidal action. By emitting UV rays within the UVC wavelength range, it can instantly disrupt the DNA and RNA of bacteria and viruses, rendering them inactive and unable to reproduce. This technology is commonly used in hospitals and laboratories. Our company specializes in developing UV sterilization products, offering high-quality solutions to consumers, including: UV Portable Light、UVC Light Bar for Money Counter、 UVC Germ Sweeper Mop、 UVC sterilization light、 Air/space two-in-one sterilizer。
