org.tc: 台灣國際虹膜學學會

info.tc:
台灣國際虹膜學學會(TIIMA)成立於2011年，致力於推動台灣虹膜學學術、臨床和技術發展。該學會作為研究、專業培訓和跨學科合作中心，旨在將虹膜學融入現代實證醫療保健。
虹膜學是一種非侵入性評估方法，透過分析虹膜圖案、紋理和色素沉澱(例如：凹坑、裂縫、斑塊、線條和色彩）來評估一個人生理狀態。歷史上人們觀察到虹膜和鞏膜能夠反映人體內部健康狀況。TIIMA秉持這項傳統，結合嚴謹的臨床方法和現代資料分析技術。
info.en: Taiwan International Iridology Medical Association (TIIMA), established in 2011, is committed to advancing the academic, clinical, and technological development of Iridology in Taiwan. The association serves as a hub for scientific research, professional training, and cross-disciplinary collaboration, with the goal of integrating Iridology into modern evidence-based healthcare systems.

org.tc: 瑞光生醫科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
瑞光生醫公司因應全球憂鬱症人口日益增加，結合高階醫療器材研發能力與腦健康的未來趨勢，經多年研究成功開發國內第一台忘憂磁波專治憂鬱症的TMS經顱磁刺激治療儀，於2025年獲衛福部核發二類醫材上市許可（衛部醫器製字第008433號）。
此儀器利用高密度的脈衝磁波，對大腦進行可多方案的治療設定(rTMS 及 Deep TMS等open mode)磁激治療，除了專為藥物治療無效的重度憂鬱症成人病患設計，採非侵入性、高安全性的重複性磁刺激技術的治療方式，更是醫療單位對腦健康(治療或預防失眠/失智症/阿茲海默症/帕金森氏症…等)研究的利器。
相較於市面上動輒好幾百萬的TMS進口設備，「MagRenu TMS」具備台製科技優質化，與價格優勢，讓中小型醫療機構也能負擔，擴大憂鬱症治療的普及化。經多項效能比對測試，「MagRenu TMS」展現超越國際同類產品的表現，已成功吸引多家醫學中心各大院所與神經科醫師實地測試使用與評估。
瑞光生醫期望透過此創新儀器，協助醫師及研究單位更多患者獲得平價、有效的照護，改善生活品質，減輕家庭與社會負擔。
info.en: MagRenu TMS—combining advanced medical engineering with brain health innovation. Approved by Taiwan’s Ministry of Health and Welfare in 2025 (License No. 008433), MagRenu TMS delivers high-density magnetic pulses through open mode for customizable treatment modes. It is designed for adults with major depressive disorder who do not respond to medication, offering a non-invasive, safe, and repeatable therapy. Beyond depression, it supports research into insomnia, dementia, Alzheimer’s, and Parkinson’s disease. Compared to costly international TMS systems, MagRenu TMS is compact, affordable, and locally optimized, making it accessible to smaller clinics. Performance tests show it surpasses global competitors, earning interest from medical centers and neurologists. Vision Renu Corporation aims to empower healthcare providers with this innovative tool to deliver effective, affordable care and improve patients’ quality of life.

info.tc: 「小型企業創新研發計畫」(Small Business Innovation Research, SBIR)，是由經濟部推動的一項政策，旨在鼓勵國內中小企業進行創新技術或產品的研發。 計畫目標是提升中小企業的產業競爭力，並促進國家整體經濟的發展。SBIR計劃提供資金和輔導，協助中小企業投入新技術、新產品和新服務的研發，加速創新成果商品化。
info.en: The “Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR)” program, promoted by the Ministry of Economic Affairs, is a policy initiative aimed at encouraging domestic small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) to conduct research and development of innovative technologies or products. The goal of the program is to enhance the industrial competitiveness of SMEs and promote the overall economic development of the nation. The SBIR program provides funding and guidance to assist SMEs in developing new technologies, products, and services, thereby accelerating the commercialization of innovative outcomes.

org.tc: 鈺邦機械工業有限公司

info.tc:
鈺邦機械自1994年創立工廠以來，都以台灣做為生產基地，所有產品皆在自家工廠100%生產製造。2009年將原本的兩家關係企業品牌VACTRONICS及KWAKE合併並改組為 “鈺邦機械工業有限公司”。本公司備有20多台精密CNC電腦設備來加工管控無油葉片式及無油活塞式真空泵浦零件的精度，以達到真空泵浦的精密度及標準化要求。30年來，我們專門生產的無油葉片式真空泵浦 (DV、RV系列)、無油活塞式真空泵浦 (DP、MP、SP、JP、JPL系列) 及無油活塞式空氣壓縮機，已經被廣泛地應用在各行各業，如: 自動化設備、產業用機械、食品真空包裝、光電半導體、醫療製藥及印刷事務機等用途。
近年來，我們針對半導體、實驗儀器及化學製程的特殊應用開發了多款PTFE材質之耐酸鹼無油隔膜式真空泵 (DA、GA、KA系列)，此系列隔膜式泵浦可專門處理製程中產生的腐蝕性氣體。
30年來累積的多年紮實技術及實務經驗，除了供應標準規格品之外，我們也提供客製化產品 (CUSTOMIZED)。我們不僅是日本企業長期配合之OEM廠商，也提供歐美多個國家的貼牌服務 (OEM LABELING)。
我們一貫秉持著專業、品質、性能、服務、誠信、迅速等六大理念來管理與經營，成為台灣真空泵浦製造業的領導者。我們堅持提供客戶優良的產品與完善的服務，與客戶共同創造更好的利潤及商機並建立有優勢的供應鏈。
info.en:
Since its founding in 1994, Yu Bang Machinery has maintained its manufacturing base in Taiwan, with all products manufactured 100% in-house. In 2009, the company merged its two affiliated brands, VACTRONICS and KWAKE, to form Yu Bang Machinery Industrial Co., Ltd. The company utilizes over 20 precision CNC machines to precisely control the accuracy of oil-free vane and piston vacuum pump components, ensuring the highest precision and highest standardization. For 30 years, our specialized production of oil-free vane vacuum pumps (DV, RV series), oil-free piston vacuum pumps (DP, MP, SP, JP, JPL series), and oil-free piston air compressors has been widely used in various industries, such as: automation equipment, industrial machinery, food vacuum packaging, optoelectronic semiconductors, medical and pharmaceutical, and printing office machines.
In recent years, we have developed a variety of acid- and alkali-resistant, oil-free PTFE diaphragm vacuum pumps (DA, GA, and KA series) for specialized applications in semiconductors, laboratory instruments, and chemical processes. These diaphragm pumps are specifically designed to handle the corrosive gases generated during manufacturing processes.
With 30 years of accumulated solid technology and practical experience, we not only supply standard products, but also offer customized products. We are not only a long-term OEM partner for Japanese companies, but also provide OEM labeling services in various countries in Europe and the United States.
We consistently uphold the six core principles of professionalism, quality, performance, service, integrity, and efficiency in our management and operations, becoming a leader in Taiwan's vacuum pump manufacturing industry. We are committed to providing customers with superior products and comprehensive services, working with them to create greater profits and business opportunities while establishing a competitive supply chain.

org.tc: 宏庭科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 宏庭科技為「多雲整合專家」，是 Google Cloud 最高等級合作夥伴，以及阿里雲(Alibaba Cloud)、微軟 Azure 金級合作夥伴，可依客戶產業特性與需求，提供最佳雲端解決方案。 從 2007 年創立至今具有 10 年以上豐富產業經驗與深厚技術力，在台灣、香港皆設有據點，服務超過 1,000 間海內外指標性客戶，如信義房屋、飛利浦、東森新聞、和泰汽車、威合股份有限公司等。成立至今獲獎無數，近期更榮獲美國 CIO 雜誌評選為亞太區前10大雲端服務商，肯定宏庭在雲整合領域的專業價值。 我們擁有多平台認證架構師及國內外經驗豐富團隊，熟悉各大雲端平台與在地機房特性，可提供企業一站式雲端解決方案。給予企業最專業的 7 x 24 雲端技術服務與支援，服務範疇涵蓋 GCP、阿里雲、微軟 Azure 公有雲遷移/代管/技術支援/系統成本優化、混合雲建置、IDC機房代管、Goolge Worckspace 辦公軟體/企業信箱、大數據應用等，為新世代企業數位轉型首選！ 歡迎與我們聯繫：02-8502-0816 #844\
info.en:
Microfusion has one of the most comprehensive portfolios of cloud solutions, we are partners of Google Cloud, Alibaba Cloud, Tencent Cloud, and Azure. We strive to help you find the right cloud solution as you build digital transformations for your businesses.
We provide customized one-stop solutions and cloud integration strategies with specialization in Big data analysis, AI-driven applications, corporate mailbox and collaboration to help you make better decisions.
Microfusion is undoubtedly your first choice for corporate digital transformation, leading you to the China market and expanding your business in the world.

org.tc: 新穎生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
DNlite檢測法 
目前世界上可較早檢驗出糖尿病腎病變的方法

2011年於歐洲腎病醫學會發表，五家醫學中心以上、超過兩千名患者做過此檢測。

本方法是利用非侵入式尿液檢測，經由檢驗尿液中相關的生物標記，可早期檢出糖尿病腎病變，是糖尿病腎病變的量化指標，可用以監控糖尿病腎病變的嚴重程度，有助於幫助醫生與患者擬定個人化的健康管理與治療方案。
info.en:
Unmet Need:
A new DKD biomarker as better predictor to identify patients who will progress
 
Current diagnosis of Diabetic Kidney Disease (DKD) relies on test of Urine Albuminuria-to-Creatinine Ratio (UACR) and estimation of GFR (eGFR), but these cannot meet the required sensitivity and specificity. Furthermore, both UACR and eGFR cannot predict and identify DKD patients who will progress, it is crucial for DKD management.

org.tc: 延世科醫股份有限公司

info.tc: reviExo LABS Exosome推出創新外泌體+PDRN二合一產品，為肌膚護理帶來新突破。外泌體是由細胞分泌的奈米囊泡，負責細胞間的訊息傳遞，涵蓋蛋白質、遺傳物質等關鍵信息。它們猶如「快遞員」，確保目標細胞精準接收重要訊息。reviExo LABS的外泌體從大馬士革玫瑰幹細胞中萃取，與PDRN結合，後者是從玫瑰中提取，具有高度相似於人體DNA的特性，能深入肌膚底層修護，減少發炎並增強肌膚屏障。這款產品利用奈米技術，將重要分子安全且有效地傳遞至目標細胞，提供穩定肌膚、延緩衰老的功效。它能改善痤瘡、皺紋、毛孔及膚色不均等問題，提升肌膚的細緻透亮。搭配微針電波、雷射等療程，不僅加速術後恢復，還能增強治療效果。此產品特別適合需要快速修復和改善肌膚質感的人群。reviExo LABS 致力於提供可持續、環保的美容解決方案，通過創新科技和高效成分，塑造健康肌膚的新標準，滿足現代人對精緻護膚的需求。這款產品不僅在功能上實現突破，更在環保和可持續性上樹立了新的標杆。
info.en: reviExo LABS Exosome introduces an innovative Exosome + PDRN dual-action product. Exosomes, as key cellular messengers, combined with non-animal sourced PDRN from roses, offer superior skin repair and anti-aging benefits. Our product uses nanotechnology to safely deliver vital molecules to target cells. It effectively stabilizes skin, delays aging, and improves skin issues. When used with microneedling, lasers, and other treatments, it accelerates post-procedure recovery and enhances therapeutic effects. reviExo LABS is committed to sustainable, eco-friendly beauty solutions, setting a new standard for skin health.

info.en: Hamamatsu Photonics K.K. is a leading manufacturer of devices for the generation and measurement of visible, infrared, and ultraviolet light. These devices include photomultipliers, photodiodes, infrared detectors, image sensors, scientific cameras, and light sources.

org.tc: 和鑫生技開發股份有限公司

info.tc: 和鑫生技一直以來致力於單能光研發、生產及製造，運用Nanoray單能光技術優勢，有效降低醫學成像的輻射劑量，透過更小的功率需求及更大的拍攝角度，提供人們尤其是兒童更安全、快速及經濟的成像選擇。RevoluX是國內自製全球唯一的低輻射手部X光機，已正式通過台灣、美國及東南亞多個國家FDA認証，可應用於兒童骨齡、成人骨密篩檢及各種手部骨骼疾病的（輔助）診斷。Nanoray為解決嬰幼兒(0~3歲)在影像診斷中，一直存在X光輻射劑量過多的問題，正積極開發嬰幼兒專用x光機及即時移動影像(Fluro)X光機，來減少嬰幼兒檢查時接收的輻射劑量。展望未來可開發出多樣針對兒童、婦女專用的X光機型，提供更優質的醫療影像診斷服務。
info.en: NanoRay Biotech Co. has been devoted to research and developments of patented transmission X-ray technology. By generating a monochromatic spectrum with a specific niche of beam energy, contributing to higher image contract, lower energy consumption and decreased absorbing dosage for patients, the transmission X-ray tube can provide a much safer, faster and more affordable choice in medical imaging, especially in the pediatric field. As the world’s first “Made- in- Taiwan” low energy hand X-ray device and has been officially certified by the FDA in Taiwan, the United States and many Southeast Asian countries. It can be used for children's bone age, adult bone density screening and diagnosis of various hand bone diseases. To solve the problem of excessive X-ray radiation dose in imaging diagnosis of infants (0-3 years old), NanoRay is actively developing X-ray machines for infants and real-time mobile imaging (Fluro) X-ray machines to reduce the radiation dose received by infants during examinations. Looking into the future, we will develop various X-ray machines specifically for children and women to provide better medical imaging diagnostic services.

org.tc: 展市華科技有限公司

info.tc: 本公司開發的人工智慧通用推論平台是一套高效、彈性且可擴展的 AI 解決方案，適用於影像辨識、自然語言處理、數據預測等多元場景。平台支援主流深度學習框架並整合異質系統，提供低延遲、高吞吐的推論效能。採模組化設計與 API 介面，協助快速部署模型至雲端、邊緣或本地端，靈活應對跨平台需求。內建資源調度與負載平衡功能，有效提升營運效率，助力企業加速 AI 應用落地與數位轉型。另推出病房運輸機器人，專為醫療院所設計，具備自主導航、智慧避障與語音互動功能，可高效、安全地運送藥品與醫療器材。結合多感測器融合技術與語音控制，提升操作便利性與物流效率。支援院內系統整合，任務管理與回報即時，並符合感染控制規範，易於清潔消毒，是智慧醫療與人力優化的理想工具。
info.en: Our AI Universal Inference Platform is a high-performance, flexible, and scalable solution designed for diverse applications, including image recognition, natural language processing, and data prediction. It supports major deep learning frameworks and integrates heterogeneous systems to deliver low-latency, high-throughput inference. With modular design and API interfaces, models can be rapidly deployed across cloud, edge, or on-premises environments, enabling seamless cross-platform integration. Built-in resource scheduling and load balancing optimize operational efficiency and support digital transformation. We also offer a hospital delivery robot tailored for medical environments. Equipped with autonomous navigation, smart obstacle avoidance, and voice interaction, it safely and efficiently transports medications and medical supplies. With sensor fusion and voice control, it enhances user experience and logistics efficiency. The system integrates with hospital IT systems for real-time task management and meets infection control standards—an ideal tool for smart healthcare and staff optimization.

org.tc: 南臺科技大學 智慧健康醫療科技中心
org.en: Southern Taiwan University of Science and Technology Center for Intelligent Healthcare

info.tc:
智慧健康醫療科技中心著重於「近床照護」及「智慧輔具」的相關開發與應用，並配合政府智慧健康政策，研究議題集中至在宅醫療(Hospital at home, HaH)。本中心研發之創新技術及應用，涵蓋健康監測、復健輔助、互動體驗、資訊整合、及AR應用等5大方向。
【本次展品】
●AR沉浸式心肺復甦術訓練系統
本中心之研發團隊開發創新AR沉浸式心肺復甦術訓練系統突破傳統CPR教學限制，結合擴增實境(AR)智慧眼鏡與精密感測技術，為學員提供前所未有的沉浸式培訓體驗。 
〈核心特色〉 
1. 沉浸式AR視覺教學：透過AR智慧眼鏡呈現立體3D動畫指導流程，讓學員彷彿置身真實急救現場。採用佐臻J7EF Gaze雙眼近眼顯示器，呈現5公尺外120吋視覺效果的立體3D動畫指導。
2. 即時智慧回饋：精準監測按壓力道、頻率及深度，提供即時數據分析與評分。精度小於1度的眼動追蹤技術，60Hz凝視點輸出，確保最佳學習專注度。 
3. 互動式學習體驗：結合視覺、觸覺與聽覺的多感官學習模式。精準監測按壓力道、頻率及深度，結合ToF傳感器手勢辨識，提供即時數據分析與評分4. 量化學習成效：科學化評估學習成果，雲端記錄學習歷程。
●戶外骨折救護組
本中心之研發團隊開發的低溫可塑性固定材料，兼具輕薄、高強度與優異的價格競爭力，並搭配可攜式加熱裝置，能迅速定型使用，大幅擴展了骨折救護產品的應用場域。無論是在軍事演習、地震救援、登山意外，或是公共場所的緊急應變，皆為各類救護單位的理想配備。
info.en:
Center for Intelligent Healthcare focuses on the development and application of "near-bed care" and "smart assistive devices." In alignment with the government's smart healthcare policies, our research is concentrated on Hospital at Home (HaH). The center's innovative technologies and applications encompass five major areas: health monitoring, rehabilitation assistance, interactive experiences, information integration, and AR applications.
●AR Immersive CPR Training System
This innovative AR Immersive CPR Training System breaks through traditional CPR teaching limitations by integrating Augmented Reality (AR) smart glasses with precision sensor technology, providing trainees with an unprecedented immersive training experience.
〈Core Features〉
1. Immersive AR Visual Learning: Delivers 3D animated guidance through AR smart glasses, immersing trainees in realistic emergency scenarios. Utilizes JORJIN J7EF Gaze dual near-eye displays to present 3D animated instructions with a 120-inch visual experience at 5 meters.
2. Real-time Intelligent Feedback: Precisely monitors compression force, frequency, and depth, providing instant data analysis and scoring. Features sub-1-degree precision eye tracking technology with 60Hz gaze point output to ensure optimal learning focus.
3. Interactive Learning Experience: Combines multi-sensory learning through visual, tactile, and auditory elements. Accurately monitors compression force, frequency, and depth, integrating ToF sensor gesture recognition for real-time data analysis and scoring.
4. Quantified Learning Outcomes: Scientifically assesses learning results with cloud-based learning progress recording.
●FlexArmor™ Outdoor Trauma Kit
Our team has developed a low-temperature moldable splint material that is lightweight, high-strength, and highly cost-effective. Paired with a portable heating device for rapid shaping, this solution greatly expands the scope of emergency fracture care. Ideal for military drills, earthquake response, hiking accidents, and public emergency situations—an essential tool for all rescue units.

org.tc: 台灣邦妮有限公司

info.tc:
源自於對截肢後不適的保護…
1969年，德裔加拿大籍弗瑞德.侃培(Frieder Kempe)先生致力於研發Farabloc柏克肢體裝具，其原始動機乃是試圖以物理、非侵入性方式給予截肢父親舒適的保護。
侃培先生巧妙應用法拉第籠原理(Faraday cage)，應用高科技超細金屬纖維與尼龍纖維特殊結構交織成的功能性布料，第一個原型成品於1978年正式問世，這項產品即為Farabloc柏克，可方便應用在任何需要保護的肢體。不僅提供截肢患者極佳的保護舒緩功能，其他如：運動訓練保護、肌肉傷害保護輔助、手術後保護、慢性症保護輔助等，都建議使用Farabloc柏克來改善肢體不適的狀態。多年來，Farabloc柏克已贏得多項國際學會與保健團體的肯定。
info.en:
Canada Farabloc Rehabilitation Series
Protection for post-operative care, sports injuries, muscle injuries, and chronic injuries.

org.tc: 捷格科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 數位化、自動化、智慧化與AI輔助正重塑醫療服務，提升效率與品質已成為必要。捷格科技深耕醫療數位創新 25 年，服務台灣 80% 大型醫院，技術領先業界，從病歷管理到智慧醫院與AI應用系統，提供安全、高效、可擴展的先進醫療解決方案。*AI智慧醫院方案：打造出亞洲第一家智慧醫院，超過六家醫學中心導入捷格科技智慧病房與智慧醫院方案，並協助客戶醫院取得多項智慧醫院標章。*第五代智慧手術方案：提升手術室經營績效與確保醫療品質，客戶實證採用捷格智慧手術管理方案，手術室經營效率可提高達 30%。*AI智慧病理追蹤方案：配合專利硬體全自動追綜流程，實現即時性與精準性，提升醫療品質。*AI智慧住院排程系統：運用領先AI運算與數據分析技術，全面整合候床患者名單、床位轉換需求…，能夠以高效AI演算法，大幅減少人工操作負擔。*AI電子病歷方案：簡化審查流程，可專注於更高層次作業，提升整體病歷及報告比質。
info.en: Digitalization, automation, intelligence, and AI-assisted technologies are reshaping healthcare services, making efficiency and quality improvements essential. Jager Tech has been deeply engaged in medical innovation for more than 25 years, serving 80% of Taiwan’s major hospitals with industry-leading technology.• AI Smart Hospital Solutions：Jager Tech helped establish the first smart hospital in Asia. More than six medical centers have adopted Jager Tech’s smart ward and smart hospital solutions, achieving multiple smart hospital certifications.• 5th-Generation Smart Surgery Solutions：Enhancing operating room efficiency and ensuring medical quality, Jager Tech’s smart surgery management system has been proven to improve operating room efficiency by up to 30%.• AI Smart Pathology Tracking Solution：Utilizing patented hardware for fully automated tracking, this solution ensures real-time accuracy, improving overall medical quality.• AI Smart Inpatient Scheduling System：Leveraging advanced AI computation and data analytics, this system integrates patient waiting lists and bed transition needs. Its high-efficiency AI algorithm significantly reduces manual workload.• AI Mobile Electronic Medical Records：Simplifies review processes, allowing medical professionals to focus on higher-level assessments, improving overall record and report quality.

info.tc: 博鑫醫電是全球第一家整合多維度生命體徵之平台型生理監視器，包括電性訊號(心電、腦電)、光學訊號(血氧、溫度)、氣體(血壓)、聲音(聽診器心肺音)、影像(超音波、五官鏡)、血液(血糖)等等，透過4G/5G行動網路，傳遞原始參數，包括波型、影像、數據等，至醫療相關場域，供流程優化、病例文件自動化、及AI診斷等相關應用使用。除了院內場域使用，更可延伸至到院前緊急救護、居家醫療、長照、遠距醫療等新興場域。
info.en: BROADSIMS is the first to provide an app-installable 5G vital sign solution defined with the key technology Platform as a Medical Device (PaMD), including ECG, SpO₂, and NIBP functions. The platform allows third parties to install their own apps and access raw data. All measurement history is available at any time, creating a smart medical ecosystem.

info.tc:
擁有超過 40 年手術室設備的專業經驗，Mediland 持續致力於提升使用者體驗。我們突破性的雙反射專利技術，透過多重反射設計，帶來業界最溫和的手術照明。
OceanLED 採用專利環狀光源搭配雙反射設計，能精準聚焦光線，並將光均勻分布於手術視野，即使是在深層的手術腔體中，也能確保卓越的可視性。多重反射過程可柔化光線，減少強烈對比與陰影產生，營造出兼具清晰度、舒適度與專注力的理想視覺環境。
info.en:
With over 40 years of expertise in operating room equipment, Mediland remains committed to enhancing user experience. Our revolutionary patented double reflector technology, engineered to reflect light multiple times, delivers the gentlest surgical illumination in the industry. 
OceanLED lighting system is a patented ring-light source paired with a double reflector system. This sophisticated design enables light to be precisely focused and evenly distributed across the surgical field, ensuring exceptional visibility, even in challenging, deep surgical cavities. The multi-reflection process softens illumination, reduces harsh contrasts, and minimizes shadow formation, creating a visual environment optimized for clarity, comfort, and focus.

info.tc:
產品項目：變頻生物光子機
變頻生物光子機的核心技術機制：
1. 光子針灸：融合《黃帝內經》經絡理論與光生物調節（PBM）
，透過特定穴位精準照射，達到系統性調控。
2. 粒線體類光合作用：光子能激活粒線體色素，提升 ATP 生成。
3. 細胞膜電位調控：增強細胞極化狀態，促進離子通道功能與幹細胞分化。 
4. 結構水活化：促進 EZ 水形成，改善細胞能量代謝與毒素排除。
5. 靜電導出：清除病灶累積靜電與自由基，降低炎症與疼痛。
變頻生物光子機的使用價值：
1. 透過光子針灸與頻率共振，重啟細胞電壓、活化粒線體、促進幹細胞再生，恢復健康基礎。
2. 協助用戶預防亞健康與慢性病，減少醫療支出，建立居家的長期健康管理。
3. 改善睡眠、提升專注力與能量循環，幫助用戶維持高效能與高生活品質。
4. 可應用於癌症治療、慢性疾病管理、神經修復、疼痛緩解，以及醫美。
5. 無需藥物、無創傷、無副作用，能讓使用者安心長期使用。
info.en:

info.en: Simple Protein is the first brand in Taiwan to receive the Clean Label Certificate for whey protein. With third-party certification, consumers can trust and use it with confidence, knowing they are getting the highest quality protein. It has a great taste without chemical aftertastes—available in mildly sweet flavor and a no-sugar, unsweetened option. Perfect for health-conscious fitness enthusiasts looking to build muscle, especially suitable for women and the elderly. It’s a natural, tasty whey protein!

info.tc:
明源橡膠創立於1978年5月，工廠位於台灣中部 (台中港科技產業園區)，現為亞太區最大橡膠彈性體製造商之一。
主要產品為
1)   天然膠和人造膠平面板帶 (應用於泳衣、成衣、運動服、口罩、床罩、醫療用止血 
    帶、防塵套、防塵帽等)
2)   天然膠壓紋板帶 (應用於泳衣、成衣、瑜珈服、床罩等)
3)   人造壓紋止血帶
4)   客製化彈性體產品，如TPU/TPR (應用於成衣、休閒服、運動服等) 、
    NBR (應用於瓦斯管防洩漏用)、耐燃橡膠產品等

明源橡膠為ISO 9001: 2015管理系統合格的供應商，且所有使用的化學品和所供應的產品均符合Oeko-Tex Standard 100 Class 1 and Europe REACH 的規範

我們主要的客戶大都為生產消耗性和工業用產品的世界知名泳衣、成衣、運動服、休閒服、口罩、床罩、防塵套、防塵帽等製造商。
我們深信客戶的成長也是帶領明源橡膠成功的重要關鍵因素，所以我們本著熱誠、服務客戶以追求及建立長久的合作關係。
info.en:
Min Yuen Rubber, founded in May 1978, located in central part of Taiwan (Taichung City), is one of the largest rubbery and elastomeric accessory manufacturers in the Asia-Pacific Region.

Mainly manufactures natural and synthetic (latex-free), smooth and textured (ribbed) rubber tapes, threads, loop bands, sheets, tubes and customized elastomeric TPU/TPR, NBR products. 

Our factory is qualified with ISO 9001: 2015 management system.
All chemicals applied meet the Europe REACH Regulations and our products are Oeko-Tex Standard 100 Class 1 certified.

Majority of our customers now are world leading suppliers in diverse range of consumer/industrial products. 

We believe that our customers\' growth is the key element to our success, and so we are always PASSIONATE in serving customer requirements in pursuit of long-term co-operation and partnership.

info.tc: 安搏生體外反搏裝置” A/ECP_A1簡稱EECP， 全機台灣自行研發製造，一體成形，以心電訊號R波為觸發信號，同步控制氣囊在心臟舒張早期，氣囊由遠至近依序加壓，讓下肢血液回流。在心臟收縮期前，氣囊迅速排氣受壓的肢體血管開放，從而減少週邊循環阻力，減輕心臟負荷及減少心肌耗氧量。EECP在臨床試驗證實有效治癒心血管疾病。
info.en:
“AMBERSAN External counter-pulsation device” 
A/ECP_A1, (abbrev. EECP) is a new version of a counter-pulsation device that is developed and manufactured in Taiwan. Using ECG R-wave as the trigger signal, it synchronously controls the cuffs at an early diastolic period. 
The cuff pressurizes orderly from the peripheral vessels to the central vessels, enabling the blood flow of the lower limb to return. Before the systolic stage, the cuff (including the bladder) deflates rapidly to open up the pressured vessels of the limbs, to decrease the peripheral circulation resistance and the load to the heart, thereby reducing heart load and reduce myocardial oxygen consumption.
EECP has been proven effective in curing cardiovascular diseases in clinical trials.

info.tc: Halcyon™ 系統可提供您快速高品質療程所需的簡潔介面，且提供病患戰勝癌症時所需的舒適與便利性。憑藉著Halcyon革命性創新，我們將100%影像導航服務納入治療流程，同時透過最新疊代式影像導航放射治療iCBCT的高品質，同時縮短治療時間為傳統的一半，提供高品質、簡易操作並且患者為中心的出發點進行放射治療環境的優化及改善。
info.en: The Halcyon™ system offers a streamlined interface for delivering fast, high-quality treatments, while providing the comfort and convenience that patients need to overcome cancer. With Halcyon’s revolutionary innovation, we have integrated 100% image-guided service into the treatment process, utilizing the latest iterative image-guided radiation therapy (iCBCT) for high-quality imaging. This significantly reduces treatment time to half of traditional methods, optimizing and enhancing the radiation therapy environment with a focus on high quality, ease of use, and patient-centered care.

org.tc: 昱星生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
昱星生技攜手國內外合作夥伴，打造整合自動化設備與製程的 iPSC 全方位解決方案，同時前瞻布局以人類誘導性多能幹細胞（iPSC）技術為核心的創新細胞療法。這些療法有望顛覆現有醫療模式，為帕金森氏症、阿茲海默症等神經退化性疾病、慢性腎臟病及癌症帶來突破性的治療契機。  
 
除了細胞療法之外，昱星生技還擁有iPSC和基於活細胞生物影像的高通量藥物篩選平台，用於開發新藥。該平台利用iPSC創建疾病模型進行藥物發現和篩選，以更準確和高效地識別潛在的候選藥物。應用上除了可提供藥廠及 CRO 公司做大規模的新藥開發及毒性測試，此平台亦應用於高效能精準化、個人化醫療之服務。目前在心血管疾病及神經退化性疾病的部分已經商品化，可提供篩檢服務以及技術授權。
info.en:
LumisTAR partners with leading companies worldwide to deliver end-to-end iPSC automation solutions and pioneer next-generation cell therapies. Our innovations in iPSC technology aim to transform treatment for neurodegenerative diseases, CKD, and cancer. 
 
Other than cell therapy, LumiSTAR also equipped with iPSC and bioimaging-based high throughput drug screening platform to develop new drugs. The platform uses iPSC to create disease models for drug discovery and screening, allowing for more accurate and efficient identification of potential drug candidates. LumiSTAR’s drug screening platform can apply on phenotypic screening, drug discovery, toxicity testing, and precision/personalized medicine.

info.tc: 「中部國際醫療中心」是一所具備國際水準的醫療機構。本院持續導入最先進的醫療設備與治療技術，結合高專業水準的醫療團隊，致力於提供精緻且高滿意度的醫療服務。本院主要特色之一是癌症治療。在質子治療方面，全日本首度導入來自美國瓦里安公司所製的全球最先進治療設備「ProBeam360°」。360度旋轉，搭配「點掃描技術」，可更精準地針對腫瘤進行治療。此外，我們也提供心臟與腦部疾病的治療，特別是針對帕金森氏症等導致手部顫抖的疾病，引進無需開刀的「聚焦超音波治療」，為患者帶來了全新的希望。本院在健康檢查與癌症篩檢方面投入大量心力，透過先進儀器與專業的醫療團隊，提供精準的診斷。我們採用PET/CT掃描設備，以及全球首創的乳房專用PET設備，大幅提升癌症檢查的準確度，有助於疾病的早期偵測與治療。本院地處大都會與大自然交會之地，兼具城市的便利與日本自然風光的療癒魅力。豐富的傳統文化與匠心獨具的工藝技術，可深入體驗日本最原始的生活精神與文化底蘊。
info.en:
Central Japan International Medical Center is located in the heart of Japan. We provide care that meets global quality standards. We invest in state-of-the-art medical equipment and committed to high-quality care and patient satisfaction. 
Our expertise is cancer treatment. We are the first hospital in Japan to install a state-of-the-art \

info.tc:
福芯科技具電子電路開發的核心技術以及高頻率通訊的研發能力，開發全球第一個【居家電療復健解決方案】，能記錄每位個案的運動紀錄和電療模式使用次數、強度、時間，透過日誌追蹤用戶的使用習慣和模式。且重量只有100公克，可隨時隨地使用。
UGYM Pocket IF5000 電刺激器由兩部分組成：袖珍電療設備，可讓使用者隨時隨地接受治療；自我管理應用程式，可讓醫療專業人員跟進護理人員和患者的情況。可編程模式可以透過付費應用程式升級。
此外，其簡單的使用者介面使用戶能夠輕鬆操作設備，節省時間和金錢，並促進快速恢復。預估2025年從台灣走向國際復健市場。
你值得有更好的電療日記和復健運動的生活型態。
info.en:
UGYM Pocket IF5000 Stimulator comprises two components: a pocket electrotherapy device that allows users to receive treatment anytime, anywhere, and cloud data that enables medical professionals to follow up with caregivers and patients. 
Additionally, its simple user interface enables users to operate the device conveniently, saving time and money, and facilitating quick recovery. 2025 will enter US rehabilitation market.
You deserve a better electrotherapy journey and rehab exercise lifestyle

org.tc: 歐立達股份有限公司

info.tc:
FOOTDISC富足康科技由德國與台灣專業團隊共同研發，致力於提供足部舒適支撐與日常活動協助方案，推出三大主力產品：科技足墊、舒壓坐墊與2025年全新舒壓拖鞋，打造從走路、站立到坐姿的整體照護體驗。
科技足墊｜2020–2022優良輔具品牌優勝
依據足型與腿型設計，運用3D立體足弓片與彈性材質，提供足部支撐與壓力分散機制。產品應用已廣泛見於運動、職場與長者活動等多種場域，並有多所學術機構進行使用成效的觀察與研究。
舒壓坐墊｜2023–2024優良輔具品牌優勝
具備對折便攜、空氣導流與多重支撐特性，可依不同使用情境（如久坐、外出、靜坐、辦公等）選擇合適方式搭配使用。研究指出，其在臀部壓力分布表現上展現良好特性。
舒壓拖鞋（2025新品）｜內建專利防水足墊
本款拖鞋內建專利足弓片結構與防水材質鞋墊，適合日常居家或潮濕環境穿著，具備支撐、穩定與清潔便利等多重設計考量，提供穿著時的舒適體驗。
info.en:
FOOTDISC Biomechanical Support Series
FOOTDISC combines German-Taiwanese expertise to create innovative support solutions for everyday life. Our core products include:
Foot Support Insoles (2020–2022 Excellent Assistive Device Winner):
Designed with patented 3D arch plates and adaptive materials to provide structural support and enhance daily movement comfort.
Pressure-Relieving Seat Cushions (2023–2024 Excellent Assistive Device Winner):
Lightweight, foldable, and breathable—ideal for office, travel, and leisure activities.
2025 New Comfort Slippers with Waterproof Insoles:
Feature built-in patented arch support for comfortable and stable wear in home and wet environments.
All products are backed by academic-industry collaborations and practical user evaluations, supporting mobility and comfort in diverse settings.

info.tc:
鍵科有限公司專注於高精度人機介面解決方案，致力為醫療、工控、航太與高端電子領域提供客製化輸入模組。此次參加醫療科技展，將展出多項醫療專用產品，包括導電矽膠按鍵、薄膜開關、機構按鍵模組與整合型輸入解決方案，具備防水、防塵、抗菌塗層與背光設計等特點，廣泛應用於醫療設備操作介面，如監視器、血糖儀、呼吸器控制面板等。

org.tc: 寬譜醫學科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 寬譜醫學科技創立於1990年，是首家通過GMP認證、取得遠紅外線醫療器材許可證的公司，其研發、製造的寬譜遠紅外線治療儀，已是遠紅外線醫療保健領域之領導品牌，全球超過20國、共超過2000家醫療院所採用。 寬譜遠紅外線治療儀廣泛用於各項居家理療保健，深獲民眾信賴；並受到醫療專業人士的肯定，是各大醫院、診所必備的醫療設備，在心血管外科、整型外科、血液透析、復健、中醫及各類病房均有運用。寬譜更與國內、外多家醫學研究單位合作，完成多項遠紅外線療法研究，發表於國際權威醫學期刊的研究論文迄今超過70篇。
info.en: Founded in 1990, WS Far IR Medical Technology Co., Ltd. has been the pioneer in FIR industry. We proudly present Firapy (Far-Infrared Therapy Unit), our innovative and multinational patented product worldwide. Firapy is commonly used in Taiwan for treatment in various clinical divisions as well as homecare. We received 510(k) and CE certification early in the yeas. We will strive to improve our products and conduct both domestic and foreign clinical research.

org.tc: 恩錸富國際有限公司

info.tc:
AmLife DeepZleep 智能睡眠養生器 —— 從睡眠中創造健康！
DeepZleep 智能睡眠養生器（深愈力電位溫熱治療器）融合日本先進醫療科技與自然療法，榮獲日本厚生省及台、馬等多國認證，具備八大健康療效，有效緩解頭痛、肩頸僵硬、慢性失眠、慢性便秘、肌肉與神經痛，促進血液循環、活化腸胃機能、消除疲勞，全面提升健康與睡眠品質。
3大核心科技，全面提升健康與睡眠
✔ 電位治療：調節生物電，穩定自律神經，減少疲勞與壓力。
✔ 溫熱療法：促進血液循環，舒緩肌肉與神經不適。
✔ 獨家聲頻技術：透過特殊頻率共振，紓壓助眠，改善情緒。
5大智能程序，滿足不同健康需求，從養生、健美、活力、循環到深度睡眠，全程自動化操作，簡單便捷，能夠天天輕鬆使用，提升睡眠品質。
國際認證，安心首選
通過多國衛生局官方認證，確保安全、有效、無副作用，榮獲全球市場高度信賴，是業界領先的睡眠保健設備。
睡眠養生新趨勢，市場潛力無限
DeepZleep 不僅是創新的家庭健康管理選擇，更具市場潛力與經濟效益，透過高品質睡眠幫助全球用戶改善健康，開創智慧睡眠新時代。
info.en:
AmLife DeepZleep Amsonic Electric Potential and HyperthermiaTherapeutic Device is a highly efficient home health device that combines advanced Japanese medical technology with natural therapies. Certified by Japan’s Ministry of Health, as well as authorities in Taiwan, Malaysia, and other countries, it provides eight major therapeutic benefits, including relief from headaches, neck and shoulder stiffness, and chronic insomnia. This product integrates electric potential therapy, hyperthermia treatment, and an exclusive patented sound frequency therapy, offering comprehensive health protection that can be easily used at home every day. Users can choose from five smart sleep programs, ranging from wellness and fitness to enhanced blood circulation and deep sleep, with fully automated and simple-to-use operation.
As a market-leading sleep health product, it is widely recognized internationally and has undergone rigorous scientific validation, ensuring long-term durability and safety.
The DeepZleep Electric Potential and Hyperthermia Therapeutic Device is not only an ideal choice for family health care but also an innovative product with both economic benefits and market potential. Helping people \

org.tc: 維聖發企業有限公司

info.tc:
維盛發1996年創立，一直不斷的創新研發，從以前到現在產品越來越多元，但唯一不變初衷的就是，一路以來堅持製造無添加食品，而這也是我們選擇落腳在高雄水質極佳的大樹區加工製造的原因，希望能帶給大家健康零負擔的休閒食品。
 原料首選有機小農、照顧本土農民，使用傳統古法，運用現代化的設備，嚴格把關從原料到加工過程的每個細節，除了產品製造外，我們也非常重視食品口味及口感，積極參與各種的國際食品展，打破大眾對於無添加食品的刻板印象，好吃也可以很健康。
info.en:
Wei Sheng Fa was founded in 1996 and has been constantly innovating and developing. From the past to the present, the products have become more and more diversified, but the only thing that remains unchanged is the original intention of insisting on manufacturing additive-free food all the way. This is why we chose to settle in Kaohsiung with excellent water quality. The reason for processing and manufacturing in Dashu District is to bring everyone healthy and zero-burden snack food.
 We use organic small-scale farmers as raw materials, take care of local farmers, use traditional ancient methods, use modern equipment, and strictly control every detail from raw materials to processing. In addition to product manufacturing, we also attach great importance to food taste and texture, and actively participate in various The International Food Exhibition breaks the public\'s stereotypes about additive-free food. It can be delicious and healthy.

org.tc: 康立安智能醫療設備

info.tc:
康立安智能醫療設備股份有限公司（Conzian Ltd.）是一家新創公司，專注於健康產業的發展。我們的核心團隊成員來自不同的專業領域，包括物理治療、運動醫學、軟體、硬體等，並且具備市場開發和銷售的能力。我們以新創精神為驅動，致力於創造智慧醫療服務。

我們的使命是將醫學與物聯網、可穿戴設備、大數據和人工智慧等技術結合起來，為骨科、復健和運動醫學的客戶提供最佳的解決方案。我們相信，這些技術能夠改變產業的現狀，提升病患的生活品質，改善醫療服務的效率。

作為一家關注健康產業的公司，我們重視與各方利益相關者的合作。我們與醫學界的專家密切合作，確保我們的產品和服務達到最高標準。同時，我們也不斷聽取病患和其家屬的需求和反饋，以便提供更好的解決方案。

我們的產品和服務包括智能康復治療方案、數據分析評估、遠端線上諮詢和醫療研究和開發等。透過我們的解決方案，醫療專業人士可以更準確地評估和監測病患的狀況，提供更有效的治療方案。同時，我們的技術也能夠幫助病患在日常生活中更好地管理健康狀況和預防慢性疾病，提高生活品質。
info.en:
Conzian Ltd. is a startup focused on the development of the healthcare industry. Our diverse team includes experts in physical therapy, sports medicine, software, and hardware, with skills in market development and sales.

Our goal is to combine medical knowledge with technologies like IoT, wearables, big data, and AI to provide innovative solutions for orthopedics, rehabilitation, and sports medicine.

We collaborate closely with medical experts and value feedback from patients and their families to ensure our products and services meet the highest standards.

Our offerings include intelligent rehabilitation solutions, data analysis, remote consultations, and medical research. Through our solutions, healthcare professionals can accurately assess and monitor patients, while empowering individuals to manage their health and enhance their quality of life.

info.en: Zhixinyi is the first assisted circulation air pressure massage device in China. It uses the lower limb covering bag to inflate and deflate synchronously from the calf, thigh, and buttocks in three stages. The computer calculates and adjusts the most suitable rhythm according to each person\'s physical needs to assist the body to achieve a circulation effect similar to exercise. Long-term and regular use is helpful for metabolism, a good night\'s sleep, and physical fitness.

org.tc: 極勁股份有限公司

info.tc:
Ritello® 居家環境健康升級方案

Ritello®以提升居家生活品質為核心理念，結合創新的空氣淨化與深層清潔技術，打造更清新、更舒適的環境。我們透過四大步驟，全面優化您的居家空間：

1. 空氣淨化：大自然靈感的智慧設計
Ritello®採用水洗空氣技術，有效捕捉空氣中的污染物（如塵埃與花粉），顯著改善室內空氣清新度。這項科技模仿自然界的淨化過程，為您帶來更舒適的居家體驗。

2. 全方位居家清潔：輕鬆解決難題
我們的系統配備多功能工具，適合應對地毯、沙發等各種不易清潔的區域。服務人員將現場示範如何使用，幫助您輕鬆完成各項清潔工作。

3. 床墊深層清潔：讓居家更潔淨
藉由POWERBRUSH與強力吸附技術，Ritello®能有效處理床墊和大型織物中的灰塵與髒污，並將其困於水盆中，協助維持清潔的居家環境。

4. 空氣芳香：多功能舒適體驗
我們提供天然精油選擇（如茶樹或尤加利），幫助提升室內空氣清新度，讓您的居家空間更加愉悅。設備亦可搭配市售水溶性精油，滿足個人喜好。

Ritello®致力於提升居家生活質量，將環境優化融入生活細節，讓居家清潔更輕鬆，空間更舒適！
info.en:
**Ritello® Home Environment Enhancement Solution**  

Ritello® enhances home living by combining innovative air purification and deep-cleaning technologies, creating a fresher, more comfortable space.  

**1. Air Purification**: Inspired by nature, Ritello® uses water-based technology to capture dust, pollen, and other pollutants, improving indoor air freshness.  

**2. Comprehensive Cleaning**: Equipped with versatile tools, Ritello® simplifies cleaning for carpets, sofas, and hard-to-reach areas, demonstrated by our professional staff.  

**3. Deep Mattress Cleaning**: With POWERBRUSH and strong suction, Ritello® removes debris from mattresses and fabrics, trapping it in a water basin for a cleaner environment.  

**4. Air Fragrance**: Enhance your space with natural essential oils like tea tree or eucalyptus, or choose your favorite water-soluble oils for a personalized touch.  

Ritello® simplifies cleaning and transforms your home into a healthier, fresher, and more inviting environment.

org.tc: 上頂醫學影像科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
上頂醫學是由卓越的科學家與具有多年經驗的業界精英所組成，致力將研究成果轉化成最具臨床價值、對人類健康有貢獻的產品。
「腦神經年齡（axonal brain age）」磁振造影檢查，透過分析腦神經纖維束，評量全腦神經網絡、以及八項與失智最攸關的認知功能網絡健康狀況。掃描時間不到15分鐘，就能提早在尚未出現症狀時，預測失智風險。
腦神經年齡大於實際年齡越多，失智風險越高。
腦神經年齡≧實際年齡5歲，代表失智症潛在高風險群，建議定期追蹤。
腦神經年齡≧實際年齡10歲，未來2到3年內可能會發生輕度認知功能障礙，10年後失智風險將增加兩到三倍，建議要介入改善。
及早檢測腦神經年齡，就能及早發現問題，逆轉失智！
info.en:
"Neuro-Age" reflects underlying abnormal indicators and is associated with the risks of cognitive aging and neurodegenerative diseases. The AcroViz "Neuro-Age" assessment utilizes magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) and AI-driven big data analytics to analyze the extent of neurodegeneration and overall brain health.
Studies have confirmed that the greater the discrepancy between brain age and actual age, the higher the risk of dementia. If the brain appears more than five years older than the actual age, the individual is considered to be in a high-risk group for dementia and is advised to undergo regular monitoring; a discrepancy of over ten years indicates pronounced brain aging, with the risk of dementia increasing two to threefold within ten years. Early prediction of brain age provides an opportunity for timely intervention, potentially reversing the progression toward dementia.

org.tc: 嘉碩生醫電子股份有限公司

info.tc: 嘉碩生醫電子股份有限公司(tstbio，tst biomedical electronics Co., Ltd.)是台灣嘉碩科技股份有限公司(TST，Tai-Saw Technology Co.，Ltd  )在2018年成立的跨足台灣生物醫學電子的子公司。我們基於TST的表面聲波（SAW）核心技術以及長期戰略的合作夥伴日本JRC公司的研發技術為基礎，tstbio開發了一種簡單而強大的SAW Biosensor的產品，即POCT（定點照護檢驗)的“ iProtin” (艾普定)，它是一種易於操作且具有成本效益的體外診斷醫療器材，僅需滴一滴指尖的全血，即可在5分鐘內定量測量人體中的生物標誌(Biomarker)，定量結果可為診斷和監測改善健康狀況提供精確的決策依據，適用於家庭和臨床應用。
info.en:
tstbio provides advanced SAW Open Platform Services and has been partnering with industry leaders since 2021 by offering its innovative SAW Platform. Headquartered in Taiwan, tstbio was established in 2018 as a biomedical electronics spin-off company from Tai-Saw Technology Co., Ltd. 
Combining the core technology of Surface Acoustic Waves (SAW) from TST with the expertise of its long-term strategic partner, Japan Radio Co., Ltd. (JRC), tstbio has developed the groundbreaking “iProtin” platform. This POCT (point-of-care testing) solution is designed to deliver simple, reliable, and robust biosensor technology for both home and clinical applications.

 

 

In addition to the iProtin platform, tstbio offers a diverse portfolio of biomedical devices to address the growing global demand for health management solutions. Committed to innovation and excellence, tstbio continues to redefine the possibilities in biomedical electronics, contributing to a healthier, more connected future for communities worldwide.

org.tc: 國璽幹細胞應用技術股份有限公司
org.en: Gwo Xi Stem Cell Applied Technology Co., Ltd.

info.tc:
國璽幹細胞於2011年進駐新竹生醫園區，我們全心投入幹細胞應用技術開發及幹細胞製劑創新，目標是克服目前尚未獲得滿足的醫療需求。
透過整合醫藥級幹細胞製劑生產技術平台與諸多核心技術，我們已開發多項專有製程技術，並且已將四支幹細胞新藥推動進入臨床試驗。
為了進一步擴大幹細胞製劑量產規模及提升產品品質的穩定性，國璽從製造開始就採用模組化製程的創新思維，於園區內打造【PIC/S GMP 幹細胞製劑藥廠】，穩健地走向規模化量產，同時持續拓展細胞治療領域的開發，與強化細胞治療產業鏈上、中、下游的全面佈局。
info.en:
Gwo Xi Stem Cell Company has established the R&D center for cell therapy product development at Hsinchu Biomedical Science Park since 2011.
We are committed to developing stem cell medicines that have the potential to help patients with unmet medical needs.
Our production platform fully comply with medical regulations (Good Tissue Practice, GTP) in Taiwan. There are four stem cell new drugs being put into clinical trial produced by this platform. Among them, GXNPC1 (Chronic Stroke) and GXCPC1 (Osteoarthritis) are moving forward to Phase III trial, which they use autologous ADSCs and allogeneic ADSCs, respectively.
We are establishing PIC/S GMP grade stem cell preparation factory (15,225 m2 built-out space) to put stem cell-based medicinal products into practice and progressively enlarge our production line in a scale-up level.

org.tc: 藥華醫藥股份有限公司

info.tc: 藥華醫藥以原創性的長效型蛋白質藥物研發定點 PEGylation 技術平台及高難度小分子合成藥物技術等為基礎，製造出更優質的突破性新藥產品，以治療血液腫瘤及其他癌症。PEGylation為將蛋白質藥物與長鏈高分子PEG (polyethylene glycol) 相結合的技術，目的為延長蛋白質藥物在人體血液內維持有效濃度的時間，使藥物具有最長藥效和最單純化合物的優勢。Ropeginterferon alfa-2b是以PEGylation 技術平台所製成的單一化合物且高純度的蛋白質新藥，為新一代PEG長效型α干擾素；Ropeginterferon alfa-2b以治療真性紅血球增生症 (Polycythemia Vera，PV) 已取得歐洲、台灣、韓國、美國、日本、新加坡、馬來西亞、中國、巴西、阿根廷的上市許可。
info.en: In the field of protein drug design, the process of pegylation of the therapeutic protein preserves its biologic activity by targeting the PEG polymer (polyethylene glycol) at a specific and a defined region on the protein. PharmaEssentia’s pegylation technology platform is designed to increase the protein drug’s efficacy by prolonging its circulation in the blood stream. PharmaEssentia creates a novel product- Ropeginterferon alfa-2b, it’s a long-acting, mono-pegylated proline interferon with improved pharmacokinetic properties allowing once every two weeks administration offering improved tolerability and convenience. The marketing authorization for Ropeginterferon alfa-2b for treatment of Polycythemia Vera (PV) is granted by EMA, Taiwan, Korea, US, Japan, Singapore, Malaysia, China, Brazil and Argentina.

info.tc:
百達醫 BKE 專注於為顧客創造高品質、創新且具市場競爭力的保健食品之研發、製造、生產與代工，並提供全方位的一條龍 OEM 與 ODM 服務。
我們專注於機能性食品的研發與配方設計，遵循 ISO22000 和 HACCP 標準，確保產品的高品質。從原料進口、製造到成品包裝，嚴選國際知名品牌與專利功能性保健原料，同時投入研發與創新，擁有多項專利製程，在首樣製作和少量生產上，滿足客戶需求並致力於為客戶帶來革新與差異化優勢。
公司具備多項國際認證，能提供多元劑型，包括粉充膠囊、液態膠囊、軟膠囊、錠劑、粉包、飲品、代餐包、搖搖袋、液態飲品、果凍、糖果劑型等。
除製造外，公司亦提供品牌商標註冊、專利申請、產品檢驗、科學驗證、企業獎項申請等加值服務，協助客戶節省時間與成本，快速進入市場。
我們的客戶群涵蓋保健食品公司、食品廠、網紅電商、微商團隊、直銷公司、品牌商、健身房、醫美診所、藥妝連鎖賣場等。
info.en:
BKE (Baidayi Enterprise Co., Ltd.) specializes in the R&D, manufacturing, production, and contract manufacturing of high-quality, innovative, and market-competitive health supplements, offering a comprehensive one-stop OEM & ODM service.
We focus on functional food development and formulation design, adhering to ISO22000 and HACCP standards to ensure top product quality. From raw material importation to manufacturing and final packaging, we carefully select internationally renowned branded ingredients and patented functional health ingredients. Through continuous R&D and innovation, we have developed multiple patented processes, enabling us to meet client needs for prototype production and small-batch manufacturing, while delivering innovation and differentiation advantages.
Our facilities hold multiple international certifications and support a wide variety of dosage forms, including powder-filled capsules, liquid capsules, softgels, tablets, powder sachets, beverages, meal replacement packs, shaker bags, liquid drinks, jellies, and confectionery forms.
In addition to manufacturing, we offer value-added services such as brand trademark registration, patent application, product testing, scientific validation, and corporate award applications—helping clients save time and costs while accelerating their market entry.
Our clientele includes health supplement brands, food manufacturers, influencers, e-commerce sellers, direct selling companies, brand owners, gyms, aesthetic clinics, and pharmacy chains.

org.tc: 永磐科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
Miko IoT醫護管理平台係利用安全及有效的資通訊機制，結合院內HIS、NIS等醫療資訊系統所提供之資料，並整合通訊系統、定位系統及IoT醫療物聯裝置之資訊，統一建構而成的私有雲端智慧醫療核心數據中心。
Miko IoT醫護管理平台採用模組化架構，分別可與MikoDrip點滴監測系統、MikoUrine尿袋監測系統、MikoNIS護理站電子白板、MikoRTLS定位系統及MikoCALL緊急呼叫系統協作，作為不同系統間資料統合與資訊分享的媒介。
Miko IoT透過跨系統的整合與智能運算提供資訊加值服務，例如發生緊急事件時，Miko IoT可將緊急呼叫通話、呼救位置、病患基本資料與醫療註記等訊息，自動傳遞到專責護理師的手機上。透過智慧化流程縮短緊急事件的反應時間，協助醫院提升緊急應變能力與醫療服務品質。
info.en:
The Miko IoT Healthcare Management Platform leverages secure and efficient information and communication technologies to integrate data from in-hospital medical information systems such as HIS (Hospital Information System) and NIS (Nursing Information System). It also consolidates information from communication systems, positioning systems, and IoT medical devices to form a unified, private cloud-based smart healthcare core data center.
The platform adopts a modular architecture and can interoperate with various subsystems, including the MikoDrip Infusion Monitoring System, MikoUrine Urine Bag Monitoring System, MikoNIS Electronic Whiteboard for Nursing Stations, MikoRTLS Real-Time Location System, and MikoCALL Emergency Call System. It serves as a hub for data integration and information sharing across these systems.
Through cross-system integration and intelligent computing, Miko IoT provides value-added information services. For instance, during emergencies, Miko IoT can automatically send critical information—such as emergency call audio, alert location, patient demographics, and medical notes—to the responsible nurse’s mobile device. This intelligent workflow reduces response time and helps hospitals enhance their emergency handling capabilities and overall quality of care.

org.tc: 倍福自動化有限公司

info.tc: 倍福 (Beckhoff) 總部位於德國，在全球累計超過 75 個國家及地區設有營業據點。倍福利用 PC-based 控制技術，打造開放式自動化系統。產品主要涵蓋範圍有：工業 PC、I/O 及現場總線元件、驅動技術、機器視覺、自動化軟體，以及無控制箱的自動化系統。除此之外，還有進階輸送系統 XTS 及 XPlanar。Beckhoff 在醫療技術領域具豐富經驗且實績亮眼，更能確保安全可靠地生產重要藥物、疫苗和診斷測試，並提供創新醫療及醫材的智動化進而實現柔性製造。
info.en:
Beckhoff implements open automation systems using proven PC-based control technology. The main areas that the product range covers are industrial PCs, I/O and fieldbus components, drive technology, automation software, control cabinet-free automation, and hardware for machine vision. Product ranges that can be used as separate components or integrated into a complete and mutually compatible control system are available for all sectors. 
Beckhoff has extensive experience and a strong track record in the medical technology industry, ensuring the safe and reliable production of essential pharmaceuticals, vaccines, and diagnostic tests. In addition, it enables flexible manufacturing through intelligent automation for innovative medical treatments and devices.

info.tc: Teradyne Robotics 是全球先進機器人解決方案的領導者，致力於透過協作型與移動型機器人技術的創新，徹底革新製造流程。Teradyne Robotics 旗下的公司 Universal Robots （UR）與 Mobile Industrial Robots（MiR），協助各規模企業結合機器與人力的優勢，提升營運效率。我們的完整解決方案能夠優化製造流程、提升產品品質與產能，同時大幅改善工作場所的安全性。Teradyne Robotics 隸屬於 Teradyne （NASDAQ:TER），為全球自動化測試設備與工業自動化解決方案的領導供應商。
info.en:
Teradyne Robotics is a global leader in advanced robotic solutions, driving transformation through collaborative and mobile robotics. Its brands, Universal Robots (UR) and Mobile Industrial Robots (MiR), help companies of all sizes combine human capabilities with automation to boost efficiency. The company’s integrated solutions optimize manufacturing processes, improve product quality, and enhance workplace safety.
Teradyne Robotics is a business unit of Teradyne, Inc. (NASDAQ: TER), a global leader in automated test and industrial automation solutions.

info.tc:
晁禾醫療（Habitz Medtech）晁禾醫療科技秉持 "Get Better Every Day 持之以恆 健康永續" 的理念，專注於提供智慧醫療與科技復健解決方案，協助臨床專業人員與個案，提升整體復健成效與生活品質。
我們的服務涵蓋科技復健、長期照護輔具、預防醫學與健康管理，並應用於中風、脊髓損傷、腦性麻痺、失智症、肌少症及亞健康促進等領域，致力於打造健康永續的全方位系統。
【核心技術與產品】
1.  復健機器人技術：智能手臂復健、機器人步行訓練
2.  智慧長照科技：遠距復健監測、居家復健解決方案
3.  數位健康管理：物聯網感測、生理數據分析
4.  個別化復健方案：結合AI與AR/VR技術，提升復健訓練效果
【醫療機構合作】
我們與醫療院所、復健中心及長照單位緊密合作，提供從產品安裝、操作指導到教育訓練的完整服務，
並透過專業支持助力每位使用者，確保獲得最佳效果與服務。
【學術合作與參訪活動】
我們積極與學校及研究機構合作推動智慧醫療與復健科技的應用，透過設備、技術支援及專業培訓，協助建立先進教學環境，並開放參訪活動結合理論與實務培養新一代專才！
【晁禾醫療願景】
晁禾醫療科技深信健康是每一天的積累，
讓我們攜手努力一起實現持之以恆的健康永續！
info.en:
Habitz Medtech, guided by the philosophy of “Get Better Every Day – Perseverance for Sustainable Health,” is dedicated to providing smart healthcare and technological rehabilitation solutions. We support clinical professionals and individuals to enhance overall rehabilitation outcomes and quality of life.
Our services span across technology-assisted rehabilitation, long-term care assistive devices, preventive medicine, and health management, and are applicable to areas such as stroke, spinal cord injuries, cerebral palsy, dementia, sarcopenia, and sub-health improvement, aiming to create a comprehensive system for sustainable health.
 
【Core Technologies and Products】
1.  Rehabilitation Robotics: Intelligent arm rehabilitation, robotic gait training
2.  Smart Long-Term Care Technologies: Remote rehabilitation monitoring, home-based rehab solutions
3.  Digital Health Management: IoT-based sensing, physiological data analysis
4.  Personalized Rehabilitation Programs: AI and AR/VR integration to optimize rehabilitation training outcomes
【Medical Institution Partnerships】
We closely collaborate with hospitals, rehabilitation centers, and long-term care facilities to deliver end-to-end services — from product installation and operational guidance to professional training. Our expert support ensures that every user receives optimal outcomes and service quality.
 
【Academic Collaborations and Visits】
We actively engage with schools and research institutes to promote the application of smart healthcare and rehabilitation technologies. Through equipment, technical support, and professional training, we help establish advanced learning environments and host site visits that combine theory with hands-on experience to cultivate the next generation of professionals.
【Our Vision】
At Habitz Medtech, we believe that health is built day by day.
Let us work together to achieve sustainable health through perseverance!

info.tc: n general, when patients undergo rehabilitation, they may face problems such as large size of rehabilitation equipment that is not easy to carry or complicated operation procedures. However, WILMO, a supplemental device from Japan, which also belongs to the category of electrical stimulation, weighs less than one hundred grams and has the characteristics of lightweight, easy to carry, and simplified operation methods, which increase the possibility of wearing and using it in daily life, and it can also help stroke patients to continue training for a long period of time in life. It can also help patients with stroke to continue training for a longer period of time in their daily lives.
info.en: 一般患者在進行復健時，可能面臨到復健器材體積大不易攜帶、或是操作步驟較複雜的問題，而來自日本、同樣屬於是電刺激的補助裝置「WILMO」，因為重量不到一百克，具有體積輕巧、便於攜帶的特性，加上經過簡化的操作方式，增加了於日常生活中配戴使用的可能性，也能夠幫助中風患者在生活中持續進行訓練的時間。個案可以在日常生活中配戴，透過電刺激幫助訓練肌肉，進而完成如拿起杯子、打開櫃子等簡單的動作，只要逐步練習，能夠完成的動作越來越多，都將有助於患者調整心態，大幅增加回歸原本生活步調的可能性，最終目的讓個案提升生活品質。

info.tc:
必為健康推出的 doctorgram 是一個整合性遠距醫療照護平台，它巧妙結合了遠距關懷與視訊問診功能，為患者提供客製化醫療服務。
doctorgram 透過藍牙醫療設備自動收集健康數據，醫護人員能即時掌握異常狀況並主動溝通。
患者可輕鬆預約線上問診、在諮詢時進行即時健康檢測，讓醫療服務變得更貼心、更有效率。
✅ doctorgram 遠距關懷特色：
• 輕鬆紀錄：透過藍牙醫療設備測量並上傳健康數據。
• 即時溝通：患者與醫護團隊間可透過 doctorgram 即時溝通。
• 量身訂製護理計畫：醫護人員可以隨時掌握患者健康狀況並且量身訂製護理計畫。
• 系統主動提醒：當患者測量的數據超過設定監測範圍時，醫護人員的手機或平板會即時收到通知。
✅ doctorgram 遠距問診特色：
• 引導描述症狀：美國史丹佛醫學院醫師根據臨床經驗所擬定的診前問卷，可協助醫師精準並且有效率地掌握患者生理狀況。
• 問診期間測量生理健康數據：問診過程中，患者可測量生理健康數據，該數據會同步上傳，讓醫護人員可以充分掌握患者生理狀況。
必為健康官方網站：https://www.bewellhealth.com.tw/
info.en:
BeWell’s doctorgram is an integrated telemedicine care platform that thoughtfully combines remote monitoring with video consultations to provide personalized medical services for patients.
doctorgram automatically collects health data through Bluetooth medical devices, enabling healthcare professionals to promptly detect abnormalities and proactively engage with patients.
Patients can easily schedule online consultations and perform real-time health checks during their sessions, making healthcare more attentive, efficient, and patient-centered.
✅ doctorgram Tele-monitoring Features:
• Easy Recording: Health data is measured via Bluetooth medical devices and automatically uploaded.
• Real-Time Communication: Patients and healthcare teams can communicate instantly through doctorgram.
• Personalized Care Plans: Healthcare providers can monitor patients’ health status at any time and create tailored care plans.
• Proactive Alerts: When a patient’s measured data exceeds the set monitoring range, healthcare providers receive instant notifications on their mobile devices or tablets.
✅ doctorgram Tele-visit Features:
• Guided Symptom Reporting: Pre-consultation questionnaires, designed by physicians from Stanford University School of Medicine based on clinical experience, help doctors accurately and efficiently understand patients’ physiological conditions.
• Real-Time Health Data Measurement: During consultations, patients can measure their health data, which is uploaded in real time so healthcare providers can fully monitor their condition.
Be Well Official Website: https://www.bewellhealth.com.tw/

2.藥物開發平台 Atom platform:以 All-in-one 的方式從頭設計 (de-novo design) 新分子結構。從傳統電腦藥物設計乃至近期人工智慧(輔助)藥物設計，大多採取藥物優化設計策略，不僅金錢成本高、花費時間長，且成功率受限於有限的藥物修正範圍。Atom Platform 的多態藥物生成模型打破傳統優化設計策略，除了對目標靶點有效性(Potency)外，在藥物結構生成階段就以水溶性/穿膜率/ADME/生物毒性與利用率/專利規避/合成步驟等標的做條件式生成，設計出的藥物結構即符合候選藥物(Drug Candidate)的要求。利用此平台所設計的藥物，目前可合成率為99%，標的蛋白有效性(IC50
info.en:

　村田洞悉智慧醫療各式應用場景，研發滿足產業發展需求的嶄新產品。村田多款創新高品質電子元件產品及解決方案，可廣泛應用於醫療設備、醫院環境管理與智慧穿戴裝置等領域。如無溫度飄移、具備高靈敏度的村田「Picoleaf壓電薄膜感測器」；以陶瓷作為驅動源，利用超音波振動實現小而薄型、靜音的微型氣泵；或是具備小型化、高可靠性、超低功耗的優異性能，可作為無線模組開關使用的AMR磁性感測器等。
info.en:
Murata Manufacturing Co., Ltd., a global leading electronic components manufacturer (hereinafter referred to as "Murata"), is set to appear at the 2025 Taiwan Medical Technology Show, showcasing a variety of innovative electronic component products. Focusing on the fields of medical devices and smart wearable devices, Murata aims to collaborate with the industry to create a new future of smart healthcare with its innovative capabilities.
Murata understands the diverse application scenarios of smart healthcare and develops new products that meet industry development needs. Murata's multiple innovative high-quality electronic components and solutions can be widely applied in medical devices, hospital environment management, and smart wearable devices. These include the temperature drift-free, highly sensitive "Picoleaf Piezoelectric Thin Film Sensor"; a small, thin, and silent micro air pump driven by ceramic and utilizing ultrasonic vibration; and an AMR magnetic sensor featuring miniaturization, high reliability, and ultra-low power consumption, which can be used as a wireless module switch.

info.tc:
靜態12導心電圖的新選擇!
”宇心” 12導心電圖系統為醫療級，用於心臟疾病的篩檢儀器。獨特的產品設計可彈性應用在不同醫療場域，延伸至遠距會診、急診、緊急救護、偏鄉醫療，CRO、長照中心與居家照護等。
不同於傳統機型，僅67g的重量輕巧可攜，搭配的專利電極貼片省去複雜導線，讓檢查可在1分鐘完成操作，更簡單、更衛生。透過臨床試驗證明與醫院用高階機種達相同水準，並取得FDA,TFDA與CE。搭配APP與符合HIPAA雲端管理系統，克服過去院內心電圖無法普及的困難，為心臟照護帶來新的可能。
info.en:
The world’s most user-friendly 12-lead ECG system !
The PCA 500 is an entire ECG solution that simplifies and streamlines the 12-lead ECG testing.  It is hospital grade, yet easy to use. 
With seamless integration of state-of-the-art technologies: a super-compact recorder weights only 67g, patented prepositioned electrode strips, user-friendly apps for mobile devices, and HIPAA-compliant cloud, a hospital-quality 12-lead ECG can be completed by anyone, anytime, anywhere. PCA500 provides efficiency, accuracy, consistency, sanitation and better workflow, and makes 12-lead resting ECG testing accessible. It is cleared by the FDA, TFDA, and CE mark , perfect for telemedicine, ER, EMS , CRO, nursing home and remote patient monitoring.

org.tc: 神瑞人工智慧股份有限公司

info.tc: DeepLung-CAC 100：AI智慧篩檢平台利用單一次低劑量胸腔電腦斷層(LDCT)影像，使用多模人工智慧技術，將肺、心、骨做一次性篩檢，快速偵測肺結節、預測心臟冠狀動脈鈣化風險及骨質疏鬆風險，並產出客製化診斷報告。DeepBrain-Cognito：4D 高齡認知風險評估模組藉由一次掃描的磁振(MRI)影像，建構出個人化4D人腦老化時間軌跡圖譜。不僅能自動生成大腦年齡預測報告，亦能預測未來時間的認知分數、症狀表現型及未來腦皮質萎縮區域，與精準預測未來時間認知退化可能性。
info.en: DeepLung-CAC 100 provides patients with early diagnostic opportunities for three conditions: it automatically detects lung nodules, predicts coronary artery calcification risk, and assesses bone density risk using a single set of low-dose chest CT scans. DeepBrain-Cognito is an AI-powered platform that utilizes conventional 3D MRI scans to provide detailed 4D brain age predictions and future dementia risk assessments. It comprises three core modules: Brain Age Assessment, Cognitive Risk Prediction, and Brain Atrophy Pattern Analysis. This solution empowers medical professionals, particularly neuroradiologists, to perform comprehensive yet time-efficient assessments of the aging brain with essential information.

org.tc: 台達電子工業股份有限公司

info.tc:
台達U+抑菌器Care222®系列，是使用222nm波長的紫外線以抑制細菌和病毒的光源模組。一般254nm波長紫外線容易被DNA吸收，會對人體細胞帶來不良的影響。
而波長222nm具備破壞病毒及細菌DNA的抑菌效果，而照射人體時會被皮膚的角質層吸收，不會到達人體細胞的DNA，因此不具254nm波長紫外線的危險性。
 
產品特點 :
1.        獨特的安全性 : 222nm波長是安全的紫外線 不穿透眼睛淚液層及皮膚角質造成傷害
2.        U+抑菌器Care222®系列 ，為無化學成分、有效對抗病原體、安全靜音低能耗等醫材級抑菌防護方案
3.        表面及空氣清消兼具 : 功耗僅15W ，根據WHO會議報告，空氣交換率可達3000ACH，優於新風系統。且不受空間限制，可任意擴充增加殺菌能力
4.        醫材級醫療應用 : 有效抑止病毒及細菌，具有非接觸性、無抗藥性、長時殺菌等優點
5.        畜牧應用 : 提供非化學性，靜音低耗，營造低菌環境最佳方案，可避免使用與人類重疊之抗生素，不需要噴灑化學性藥水，可配合系統控制點滅時間
info.en:
Delta U+ disinfection device Care222® series is a light source module that uses ultraviolet light with a wavelength of 222nm to inhibit bacteria and viruses. Generally, ultraviolet rays with a wavelength of 254nm are easily absorbed by DNA and will have adverse effects on human cells. The wavelength of 222nm has the antibacterial effect of damaging the DNA of viruses and bacteria. When irradiated to the human body, it will be absorbed by the stratum corneum of the skin and will not reach the DNA of human cells. Therefore, it does not have the risk of ultraviolet rays with a wavelength of 254nm.
 
Product Features: 
 
1.          Unique safety : 222nm wavelength is safe ultraviolet rays that do not penetrate the eye tear layer and skin cuticles to cause damage
2.          U+ disinfection device Care222® series is a medical grade antibacterial protection solution with no chemical components, effective in fighting pathogens, safe, silent and low energy consumption.
3.          Both surface and air cleaning : power consumption of only 15W. According to the WHO meeting report, the air exchange rate can reach 3000ACH, which is better than the fresh air system. It is not limited by space and can be expanded arbitrarily to increase the sterilization capacity.
4.          Animal husbandry applications : Provide non-chemical, silent and low-consumption, the best solution to create a low-bacteria environment, which can avoid the use of overlapping antibiotics with humans, does not require the spraying of chemical drops, and can cooperate with the system to control the extinguishing time

info.tc: 百視美成立於2009年，專注於開發、生產與銷售創新的醫療器材與醫療電子解決方案，具有完整並有經驗的研發、生產、 行銷與售服團隊。百視美為QMS認證、提供設計、銷售、代工、生產服務的醫材廠商，此次展會除展出自行開發的產品(攜帶式12導程心電圖機、醫療螢幕、高電量醫療電池、遠距醫療諮詢車等)，更將展示百視美在生理訊號處理技術、醫療器材微小化設計、資料傳輸及醫療IT整合的專業，一站式設計生產醫療器才的能力，提供與現有醫療系統整合的完整解決方案，改善醫療效率及滿足因應疫情而產生的遠距需求。
info.en: BriteMED, established in 2009, is dedicated to manufacturing innovative medical devices and electronic medical solutions that improve clinical workflow and enhance patient care. As the QMS-certified manufacturer, BriteMED is providing services of design, contract manufacturing, distribution, and production. At this tradeshow, BriteMED will showcase own-brand products, like 12-lead portable ECG, medical monitor, medical battery, tele-consultation workstation. In addition, BriteMED will present the expertise in vital sign processing, minimizing medical device, and medical IT, and the one-stop design & production capability to satisfy the rising requirement of integrated electrical medical solutions and telemedicine services.

org.tc: 神助物流設備股份有限公司

info.tc:
專利的無軌移動櫃系統，專為醫療機構、實驗室、藥品庫與高潔淨空間設計，打破傳統軌道式儲存櫃侷限，提供更安全、靈活與潔淨的儲存解決方案。
無軌移動櫃採用智能導向技術與模組化結構，免除地面鋪設軌道，不僅提升空間利用率，亦大幅降低施工與日後維護成本。移動流暢穩定，支援大型醫療設備、耗材、藥品等各類儲存需求，同時具備防脫軌、防傾倒、抗震設計，即使在地震環境中亦能確保櫃體安全。
針對醫療環境，我們特別選用抗菌塗層及潔淨設計，有效降低污染風險，便於日常清潔與感染管控。櫃體可依據需求搭載電子標籤、智能盤點系統，協助實現醫療物資的高效管理與可追溯性。
無軌移動櫃不僅優化空間，更同步提升作業安全與管理效率，是現代醫療單位推動智慧倉儲、潔淨管理的最佳選擇
info.en:
At this year’s medical exhibition, we proudly present our patented Trackless Mobile Shelving System, specifically designed for hospitals, laboratories, pharmaceutical storage, and cleanroom environments.
Unlike traditional track-based shelving, our system requires no floor rails, ensuring a safer, cleaner, and more adaptable storage space. Featuring anti-tilt, anti-derailment, and seismic-resistant structures, it guarantees operational safety even during earthquakes.
The shelving units are constructed with antimicrobial coatings and clean-friendly designs, minimizing contamination risks and simplifying maintenance. Optional integrations such as electronic labels and smart inventory systems further enhance operational efficiency and traceability.
Our Trackless Mobile Shelving maximizes storage capacity, improves workflow, and aligns with modern healthcare demands for smart, hygienic, and future-ready storage solutions.

多年來陸續投入增設實驗室儀器，協助客戶更便利地蒐集測試數據。亦有多條產線進行機構組裝。
具備醫療器材品質管理系統(ISO 13485)及食品安全管理系統(ISO 22000)之認證，及超過三十年的模具設計開發經驗，提供台灣在地專業服務。
info.en:
Using Europe-made precise dosing systems and injection molding machines, along with LSR (liquid silicone rubber) cold runner systems, we can efficiently save material from loss, and the reduction is especially significant in pricey medical materials.
Manufacturing in class 100,000 (ISO-8) clean rooms, our injection molding technique is suitable for plastic and LSR (liquid silicone rubber) parts for medical purposes.
We have been investing in various testing equipment to assist our customers in gathering data more easily; and assembly lines to conduct mechanical assembling.
Certificated in the medical device quality management system (ISO 13485) and food safety management system (ISO 22000).
With over 30 years of experience in injection mold development, we are here to provide you with our professionalism and services locally in Taiwan.

info.tc: 名峰科技的VIROCRUSH專利技術最初是為解決醫療客戶對產品抗菌抗病毒的需求而投入研究及開發，以幫助減少產品在環境使用上可能造成的細菌及病毒感染，經過數年艱辛的研究開發，於2019年底正式完成製程研發並開始啟動導入量產階段，而後不久則適逢全球新冠肺炎的爆發，名峰期許VIROCRUSH技術能為全球對抗病毒的努力盡一份力!
info.en: MING FENG Technology\'s VIROCRUSH patented technology was initially invested in research and development to address the needs of medical customers for antibacterial and antiviral products to help reduce bacterial and viral infections that may be caused by product use in the environment. After several years of arduous research and development, The process research and development was officially completed at the end of 2019 and the mass production phase was launched. Shortly afterwards, the global COVID-19 outbreak occurred. Mingfeng hopes that VIROCRUSH technology can contribute to the global fight against the virus!

 Eliminate fatigue and relieve muscle neuralgia.
 Relieve muscle fatigue and muscle stiffness.

org.tc: 立克銘白生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
公司主要開發及生產製造醫學相關檢測設備，順應癌症個人化精準醫療的市場趨勢，本公司集合光電、機電、醫工、分生及軟體相關跨領域人才開發第一項設備產品 - CytoExplore，並提供液態切片癌症檢測服務。

此設備產品其應用性：
1.	分析血液癌細胞數，液態切片檢測，評估癌症癒前及癒後情況。
2.	精準捕捉血液癌細胞，有利於後端進行相關抗藥性基因檢測，益於個人化癌症精準醫療執行。
info.en:
The company primarily develops and manufactures medical diagnostic equipment, following the market trend of personalized and precision cancer care. The company has brought together talents from various fields, including optoelectronics, mechatronics, biomedical engineering, molecular biology, and software, to develop its first product - CytoExplore, and also provides liquid biopsy cancer detection services.

The applications of this product include:
1. Analyzing the number of circulating tumor cells in the blood, using liquid biopsy detection to assess the prognosis and treatment response of cancer patients.
2. Precisely capturing circulating tumor cells, which facilitates downstream testing for drug resistance genes, supporting the implementation of personalized and precision cancer treatment.

info.tc:
源奇科技自創立以來，專注於液晶光學技術的研發，憑藉豐富的經驗，持續探索創新解決方案，致力於為市場帶來更多驚艷且實用的產品。本次展會將重點推出 Liqxtal Pro-Eye 顯示器，這款專為守護視力而設計的專利產品，特別針對熟齡族群的老花問題及學齡近視族群的視力保護需求。其獨特的設計優化虛擬觀看距離，有效減輕睫狀肌疲勞，降低長時間使用電腦對視力的負擔，成為市面上最適合熟齡及老花族群長期使用的電腦螢幕。
除了顯示器，源奇科技也將展出 Liqxtal Dim 遮光眼鏡，專為手眼協調訓練與視覺保護設計。透過獨家的像素化遮光閥控制技術，能夠整體調整鏡片亮度，並支援客製化圖樣與局部遮光功能，讓使用者可依需求進行個性化設定。搭配電腦程式操作，不僅可進行視覺訓練，還能靈活應用於更多生活與運動場景，展現智慧眼鏡的多元價值。
源奇科技持續以創新技術推動液晶光學應用的進步，期待透過這些突破性的產品，為現代視力健康與智慧眼鏡市場帶來全新體驗。
info.en:
Liqxtal Technology Inc., based in Taiwan, pioneers liquid crystal (LC) applications beyond traditional displays. With expertise in LC optics, we develop advanced solutions for displays and pixelated optical modules.
At this event, Liqxtal will present its latest solution: Liqxtal Pro-Eye: An innovative display specifically designed for vision care, addressing age-related presbyopia and slowing the progression of myopia for school-aged children. Its unique design optimizes for the most comfortable viewing distance, alleviating strain on the ciliary muscle and reducing eye fatigue. Liqxtal Pro-Eye introduces a redefined, personalized screen interaction, delivering exceptional comfort and clarity for daily use. This remarkable innovation significantly reduces eye discomfort, making it especially appealing in today\'s screen-centric world.
Additionally, we introduce Liqxtal Dim, a smart eyewear solution for eye-hand coordination and vision training. Featuring proprietary pixelated dimming technology, it allows users to customize pixel patterns and lens brightness for various display modes, catering to both daily and sports applications.
Committed to advancing liquid crystal optical technology, Liqxtal Technology continues to push boundaries, delivering groundbreaking solutions for vision health and smart eyewear.

org.tc: 華美光學科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
1. 醫療防護眼鏡 – 用於醫療行為時的眼睛防護，包含防止感染，特殊濾光需求…等. 
2. 醫美雷射防護 – 適用於歐美皮秒雷射防護
3. 樂齡眼鏡 – 適用於年長者配戴，可使視覺感受更加鮮豔清楚，並減少眩光造成的傷害
4. 太陽眼鏡 – 適用於日常保護眼鏡免受紫外線傷害
5. 訂製化視力矯正鏡片 – 可以依據使用者的視力矯正需求，訂製專屬的矯正鏡片，包含防藍光，漸近多焦，高曲度運動太陽矯正鏡片…等
6. 手眼協調訓練設備 – 協助兒童手眼協調能力的發展以及減緩老年人的腦部退化或強化一般人的運動視覺反應能力
info.en:
1. Medical Protective Eyewear - Used for eye protection protection against infections, specific light filtering requirements, etc.
2. Medical Laser Protection - Suitable for European and American picosecond laser protection.
3. Senior-friendly eyewear - Designed for elderly individuals, these glasses reduce glare and enhance visual clarity, providing a more vibrant visual experience.
4. Sunglasses - Suitable for daily eye protection against UV radiation.
5. Customized Correction Lenses - Custom-made lenses tailored to the user's vision correction needs, including blue light protection, progressive lenses, high-curve sports sun correction lenses, etc.
6. Hand-Eye Coordination Training Equipment - Assists in developing children's hand-eye coordination skills, mitigates cognitive decline in older people, or enhances the general population's sports visual response abilities.

org.tc: 順易利實業有限公司

info.tc:
SUMEASY順易利創立於1999年，早年投入不織布產品相關應用，而後在2012年開始成為醫用口罩製造的公司，融合設計開發及生產製造於一體，於2020年初加入台灣口罩國家隊編號5號，守護台灣對抗疫情，抵擋COVID-19侵入台灣。
目前我們的口罩產品通過多間專業檢測機構測試，包括Nelson labs / SGS / KAKEN / TTRI / Intertek / ASR 等知名專業檢測及認證機構，經實證達細菌過濾效率99%的醫用口罩製造商。
info.en:
SUMEASY was founded in 1999 and invested in the application of non-woven products in the early years. Then it became a medical mask manufacturing company in 2012, integrating design, development and production. In early 2020, it joined the Taiwan National Mask National Team No. 5. Protect Taiwan against the epidemic and resist the intrusion of COVID-19 into Taiwan.
At present, our mask products have been tested by many professional testing institutions, including well-known professional testing and certification institutions such as Nelson labs / SGS / KAKEN / TTRI / Intertek / ASR, and have been certified as a medical mask manufacturer with a bacterial filtration efficiency of 99%.

info.tc:
元健助聽器秉持專業、貼心、超值作為我們的服務精神，根據客戶需求提供到府和雲端服務，更將在年底完成宜蘭科學園區的廠區的啟用，服務更多有需要的人，以下是我們的特色介紹。

一家購買全台服務：在全台共有55家，分布全台各縣市和離島。
國產好貼心：專為國人研發，在設計與使用上都更貼近台灣民眾需求。
info.en:
Mimitakara Hearing Aids upholds professionalism, attentiveness, and value as our service spirit. We provide in-home and cloud services based on customer needs. Additionally, we will complete the opening of our factory in the Yilan Science Park by the end of the year to serve more people in need. Below are our features:
•   Affordable Prices: As domestically manufactured products, we save on import costs and pass the savings on to consumers.
•   Nationwide Service with One Purchase: We have 55 locations across Taiwan, including all counties, cities, and outlying islands.
•   Thoughtful Domestic Design: Specifically developed for Taiwanese people, our design and usage are more in line with the needs of the local population.

org.tc: 麗臺生醫股份有限公司

info.tc: 在智慧醫療應用方面，麗臺生醫結合人工智慧及物聯網技術 (AIoT+Medical+Health)，將身心保健、生活型態追蹤與提供健康管理方案作為第一要務，瞄準生活壓力、心臟活力與血壓體重血糖等三高風險因子應用。透過穿戴裝置 amor H2 健康手環，或 amor H2 Plus 穿戴心電圖記錄器、amor HRV Guard 新一代自律神經檢測儀等醫療終端裝置，結合「amor身心健康管理平台」，整合活動量記錄、睡眠記錄、疲勞指數、循環指數、身體壓力指數、心跳、心電圖、心縮力、血壓、血氧、心房顫動與動脈硬化等重要資訊，進行專業數據分析與AI應用。在疾病診斷及臨床研究上，麗臺與多家醫學中心合作，利用已開發的心電圖與心電心音同軸檢測技術在不同心臟疾病追蹤上已有許多不錯的成果。為守護國人健康，麗臺以身心保健作為第一要務，統整血氧、心電圖、生活壓力、心臟活力、心電心音與血壓體重血糖等三高風險因子於平台中，可完整提供 AI 風險預測。2022 年推出 amor 數位聽診器獲得好評，2023年發表amor 光學分子檢測設備，amor H3 Plus Patch 穿戴 6 導程心電檢測及 8D52 長時間睡眠血氧監測等新品，建構出穿戴式智慧病房的解決方案。2024年麗臺生醫與扶輪社及腦血管疾病防治基金會的高明見教授合作，在雲林、嘉義、南投、澎湖、台東、泰國清邁偏鄉展開「麗臺AI中風預防巡迴篩檢」活動，致力於提升民眾對中風風險的認知，更進一步提升整體醫療水平。
info.en: In the field of smart healthcare applications, Leadtek Biomed combines artificial intelligence and Internet of Things technologies (AIoT+Medical+Health) to prioritize mental and physical well-being, lifestyle tracking, and providing health management solutions. The focus is on addressing risk factors such as stress, cardiovascular vitality, and the "three highs" (hypertension, hyperglycemia, and hyperlipidemia). Using wearable devices like the amor H2 health wristband, amor H2 Plus wearable ECG recorder, and the autonomic nervous system detector amor HRV Guard, along with the "amor Health Management Platform," it integrates essential information such as activity tracking, sleep records, fatigue index, circulation index, body stress index, heart rate, electrocardiogram (ECG), myocardial contractility, blood pressure, blood oxygen levels, atrial fibrillation, and arterial stiffness. This data undergoes professional analysis and AI applications.

org.tc: 品輝科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
品輝科技自成立以來，累積15年以上專業經驗，專注於精密模具開發、模組機構設計與一站式製造服務，致力為客戶提供高穩定、高效率的產品方案。
此次參與醫療科技展，將展出多款非侵入性醫療產品之塑膠構件，涵蓋耳溫槍、體溫計、血壓計、血氧儀、血糖儀、呼吸面罩、消毒噴槍、復健設備、美容儀器等多項產品。除負責產品的外部機構殼件，亦擅長內部精密機構零件的開發製作，並可搭配光學結構與光效設計，提供完整的整合方案。
品輝具備從開模分析、製程優化、供應鏈品質管理到射出製造與組裝的全方位整合能力，並通過 ISO 13485 醫療器材品質管理系統認證，協助醫療品牌與開發單位大幅縮短開發時程、提升品質一致性。
info.en:
With over 15 years of expertise in precision mold development, mechanical module design, and end-to-end manufacturing services, Lumieye Technology delivers high-stability and high-efficiency product solutions for global clients.
At Healthcare+ Expo 2025, we will showcase a wide range of plastic components for non-invasive medical devices, including housings and internal parts for ear thermometers, body thermometers, blood pressure monitors, oximeters, glucose meters, disinfectant sprayers, respiratory masks, rehabilitation devices, and beauty devices. In addition to external housings, we specialize in precision internal components and optical design integration, delivering complete and customized system solutions.
Certified under ISO 13485, we specialize in end-to-end support—from mold flow analysis, process optimization, supply chain quality management, and injection molding and assembly—helping our partners accelerate product development while ensuring high consistency and compliance with medical-grade standards.

info.en: FYM specializes in the processing of various types of very thin metal wires, in particular, materials which are difficult to process. In addition to selling our current materials, we also perform toll manufacturing. Regardless of the quantity to be ordered, we can flexibly deal with it.

info.en: Common medical light boxes on the market generally use white light LED as lighting sources. However, our company's portable white light laser light source box module uses the latest semiconductor white light laser technology in recent years to replace the traditional white light LED solution.

org.tc: 德煌生醫科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
Dr.AI 官網介紹：https://www.draiai.com/
Dr.AI 平台 (免費試用) 醫療專業人員：https://professionals.draiai.com/
Dr.AI 是一款輔助診斷的醫療平台，於 Inpatient 住院端: 整合「入院記錄、醫囑與病程紀錄，結合藥物與癌症治療策略」；Outpatient 門診端: 搭載「 SOAP、護理記錄與會議摘要」，自動生成診療計畫。並內建 Medical Scribe 語音書寫員功能; 另搭載 AI 醫師代理人 (MedPA) 可執行診前會診! 病患候診時即可口述主訴，隨即生成 SOAP 傳送至診間，提升問診效能。
※ Inpatient Care住院照護： 
• 生成 入院記錄 Admission note、醫囑 Order、病程記錄 Progress note  
• 提供 藥物治療 Pharmacotherapy 和 癌症治療策略 Cancer strategy  
• 支援 臨床路徑! 提供輔助診斷的建議
※ Outpatient Care門診照護：
• 輔助 SOAP note、護理記錄 Nursing note 和 會議摘要 Meeting recap  
• 搭載 醫務錄音員 Medical scribe 進行語音轉文字和轉錄
• 簡化 醫病互動流程! 自動生成診療建議方案
(1)	AI 醫師代理人 Avatar (MedPA) – 候診時即可自動記錄患者主訴，生成 
SOAP Note，即時傳送至診間，提升問診效率。
(2)	AI 語音轉錄 & SOAP Note – 即時轉錄醫師與患者對話，自動生成結構化病歷，提升問診效能
※ Public Care大眾照護：
• Dr.AI Smart Ring (醫智環) : 結合智慧指環與AI醫療大腦! 可與AI醫師問診互動、Dr AI可回報生理數據，隨時掌握自身健康，即時取得專業影音回覆
• Vet.AI: 是一款24小時隨問即答的AI獸醫問診平台! 結合語音互動式問診、寵物個案記憶與疾病預防，讓飼主隨時為寵物取得智慧醫療級的健康照護。
info.en:
Dr.AI Homepage: https://www.draiai.com/
Dr.AI Platform (Free Trial) for Healthcare Professionals: https://professionals.draiai.com/
Dr.AI is a diagnostic support platform built to improve clinical efficiency. In inpatient settings, it streamlines workflows by integrating Admission Notes, Orders, Progress Notes, along with Pharmacotherapy and Cancer Treatment Strategies. For outpatient care, Dr.AI supports SOAP Notes, Nursing Notes, and Meeting Recaps to automatically generate structured treatment plans. It also features a built-in Medical Scribe for real-time speech-to-text documentation, and MedPA (Medical Pre-Assessment), which captures patients’ verbal chief complaints during the waiting period and sends a SOAP note directly to the doctor’s workstation.
※ Inpatient Care:
• Generates admission notes, orders, and progress notes. 
• Provides pharmacotherapy and cancer treatment strategies. 
• Supports clinical pathways with diagnostic suggestions. 
※ Outpatient Care:
• Assists with SOAP notes, nursing notes, and meeting recaps. 
• Includes a medical scribe for voice-to-text transcription. 
Simplifies doctor-patient interactions with automated treatment recommendations. 
(1) AI Physician Avatar (MedPA) – Automatically records patients’ chief complaints during the waiting period, generates a SOAP note, and instantly sends it to the consultation room to enhance consultation efficiency.
(2) AI Speech-to-Text & SOAP Note – Instantly transcribes doctor-patient conversations and automatically generates structured medical records, improving consultation effectiveness.
※ Public Care
• Dr.AI Smart Ring:
A smart ring powered by an AI medical brain. It enables interactive consultations with an AI doctor, while Dr AI proactively reports your physiological data - keeping you informed of your health status and delivering professional video feedback anytime.
• Vet.AI is a 24/7 AI-powered veterinary consultation platform 
It features voice-interactive Q&A, personalized memory of your pet’s health 
profile, and proactive disease prevention - giving pet owners access to 
intelligent, medical-grade care anytime.

solution provider based in Hsinchu, Taiwan, utilizing Wi-Fi-Based
ECG+Vitals Telemetry Chest-Patch and AI-Cloud for Real-Time
Proactive Cardiac Event Early Warning Alarm Services to serve global
medical device makers, service providers, and brand owners.

warning alarm services

solutions.

info.tc: ERAD Plus®易瑞得錠劑食品的有效成分均為天然草本植物萃取物，全程在美國GMP藥廠生產製造，經過FDA認證的第三方實驗室的嚴格質量檢測，確保產品的安全性和有效性。2018上市至今深獲客戶信任與肯定!Endoplasmic Reticulum Associated Degradation (ERAD)內質網蛋白降解是細胞正常運作的重要機制，適當的營養攝取可幫助維持健康。易瑞得富含特定成分草本萃取物，以科學研究為基礎，支持內質網相關蛋白降解機制ERAD正常運作，維持細胞健康。
info.en:
ERAD Plus®  tablet supplements are formulated with active ingredients extracted from natural herbal plants. The product is manufactured entirely in a GMP-certified pharmaceutical facility in the United States and undergoes rigorous quality testing by an FDA-certified third-party laboratory to ensure safety and efficacy. Since its launch in 2018, ERAD Plus® has earned the trust and recognition of customers.
Endoplasmic Reticulum Associated Degradation (ERAD) is a crucial cellular mechanism that ensures normal cell function. Proper nutritional intake can support overall health. ERAD Plus® is rich in specific herbal extracts, scientifically formulated to support the proper function of the ERAD mechanism, thereby promoting cellular health.

org.tc: 亞帝昇生物科技有限公司

info.tc: 3D靜脈定位儀為易於使用且可攜式的靜脈可視化醫療設備，可應用於靜脈穿刺領域。本產品透過螢幕呈現高解析3D血管影像，提供清晰的血管脈絡，輔助辨識靜脈位置，在實施靜脈穿刺操作時，以協助醫護人員找到適當的靜脈，有效提高靜脈穿刺成功率、減少穿刺意外引起的併發症、降低患者不適感。
info.en: The 3D vein locator is an easy-to-use and portable vein visualization medical device which is applicable to the field of venipuncture. This product displays high-resolution 3D vascular images on the screen, providing a clear view of the venous structure to assist in identifying vein locations. During venipuncture procedures, it helps medical personnel locate suitable veins, effectively increasing the success rate of venipuncture, reducing complications caused by accidental punctures, and minimizing patient discomfort.

org.tc: 禾新生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
HECP已獲得國家新創獎、及台美日英歐盟等多國專利，我們的專利技術在壓力處理方面重新定義了效率 — 以極其緊湊的設計達到相同的效果。
【產品特點】
- 輕便的設計，讓醫療院所的設置靈活度提升
- 系統運行中產生的身體震動以及聲音更小，提升患者的治療體驗
- 簡易的操作介面，降低醫護人員的學習曲線
- 台灣技術自主研發，獲得第17屆國家新創獎，並擁有台美日英等多國專利
info.en:
HECP won the National Innovation Award and patents from Taiwan, the United States, Japan, and the European Union. Our patented technology redefines efficiency in pressure processing—achieving the same results with a remarkably compact design.
【HECP Product Features】
- Lightweight design enhances the flexibility of installation in medical facilities.
- Reduced body vibrations and noise during system operation improve the patient’s treatment experience.
- Easy-to-use interface lowers the learning curve for healthcare personnel.
- Independently developed with Taiwanese technology, awarded the 17th National Innovation Award, and holds patents in Taiwan, the U.S., Japan, 
U.K.,and other countries.

org.tc: 宇康生科股份有限公司

info.tc: APrevent VOIS (可調式新式咽喉植入物) 是專為第一型甲狀軟骨成形術所設計的長期植入物，也是全球目前唯一可於手術中及手術後調整的長期咽喉植入物。其由醫療級、低致敏性的矽膠及鈦金屬組成、共有四個尺寸，可滿足於不同性別、身形的患者需求，獨特構型設計，透過Inject membrane (注射閥) 將生理食鹽水注入矽膠氣球精準微調矽膠氣球膨脹程度，達到聲門最佳的閉合效果。術後則可經皮注射生理食鹽水進行微調，全程於門診進行，讓單側聲帶麻痹(UVFP)和聲門閉合不全患者的聲門閉合狀態及聲音品質、吞嚥功能等維持最佳狀態。APrevent VOIS 的專用手術器械可使手術流程標準化，有效縮短手術時間，降低手術可能衍生的併發症、感染及再手術等風險。
info.en: APrevent VOIS is specifically designed for medialization thyroplasty procedure for treatment of unilateral vocal fold paralysis and/or glottic insufficiency. The goal is to get optimized results with reduced complications and revision rates. It is the first implant in the market that can be adjusted both intra- and postoperatively. Postoperative implant adjustments make it possible to optimize individual needs without revision surgery.
