org.tc: 慧誠智醫股份有限公司

info.tc: 慧誠智醫股份有限公司擁有醫學中心臨床資源、醫療軟體研發團隊、系統整合工程團隊與專業的顧問規劃團隊，專注以物聯網(IoT)最新科技建置下一代的整合照護平台，讓醫、護、病借助雲端服務平台，提供最優質的全面照護與即時的多方溝通(Fast Healthcare Interoperability)，進而提高病患滿意度、降低護理人員工作負擔，並協助防止醫療錯誤發生。我們是最能理解醫療專業與ICT科技語言的公司，期許成為亞洲最專業的智慧醫療系統商以及智慧醫院與專科智慧醫療應用的最佳夥伴。
info.en:
imedtac possesses clinical resources from medical centers, a team dedicated to medical software development, a system engineering team, and a professional consulting and planning team. We leverage the latest Internet of Things (IoT) technologies to build the next-generation integrated care platform that improves patient satisfaction, reduces nursing workload, and assists in preventing medical errors. 
We are a company that speaks both medical expertise and ICT technology language. We aim to become Asia's most professional smart medical system provider and the best partner for smart hospitals and specialized smart medical applications.

org.tc: 泰美緹康生醫股份有限公司

info.tc: 泰美緹康生醫股份有限公司專注於再生醫學及精準醫療領域，致力於開發具臨床應用潛力的細胞治療與生醫材料產品，推動創新技術從實驗室邁向臨床應用。本次於2025台灣醫療科技展將重點展示核心外泌體製程平台及鼻嗅幹細胞技術兩大研發亮點。外泌體製程平台為公司自主開發之關鍵技術，能依據不同來源細胞進行高效分離與純化，並最大程度保留外泌體內具活性的蛋白質及核酸因子，適用於皮膚修復、神經再生及免疫調節等多元醫療應用，為外泌體相關產品臨床轉譯提供高品質技術支持。同時展出之鼻嗅幹細胞分離與培養產品，已透過多項疾病動物模式驗證具多重治療潛力，並具良好生物安全性，可望成為神經退化性疾病及組織修復等領域的新興治療選項。泰美緹康已與多家臨床醫院及國內外產學研單位展開合作，積極推進技術臨床驗證及國際市場佈局，期望以創新平台與產品，為再生醫療產業帶來突破性進展，提供病患更多元且安全有效的治療新方案。
info.en:
Top Medical Biomedical Co., Ltd. specializes in regenerative medicine and precision healthcare, focusing on developing cell therapies and advanced biomedical materials with strong clinical potential. At the 2025 Taiwan Healthcare+ Expo, we will present two key innovations: our proprietary exosome processing platform and nasal olfactory stem cell technology.
Our exosome platform allows efficient isolation and purification from various cell sources while preserving essential bioactive molecules, enabling high-quality applications in skin repair, neural regeneration, and immune modulation. This technology lays a solid foundation for advancing exosome-based therapies toward clinical use.
Additionally, our olfactory stem cell isolation and culture system has shown promising therapeutic effects and safety in multiple disease animal models, demonstrating potential as a novel treatment for neurodegenerative diseases and tissue repair.
Committed to innovation, Top Medical Biomedical collaborates extensively with hospitals and academic institutions to accelerate clinical validation and expand globally. Our mission is to deliver safe, effective, and innovative solutions that meet the growing demands of regenerative medicine worldwide.

org.tc: 莉蒔科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
莉蒔科技專注於生物科學領域，提供試劑、儀器與技術支援等一站式服務。旗下品牌「BIO-DOC」供應分生與WB相關試劑，品質穩定、深受信賴。
技術服務涵蓋適體開發、PCR 溫度檢測、動物實驗與藥物篩選，並為 Genicore™ 台灣總代理，提供 Genimer™ 適體探針、Exosome ELASA 套組、CD63 與 His-Tag 純化套組，有效支援外泌體與標靶研究。
再生醫學方面，獨家代理 ROKIT Dr. INVIVO 4D 生物列印機，已於國際間成功應用於皮膚與軟骨組織再生，並積極投入腎臟再生之臨床試驗。同時引進華立 Sbio 3D細胞培養盤，支援快速且可重複的球狀細胞培養，特別適用於藥物篩選與癌症研究；BioStellar™ 類器官培養平台則整合微流道設計，可模擬血流狀態，提供細胞藥物代謝與毒理反應等交互作用的環境。
莉蒔科技致力成為科學研究人員值得信賴的合作夥伴，推動生命科學的創新與應用。
info.en:
LIS TECH focuses on life sciences, offering reagents, instruments, and technical support as a one-stop solution. Its BIO-DOC brand provides high-quality, trusted reagents for molecular biology and Western blotting. Services include Aptamer development, PCR calibration, animal studies, and drug screening. As the official distributor of Genicore™ in Taiwan, LIS TECH supplies Genimer™ aptamer probes, Exosome ELASA kits, CD63, and His-Tag purification kits to support exosome and targeted research.
We also provide the ROKIT Dr. INVIVO 4D bioprinter for regenerative research and introduce the Sbio 3D Cell Culture Plate, designed for fast, reproducible spheroid culture—ideal for drug screening and cancer research. The BioStellar™ organoid culture platform integrates microfluidic technology to simulate blood flow, enabling in vitro studies of drug metabolism and toxicity interactions.
LIS TECH is committed to supporting researchers with reliable tools and innovative solutions for advancing life science research.

org.tc: 芯元生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
芯元生醫憑藉領先的 Genimer 適體篩選設計技術平台，提供客製化Genimer開發服務，重新定義核酸適體的應用潛力。我們的 Genimer克服了傳統抗體在成本、開發時間與批次穩定性上的限制，以其小分子結構、快速開發週期、高親和力與優異製程穩定性，為客戶提供客製化解決方案。
Genimer的廣泛應用性使其成為多種檢測平台與產品的理想選擇，例如：螢光探針、類 ELISA 平台。在此次展會中，我們隆重推出基於 Genimer 創新的成果：外泌體 CD9&CD63 檢測套組，以及高效的外泌體純化產品和 His-Tag 蛋白純化產品。我們深知外泌體在未來疾病診斷與治療中的關鍵作用，因此推出外泌體miRNA分析產品，這項創新工具能精準分析外泌體中的微小核糖核酸 (miRNA)，為疾病診斷、個人化治療及組織再生等研究開闢新道路。
我們深信 Genimer 將成為醫療診斷、寵物疾病檢測、食品安全檢驗、健康管理與環境檢測等領域的革命性工具。誠摯邀請您與我們共同開創生物科技的未來！
info.en:
Genicore Biotech Co., Ltd. is redefining the potential of nucleic acid aptamers through our leading Genimer nucleic acid aptamer screening platform. We offer Custom Genimer Development Services. Our Genimer overcome the limitations of traditional antibodies in terms of cost, development time, and batch stability. With their small molecular structure, rapid development cycle, high affinity, and excellent manufacturing stability, they provide tailored solutions for our clients.
The broad applicability of Genimer makes it an ideal choice for various detection platforms and products, including: fluorescence probes, ELISA-like platforms, Western blot, flow cytometry, biosensors, and lateral flow immunoassays. At this exhibition, we are proud to introduce innovative products developed using Genimer technology: the CD9 & CD63 Exosome Detection Kit, as well as highly efficient Exosome Capture Kit and His-Tag Protein Capture Kit.
Recognizing the critical role of exosomes in future disease diagnosis and therapy, we are also introducing our Exosome miRNA Assay Product. This innovative tool provides precise analysis of microRNA (miRNA) in exosomes, paving the way for new research directions in disease diagnosis, personalized medicine, and tissue regeneration.
We firmly believe that Genimer will be a revolutionary tool in fields such as medical diagnosis, pet disease detection, food safety inspection, health management, environmental testing, and academic research. We sincerely invite you to join us in shaping the future of biotechnology!

org.tc: 禾榮科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
禾榮科技股份有限公司創立於2017年，致力於推動加速器型硼中子捕獲治療(AB-BNCT)，提供先進技術與全方位服務，公司技術源自清華大學與工研院的前瞻研究，成功轉譯為具臨床可行性的創新治療方案。
2024年，禾榮取得台灣TFDA醫療器材許可證，為BNCT臨床應用奠定關鍵里程碑，BNCT是一種利用硼-10選擇性累積於腫瘤細胞，再以熱中子照射產生核反應來殺死癌細胞的精準放射技術，具高選擇性與極短的作用範圍，能大幅降低對正常組織的傷害。
info.en:
Founded in 2017 in Hsinchu, Taiwan, Heron Neutron Medical Corp.(Heron) has emerged as a leader
in Accelerator-Based Boron Neutron Capture Therapy (AB-BNCT), providing total solutions with
cutting-edge technology and professional service. Our roots lie in groundbreaking research from
National Tsing Hua University and Industrial Technology Research Institute, which we transformed into
a clinically viable solution. In 2024, Heron achieved a significant milestone by obtaining TFDA certification for the medical device. We proudly lead innovation in cancer treatment technology.
At Heron, we are dedicated to advancing BNCT technologies, aiming to make a global impact by delivering precise and effective cancer treatment solutions to patients worldwide.

org.tc: 均泰生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 均泰公司以次世代定序（illumina NGS）技術為主軸，提供客戶自樣品製備、定序至後端生物資訊分析之完整解決方案。除了包含基因體學之精準定序設備及試劑銷售服務、生物資訊分析、高效能核酸/蛋白質萃取系統等研究應用，也代理單細胞定序、多重抗體染色及影像擷取系統等儀器設備，滿足基礎與臨床研究端全方位領域客戶的需求。
info.en:
Genetech Biotech provides NGS-based total solutions and technical support with complete workflows from sample preparation, bulk/single-cell sequencing to bioinformatic analysis.
Besides genomic related products, we also provide multiomic solutions like nucleic acid/protein extraction, CTC isolation and multiplex imaging system, devoting our efforts to fulfill the comprehensive needs of research and clinical customers.

org.tc: 瑞基海洋生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
次世代定序（NGS）技術快速發展，已廣泛應用於罕見疾病、癌症標靶、感染源追蹤及全基因體定序（WGS）等臨床與研究場域，逐步成為精準醫療的核心技術之一。然而，目前NGS仍面臨樣本處理與文庫製備流程複雜、人力需求高等挑戰，阻礙其於第一線檢驗實務中的普及。
SATLite Mini 是瑞基海洋生技自主開發的低通量自動化NGS建庫系統，專為樣本量不高但應用頻繁的實驗室設計。設備體積輕巧、操作簡易，採用封閉式試劑卡匣設計，可有效降低交叉污染與人工操作誤差，提升文庫一致性與流程安全性。使用者僅需少量培訓，即可執行標準化建庫流程。
本系統搭配符合 ISO 13485 及 LDTs 規範的在地建庫試劑，可導入至臨床實驗室、公衛單位、區域醫院或POCT場域，打造由樣本到文庫的全自動流程。SATLite Mini 期望作為精準醫療在地落地的關鍵橋梁，協助更多醫療單位建置屬於自己的NGS能力，擴大基因檢測在臨床的應用廣度與深度。
info.en:
Next-generation sequencing (NGS) is transforming clinical diagnostics, from rare disease detection to targeted cancer therapy and whole genome sequencing (WGS). However, the complex and labor-intensive library preparation process remains a major barrier to widespread adoption.
SATLite Mini is a low-throughput, benchtop NGS library prep system developed by GeneReach Biotechnology. Designed for labs with limited daily sample volume but high-frequency needs, it features a compact footprint and closed reagent cartridge system to reduce contamination and user error. Paired with in-house developed reagents, it streamlines workflows and improves library quality.
Compliant with ISO 13485 and LDTs regulatory standards, SATLite Mini is already undergoing validation with clinical partners. It is ideal for regional hospitals, public health institutes, and POCT applications, helping bring NGS closer to the frontlines of precision medicine.

org.tc: 瑞基海洋生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
SATLite- 次世代定序自動建庫系統
由台灣自主研發生產的SATLite次世代定序自動建庫系統，專為提升實驗室效率而設計。此系統自動化次世代定序建庫流程，顯著降低人工成本與人為錯誤，確保高重複性和穩定性，同時提供更靈活的檢測排程，大幅優化建庫效率。
無論是提升疾病診斷的準確性、推動個人化醫療，還是促進新藥物研發，次世代定序技術已為生醫及公衛領域帶來革命性變革。SATLite的自動化能力，能顯著減少次世代定序過程中的人工干預，進而提升實驗室的生產力與定序結果的精確度。
瑞基科技作為整合設備與試劑的領航者，持續優化並擴展文庫製備自動化流程，並與各領域權威單位密切合作，共同開發適用於自動化設備的文庫製備試劑，協助實驗室簡化操作，推動次世代定序檢測的全面自動化，進一步鞏固瑞基在分子檢測領域的市場地位。
info.en:
SATLite - Automated Library Preparation System for Next-Generation Sequencing
Developed and produced in Taiwan, the SATLite system is designed to enhance next-generation sequencing (NGS) laboratory efficiency. It automates the NGS library preparation process, significantly reducing labor costs and human errors, ensuring high reproducibility and stability, and offering flexible scheduling to optimize library preparation efficiency.
NGS technology has revolutionized the biomedical and public health fields, improving disease diagnosis accuracy, advancing personalized medicine, and facilitating new drug development. SATLite’s automation capabilities help minimize manual intervention, boosting laboratory productivity and sequencing accuracy.
As a leader in integrating equipment and reagents, GeneReach works in close partnership with experts across different domains to continuously optimize and expand automated library preparation processes, further solidifying its market position in molecular diagnostics.

org.tc: 雲象科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
雲象科技（aetherAI）是一家專注於醫學影像AI技術的公司，致力於推動數位病理學的進步，並提升診斷準確性和醫療效率。此次展出將重點展示三項核心產品：

aetherSlide：這是一個整合了多種AI應用的數位病理系統，支持高效的醫療工作流程，並具備與各類實驗室和醫院系統兼容的特點，適用於全球不同市場。

aetherAI Hema：全球首款AI骨髓差異計數工具，精準識別並分類骨髓細胞，顯著提高血液病診斷的速度和準確性，幫助醫療專業人士更快地做出診斷。

aetherAI Endo：即時自動偵測大腸息肉的AI工具，提升了大腸癌篩查的精度和效率，提供全方位的解決方案，支持多廠商平台，並與多家頂尖醫療機構合作。
info.en:
aetherAI is a leader in AI-powered medical imaging, focusing on digital pathology advancements. Our key products include:

aetherSlide: A digital pathology system integrating multiple AI applications.
aetherAI Hema: The world\'s first AI for bone marrow differential counting, improving diagnosis speed and precision in hematology.
aetherAI Endo: An AI tool for real-time colorectal polyp detection, improving the accuracy and efficiency of colorectal cancer screenings.

org.tc: 列特博生技股份有限公司

info.tc:
LabTurbo 提供一套全自動化分子生物檢測平台(AIO)，將 DNA/RNA 萃取、液體處理及多通道即時 PCR 全部整合於同一系統中，從樣本前處理到結果輸出皆可全自動完成。此系統特別強調檢測的靈敏度、通量與效率，能在短時間內提供高品質的多重基因檢測結果。 
核酸萃取採用高靈敏度的膜柱式技術，可從血液、尿液、糞便與各類拭子樣本中萃取出純度高、品質穩定的 DNA 或 RNA。使用者能在單一設備上完成不同類型的檢測工作。
本系統操作效率能在 1.5 小時內完成 6個檢測，透過連續模式更能在 2 到 3 小時內完成 48 個檢測，並將樣本裝載與耗材準備時間縮短至 10 分鐘以內，符合高檢量實驗室的運作需求。
LabTurbo 的多重 qPCR 檢測套組，均依照臨床重要性及最佳準確度設計，涵蓋 COVID-19、流感、RSV 等呼吸道病毒；肺炎相關病原體如麴黴菌、PJP、黴漿菌；以及泌尿道感染、性傳染疾病、法定傳染病(登革病毒、Mpox…等)、敗血症、肝炎病毒與腦膜炎相關病原體等，滿足醫療機構與實驗室全面性的檢測需求
info.en:
Complete automation of molecular testing that integrates DNA/ RNA extraction, liquid-handling, and multi-channel real-time PCR. Achieve high quality multiplex gene detection with sensitivity, high throughput processing and fast turnaround time
Versatile Nucleic Acid Extraction System High Sensitivity with Membrane Column Method and Diverse Applications
Experience high-quality and sensitive results with pure nucleic acid extraction from various sample types such as blood, urine, stool, and swabs. Our system ensures precise sensitivity for UTI, STD, GI, RPP, sepsis, and HLA-typing. Additionally, our versatile system allows seamless testing of multiple applications, including UTI, RPP, STI, GI, infectious diseases, and more, all in one place
Achieve fast turnaround time and easy system preparation by conducting up to 6 detections in 1.5 hours or 48 detections in 2-3 hours with continuous loading mode. Quickly load samples and consumables in less than 10 minutes for efficient and streamlined testing

貝克曼庫爾特診斷系統使用於複雜的生物醫學測試，遍佈全球醫院、參考實驗室和醫師辦公室。
包含：
1、生物醫學檢測及設備：化學、免疫、血液學、尿液分析、微生物學、血庫、蛋白質化學。
2. 全面實驗室自動化解決方案：設計適合各式實驗室方案並提供快速正確的結果(快速穩定的TAT)、降低分析前錯誤和更高效的工作流程。

info.en:

Including:
1.	Biomedical testing and equipment: Chemistry 、Immunassay 、Heamtology 、Urinalysis 、Microbiology、 Blood Banking、 Protein Chemistry.
2.	Total laboratory automation solutions: Deliver accurate results with rapid, consistent TAT, fewer pre-analytical errors, and more efficient workflows designed to fit any laboratory.
3.	Deliver Greater Insights Through Lab IT: REMISOL Advance middleware and the DxONE portfolio.

info.tc:
冷泉港生物科技股份有限公司是專業技術代理全球知名精準醫療儀器品牌，建立國際信譽與知名度。深耕大中華地區精密儀器及試劑銷售通路超過30年，設立台北、台中、台南、及中國等營業據點。公司設有研發檢測實驗室，提供客戶檢測服務、解決方案與專案合作。

產品與服務

info.en:
Cold Spring Biotech Corp. is a professional technical agent representing globally renowned brands in precision medical instruments, establishing an international reputation and recognition. With over 30 years of deep roots in sales channels for precision instruments and reagents across Greater China, the company has established operational bases in Taipei, Taichung, Tainan, and mainland China. The company also operates an R&D and testing laboratory, providing clients with testing services, solutions, and project collaborations.

Products & Services
Cold Spring Biotech Corp. offers diverse product integration solutions applied in fields such as precision medicine, microbiome research, cell therapy, and regeneration. Our represented products include:

A. Precision Medical Equipment
B. Cell Therapy Products
C. Automation Equipment
D. Nucleic Acid Testing Related Products
E. Small Animal Imaging Equipment

org.tc: 矽基分子電測科技股份有限公司

info.tc: Molsentech是一家以生物奈米矽場效電晶體（Bio-FET）為核心技術的公司，專注於研發新一代高靈敏、即時、無標記的生物感測平台。我們致力於將半導體技術導入醫療與精準健康領域，以突破傳統檢測在速度與靈敏度上的限制，實現疾病早期診斷與健康監測的革新。本公司之Bio-FET半導體生醫晶片與檢測儀，結合IC設計、微流道異質封裝、化學表面修飾及高通量數據處理等跨領域技術。Bio-FET半導體生醫晶片檢測平台可以即時偵測核酸、抗體、抗原及環境化學物質等分子標的，將分子與探針結合反應直接轉換為電訊號輸出。其檢測過程無需螢光標記、無需核酸擴增，操作簡便且靈敏度極高，能有效解決疾病早期檢測不準或偵測不到的問題，為臨床檢測市場帶來全新篇章。
info.en:
Molsentech is an innovative company centered on Bio-Nano Silicon Field-Effect Transistor (Bio-FET) technology. It focuses on developing a new generation of highly sensitive, real-time, and label-free biosensing platforms. The company is dedicated to introducing semiconductor technology into the fields of medical diagnostics and precision health, aiming to overcome the limitations of traditional detection methods in terms of speed and sensitivity, and to revolutionize early disease diagnosis and health monitoring.
Molsentech’s Bio-FET semiconductor biomedical chips and detection instruments integrate interdisciplinary technologies including IC design, microfluidic heterogeneous packaging, chemical surface modification, and high-throughput data processing. Bio-FET’s semiconductor biochip platform can instantly detect molecular targets such as nucleic acids, antibodies, antigens, and environmental chemicals in simply processed samples. It directly converts the molecular-probe binding reactions into electrical signals.
The detection process requires no fluorescent labeling or nucleic acid amplification, offering simple operation and extremely high sensitivity. This enables accurate and rapid early disease detection, addressing issues of inaccuracy or failure in early diagnostic testing, and setting a new chapter for clinical diagnostics.

org.tc: 伯森生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
伯森生技的成立宗旨是希望以零時差的速度將最新的知識與技術產品引進國內，為提升國內生物技術產業研發能量盡一份心力。
我們目前代理 Abcam、Enzo Life Sciences、Revvity、AnaSpec、ibidi、Mirus Bio、Navinci Diagnostics、ScienCell、PacBio、Vizgen、VWR, part of Avantor、BioChain、Eurogentec、Gene Tools、Jena Bioscience 和 Hanna Instruments 等數十家國際知名生命科學研究試劑、耗材與設備廠商。
伯森仍將持續藉由參加國際展覽、閱讀期刊文獻以及產學合作等方式，並經過審慎專業的篩選與評估，為國內研究領域發掘出更多優質的技術與產品。
info.en: Blossom Biotechnologies, Inc., established in July 1998, has over 20 years of experience bringing cutting-edge scientific technologies to Taiwan’s life science industry. We are dedicated to providing high-quality RUO products and personalized support through strong partnerships with innovative brands like Abcam, PacBio, Vizgen, Revvity, ibidi, Mirus Bio, Enzo Life Sciences, AnaSpec, Navinci Diagnostics, ScienCell, VWR, part of Avantor, BioChain, Eurogentec, Gene Tools, and Jena Bioscience . Our broad distribution channels across Taiwan ensure timely delivery, while our expert team offers tailored solutions to help customers achieve their research goals. We value customer feedback, aiming to build long-term partnerships and contribute to the growth of life science advancements in Taiwan, living up to our name—BLOSSOM.

org.tc: 康博醫創股份有限公司

info.tc:
康博醫創（Micronbrane Medical）致力於開發創新的感染性病原體檢測解決方案，協助臨床醫師更快速、精確地進行診斷與治療。我們開發的Devin™ 宿主去除過濾器能有效從液體樣本中去除人類有核細胞，顯著提升微生物核酸濃度，解決傳統測序中宿主背景干擾過大的問題。
基於此核心技術，我們打造了PaRTI-Seq™（Pathogen Real-Time Identification by Sequencing）平台，結合總體基因組定序方法，可在24 小時內無需培養地鑑別樣本中所有潛在的病原體，涵蓋細菌、病毒、真菌、寄生蟲與部分抗藥性基因。與傳統培養相比，PaRTI-Seq™ 提供更快速、更全面的診斷資訊，特別適用於以下臨床情境：
1. 敗血症或重症感染需快速決策
2. 不明原因發燒（FUO）
3. 免疫抑制患者感染追蹤
4. 懷疑多重病原感染的複雜個案
目前該技術已於數百個臨床樣本中完成驗證，展現出極高的靈敏度與臨床可行性。臨床結果亦已在國際期刊發表。我們的目標是協助醫師縮短診斷時間、優化抗生素使用、提升感染控制效率，進而改善病人預後並降低醫療成本。
info.en:
Micronbrane Medical is advancing the field of clinical microbiology through innovative tools that enhance the sensitivity and speed of pathogen detection in liquid samples. Our proprietary Devin™ Host Depletion Filter is designed to efficiently remove host nucleated cells, enabling significant enrichment of microbial nucleic acids without the need for culture or extensive sample processing. This process improves signal-to-noise ratios in sequencing-based assays and enhances detection of low-abundance pathogens.
We have integrated this technology into our metagenomic sequencing workflow, PaRTI-Seq™ (Pathogen Real-Time Identification by Sequencing). PaRTI-Seq™ allows for unbiased, culture-independent identification of bacterial, viral, and fungal organisms within 24 hours, addressing critical limitations of conventional diagnostics. The method has been successfully validated on a diverse set of clinical and non-clinical liquid samples, demonstrating robustness in both pathogen detection and microbial community profiling.
Our platform holds particular promise in cases of sepsis, febrile illness of unknown origin, immunocompromised patients, and polymicrobial infections. By simplifying and accelerating pathogen identification, Micronbrane’s solutions support earlier clinical decision-making and antimicrobial stewardship.

org.tc: 育聖企業有限公司

info.tc:
【Hettich】德國離心機，安靜耐用、低維護，平均使用壽命7–8年以上；金屬結構、維護率低，提供氣溶膠密封轉子與5年保固，兼顧臨床與血庫流程的安全與效率。
【Accumax】移液器／吸頭依ISO 8655規範、於ISO 17025實驗室校正；具容量鎖定、防誤觸、低力操作，整支可高壓滅菌，並有8／12通道機型，提升通量與一致性。
【ICOMES】筆型電子移液器pipetty，135 mm／75 g，支援連續定量與自動溫度補償，長時間操作仍維持精度；Tofutty磁驅活塞直推注射器，0.1 µL亦具高重現性，降低空氣干擾。
info.en:
Hettich: quiet, low‑maintenance German centrifuges with 7+ yr life and aerosol‑tight rotors.
Accumax: ISO8655/17025 pipettes—volume‑lock, low‑force, autoclavable; 8/12‑channel options.
ICOMES: pipetty pen‑type e‑pipette (135 mm/75 g) with temp‑comp; Tofutty magnetic plunger for 0.1 µL repeatable dosing.

org.tc: 新加坡商必帝股份有限公司台灣分公司
org.en: Becton Dickinson Holdings Pte. Ltd. Taiwan Branch (Singapore)

info.tc:
BD台灣分公司在台服務已屆38年，持續創新研發由醫療部、生命科學部及醫療介入部等三大板塊的產品與服務，增進全球人類健康。

近年來傳染病傳播及抗藥性細菌一直是國家衛生單位面臨挑戰且投注資源的議題，除了要有正確的感控觀念更要提升對臨床服務的精確性及時效；傳統的感染診斷仰賴繁複的手工動作及主觀專業的養成，自動化、資訊化至智能化已為時代的趨勢。BD整合診斷解決方案部門提供微生物實驗室分析前中後解決方案，為醫院客製化規劃及建置達到精實流程與智能醫療發展的實現。
info.en:
BD Taiwan Branch has been serving Taiwan for 38 years, continuously innovating and developing products and services across its three major divisions: Medical, Life Sciences, and Interventional Medicine, to enhance global human health.

In recent years, the spread of infectious diseases and drug-resistant bacteria have been challenging and resource-intensive issues for national health authorities. Beyond the need for a sound infection control approach, improving the accuracy and timeliness of clinical services is crucial. Traditional infection diagnosis relies on complex manual procedures and subjective expertise, but automation, information technology, and even intelligent technology are becoming the new trends. BD\'s Integrated Diagnostic Solutions division provides pre-, mid-, and post-analysis solutions for microbiology laboratories, enabling hospitals to customize the planning and implementation of lean processes and intelligent healthcare.

org.tc: 啟新生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 啟新生技定位在於台灣生技醫藥公司的事業夥伴及新興產品進入市場的引導者，迎合新興生技醫藥的發展不斷推陳出新跨世代產品，如速得百森 SD BIOSENSOR是市面上唯一擁有最多檢測項目的快篩檢測平台，有助於檢驗單位整合所有檢測品項；產品符合標準化、自動化、數位化的特性。如STANDARD F Fluorescence Immunoassay 、STANDARD M10 Molecular Diagnostics結合免疫與分生的快速精準檢驗原理，因應現行醫療即時的診斷數據同時可適當地減輕技術員的檢驗工作。除了醫療檢驗之外，亦跨至場所環境監測的升級；囊括製藥、生醫、生技、各院所等。串聯消毒劑(VAI)、空氣收集器(Emtek/MD8)至後端的數據彙整EM軟體，提供完善與多元的產品供應服務。透過提供專業服務，進而強化實驗室與企業的檢驗與驗證能力，提高人類福祉一直是啟新和社會一同努力和新創的目標。
info.en: Creative Life Science Co. Ltd. is to be a leader in guiding Taiwanese biopharmaceutical companies\' business partnerships and the entry of emerging products into the market, catering to the development of emerging biopharmaceuticals. Continuously introducing new cross-generational products, such as the SD BIOSENSOR, which is the rapid screening platform on the market with the most extensive range of detection items. This aids testing facilities in integrating all testing items, with products that adhere to standardization, automation, and digitization features. Products like STANDARD F Fluorescence Immunoassay and STANDARD M10 Molecular Diagnostics combine immunology and molecular principles for rapid and precise testing, addressing the need for real-time diagnostic data in current medical practices while appropriately relieving the workload of technicians.Beyond medical testing, there\'s a focus on elevating environmental monitoring in various settings, including pharmaceuticals, biomedicine, biotechnology, and institutions. This includes a range from disinfectants (VAI) and Air Sampler (Emtek/MD8) to backend data consolidation with the EM software, providing comprehensive and diverse product supply services. Through the provision of professional services, the aim is to strengthen laboratory and enterprise testing and verification capabilities, indirectly enhancing human well-being. This has always been Creative Life Science\'s collaborative goal with society, striving for innovation.

org.tc: 拜爾國際股份有限公司

info.tc: 拜爾國際股份有限公司致力於打造以抗體為核心的「BioAbfun-抗體串流服務平台」，整合「抗體採購 × 數據應用 × 疾病預測」三大關鍵面向，提出具創新性與實用性的抗體串流平台，回應當前科研單位面臨的痛點，包括抗體選擇困難、資訊分散、實驗失敗率高與，成本壓力等痛點問題。

info.tc: AIRDIS系統專注於臨床微生物感染症之病原菌菌種鑑定與抗藥性預測，提升臨床診斷能力。其可預測病原菌之菌種與抗藥性，為醫生提供更快、更經濟的用藥指導。主要競爭優勢包括：(1) 高準確度；(2) 快速檢測；(3) 簡單的樣品製備；(4) 非毒性試劑；(5) 具競爭力的價格。
info.en: The AIRDIS system focuses on microbial identification and antimicrobial resistance, enhancing clinical diagnostics. It predicts pathogens and resistance, offering doctors a faster, cost-effective solution for medication guidance. The main competitive advantages are: (1). High accuracy; (2). Fast detection; (3). Simple preparation; (4). Nontoxic reagent; (5). Competitive price.

org.tc: 希森美康
諾亞克科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
諾亞克科技股份有限公司（U-ARK Technology Co., Ltd.）成立於2011年，專注於智慧健康照護與雲端系統平台的研發與整合。公司致力於以創新科技打造人性化的長照與醫療解決方案，產品涵蓋居家照護、護理之家、智慧病房等應用情境，具備從硬體裝置到系統平台的整合能力。
公司主力產品「uCare智慧照護系統」廣泛應用於全台多家長照與醫療機構，並結合AI語音助理、行動裝置、物聯網感測器，實現精準照護與即時管理。近年亦積極投入5G、AI、IoT等新興技術應用，拓展智慧城市與遠距照護市場，致力成為數位健康與智慧照護領域的領導者。
info.en:
U-ARK Technology Co., Ltd., established in 2011, is a Taiwan-based company dedicated to the research, development, and integration of intelligent healthcare and cloud-based service platforms. With a mission to humanize long-term care and medical services through technology, U-ARK provides end-to-end solutions covering home care, nursing homes, and smart wards.
Its flagship product, the “uCare Smart Care System,” is widely adopted across Taiwan’s long-term care and healthcare institutions. The system integrates AI voice assistants, mobile devices, and IoT sensors to enable precise and real-time care management. In recent years, U-ARK has expanded its scope into cutting-edge fields such as 5G, AI, and smart city applications, aiming to be a leading player in the digital health and smart care industry.

org.tc: 日勝生活科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
有鑑於台灣社會人口年齡結構超高齡，為呼應台灣高齡在宅養老政策，日勝生於2015年投入康養事業的地產開發。
為中高齡族群預備適老住宅，規劃有「家」歸屬感之全人、全家、全程服務的樂齡宅。

日勝生集團以「銀光計畫」與「全齡健康」作為核心，由子公司集順生活科技股份有限公司結合康養事業與地產開發， 2018年成立樂陶居為銀髮樂齡出租宅品牌，並於新北市中和區設立首館，其服務口碑已獲得市場的肯定。 2020年於新北市三芝區結合康養事業與地產開發，將在宅養老的理念升級為銀養樂齡複合園區：租賃型樂齡宅「樂陶居」及出售型「日初不老莊園」等模式運營。 2024年於新北市板橋區浮洲合宜社區成立樂林會館活動據點，讓在宅養老升級擴大為社區營造。2025年底樂陶居三芝館正式營運。

美納里尼意維能®全系列，掌握無齡生活的關鍵！
新加坡商美納里尼醫藥有限公司台灣分公司，身為全球性製藥公司，秉持135年來對創新、研發及健康管理的堅持，致力於提升國人生活品質 。我們深知台灣已於2025年邁入「超高齡社會」，「走得動」、「睡得好」、「看得清」及「鎖得住」是健康長壽的關鍵要素。因此，美納里尼在本次醫療科技展「無齡專區」，隆重推出意維能®全系列產品，皆由義大利百年藥廠研發、監製，堅持科學實證、足量成分、安心保證三大原則 ，不含西藥，安全無負擔 ，為您打造全方位的無齡健康解決方案 ！我們誠摯邀請您蒞臨「無齡專區」，與我們的專業團隊交流，一同開啟健康活躍的無齡新生活！

Sustenium® Series – Unlocking Ageless Living!

info.tc:
用溫熱的關懷
守護每一次身體的疲憊
使用石墨碳纖維與黑陶瓷石，加熱後持續均勻釋放熱能，安全穩定提供深層熱敷。
石墨烯擁有極高的導熱性和導電性，可以快速吸收外部能量。當石墨烯被通電或加熱時，內部碳原子結構會因能量激發而產生振動，釋放波長約8-12微米的遠紅外線，而這些波長的遠紅外線能深入肌膚底層與組織，與人體水份共振使深層溫度上升，有助改善微循環、促進新陳代謝以及減輕疲勞。
深層健康排汗
最佳的體內保養
高效導熱 持久穩定
利用石墨碳纖維導熱到黑陶瓷石，當黑陶瓷石聚熱到一定程度時，便會開始釋放能量，啟動溫熱循環，遠紅外線會穿透皮膚直達深層肌理，有效提升血液循環並緩解肌肉緊繃，提升人體細胞活化功能，深入肌理活絡循環。
創新材質 材料優勢
耐溫皮革
耐高溫、有彈性、不易斷裂，可阻絕體熱溫度向外流。
採用義大利-人造精密皮革。台灣製造手工縫製
玻璃纖維棉
結構緊密、抗拉力、彈性佳。
質地輕，兼具良好防火特性。極具柔軟性之保暖材質
石墨碳纖
均勻發熱，超低電磁波趨近於０，耐高溫熱能傳導佳。
取代危險電線傳導，良好快速導熱性能
黑陶瓷石
高硬度、高強度、耐高溫、耐磨損、耐腐蝕、抗氧化。
質地輕，兼具良好防火特性。極具柔軟性之保暖材質

info.tc: Insumate 專利定序19肽(苦瓜胜肽)：首位取得美國FDA NDI認可，促進新陳代謝聖品。Antromax 固態培養牛樟芝菌絲體：全球首例通過美國FDA NDI 認證，彩色人生代表素材。Zymologist 101綜合蔬果發酵液: 低糖高纖，富含彩虹營養素。RabenLiv 神仙菜萃取：增強體力，維持青春活力。RabenWhite 昭和草萃取：養顏美容，青春美麗。Citrusvel 柑橘萃取：幫助調節生理機能。MussLift 藍貽貝萃取：滋補強身，增強體力。Beausaki 燕窩萃取：養顏美容，營養補給。
info.en: Insumate: 1st NDI approved Bitter Melon Peptide to improve and prevent metabolic syndromes. Antromax: 1st NDI approved solid cultured antrodia cinnamomea mycelia to enhance overall liver wellness and anti-hangovers. Zymologist: Phyto fermented goodness from 101 fruits and vegetables with low GI while rich in dietary fiber and anti-oxidants. RabenLiv: Natural extract of C. rabens for liver and overall wellbeing. RabenWhite: Natural extract of C. rabens for wrinkles, collagen contents and clinical proven anti-aging. Citrusvel: Novel Citrus Flavonoids for lipid metabolism with application among cholesterols, weight management and skin inflammation. MussLift: Marine-powered peptides to boost muscle mass and enhance physical performance. BeauSaki: Premium swiftlet-derived peptides for brighter, clearer, and more radiant skin.

org.tc: 勝得棻國際股份有限公司

info.tc:
睡眠撲滿是一款結合低頻共振技術的智慧助眠裝置，透過「睡眠頻率科技（SFT）」，幫助人體腦波放鬆，提升深層睡眠比例。核心技術由成功大學 張凌昇教授團隊研發，致力於睡眠專業。本產品已與醫療院所專案合作，提供醫護專案，也擴及高齡照護單位。除了協助病患改善淺眠、失眠與夜間醒來問題，也針對醫護人員輪班疲勞恢復、提供睡眠支持，成為照顧者與被照顧者雙向睡眠品質提升的重要工具。
睡眠撲滿具有操作簡便、無聲光、長期使用能平衡睡眠品質不佳等特性，適合於護理站小憩區、輪班醫護休息室、居家長照人員照護應用，協助高壓、高負荷環境中的醫護人員放鬆，提升身心與睡眠品質。睡眠撲滿的研發初衷即為「以科技照顧人的睡眠」；高度運轉的環境充斥著高頻使人的情緒與生活方式過度焦慮與緊張，睡眠撲滿以極低頻導引腦波放鬆，使人能夠掌握以慢且穩的頻率自我調節，讓身心獲得真正休息。
info.en: SleepBank is a smart sleep-aid device that utilizes low-frequency resonance technology to help relax brainwaves and increase deep sleep duration through its proprietary Sleep Frequency Technology (SFT). The core technology is developed by Professor Lin-Sheng Chang and his team at National Cheng Kung University, focusing on advanced sleep science.The product has been implemented in collaborative projects with hospitals and medical institutions, including specialized programs for healthcare professionals and elderly care facilities. It supports not only patients with shallow sleep, insomnia, or frequent night awakenings, but also provides restorative sleep solutions for shift-working medical staff, making it a powerful tool to improve sleep quality for both caregivers and those being cared for.SleepBank is user-friendly, non-intrusive, and designed for long-term use to support sleep regulation. It is ideal for break rooms in nursing stations, staff rest areas for rotating shifts, and in-home caregiving scenarios. It helps medical professionals working in high-stress environments to relax and restore both physical and mental energy.The original mission of SleepBank is “to use technology to care for sleep.” In a world overwhelmed by high-frequency stimuli and stress, it gently guides the brain to slow, stable rhythms—allowing the body and mind to truly rest and recover.

org.tc: 博辰科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
整合醫院資訊系統（HIS）提供全面的一站式自助服務，就醫民眾能在繳費機完成包括自助掛號、報到、繳費、慢箋領藥、醫療收據與診斷證明申請列印等多種需求，無需在櫃台前長時間排隊，大幅紓解了櫃台前擁擠現象。自助服務的引入不僅減輕了醫事人員的工作負擔，讓他們能夠專注於提供更高質量的服務，還提升了民眾的整體滿意度，大大增加了就醫過程的靈活性和便利性。
符合美國殘疾人法案（ADA）規範，特別針對繳費機互動區域進行人性化設計，考慮到不同需求的民眾，我們將操作高度設計在60至120cm之間，確保所有人都能輕鬆操作，包括行動不便的患者及使用輪椅的民眾。這些細節設計體現了我們對科技溫度與人性關懷的追求，致力於創造友好且無障礙的使用環境。
info.en: By integrating with the hospital’s HIS, Paytronex is able to offer 24/7 one-stop self-services, which includes: self-service appointment request, self-service check-in, self-service payment, chronic illness prescription retrieval, as well as applying for printouts of medical receipts and diagnosis certificates.

org.tc: 捷虹資訊股份有限公司
org.en: Fast Bridge Information Services Co., Ltd.

info.tc:
捷虹資訊創立於2015年，專注於評鑑與稽核的AI驅動解決方案，深耕國際醫療體系的數位治理與流程創新，致力於以人工智慧強化組織決策、治理效能與服務品質。
我們的核心產品模組：
●評鑑管理系統：結合數位化流程、指標管理與智能分析，協助評鑑單位提升效率、公信力，實現醫療品質的持續優化。
●多方協同評鑑系統：協助醫療機構數位化評鑑管理，優化流程、強化法遵、促進治理與知識傳承。
●智慧審查平台：運用AI自動化審查與數據分析，提升公部門審查效能，優化民眾申辦體驗，並以共構架構整合多項業務，兼顧成本效益與行政品質。
●醫療供需管理平台：透過數據分析與預測，協助組織掌握供需動態、優化資源調度。整合多源數據，自動預警風險並提供決策建議，實現精準、彈性的供應管理。
「Fast Bridge」象徵我們快速搭建人與科技、組織與智慧的橋樑。未來，我們將持續深耕 AI 應用場景，拓展智慧醫療與金融科技領域，攜手客戶邁向更智慧、高效且前瞻的數位未來。
info.en: Founded in 2015, Fast Bridge Information Services Co., Ltd. delivers AI-driven solutions for evaluation and auditing, advancing digital governance and process innovation in global healthcare. Our core offerings include: an Evaluation Management System to digitize workflows and enhance quality; a Collaborative Evaluation System to optimize processes and ensure compliance; an Intelligent Review Platform using AI to improve efficiency and public service experience; and a Healthcare Supply & Demand Management Platform for predictive analytics and resource optimization. “Fast Bridge” reflects our mission to connect people with technology and organizations with intelligence, driving a smarter, more efficient, and future-ready digital era.

org.tc: 歐旺股份有限公司

info.tc:
四十年經驗：歐旺公司與材料科學的同行之路
四十年前，以一間小型公司起步，代理萬能材料試驗機，並將客戶服務奉為最高宗旨。
這一路走來，儘管經歷無數風雨，始終與材料科學並肩前行。無論是橡膠業、鋼鐵業、航太業，還是檢測業，我們都曾與各大企業攜手合作，解決材料研究上的種種難題。
我們的與客戶關係
我們不僅時常邀請客戶參與國際會議、標準研讀以及德國原廠驗機，更積極投身於國內各大展覽，包括橡塑膠展、汽機車零配件展、航太展、金屬展等，處處可見我們的身影。
我們引進了全新的德國品牌 Hegewald & Peschke、瑞士品牌walter + bai。
為此，全員親赴德國原廠接受專業訓練，並與供應商建立了良好的合作關係。
這一切努力，都只為能全力支持台灣的所有使用者，讓材料試驗變得更加容易與進步。
我們堅信，透過良好的客戶溝通，將能持續改進儀器操作與服務品質，共同打造出更優越的實驗室環境。
維持最高服務品質
品質與保證
我們提供各種類型的機器，包括材料試驗機、試片裁切器、高精度加工機等等，產品保證高品質、可靠性高。
機器生產符合歐盟CE、ISO 9001、Dakks等多項認證

info.tc:
大綜電腦整合多家廠商，共同展示未來智慧醫新醫療、實現低碳智慧醫療新典範。

1. RibbonCare「乳房攝影影像品質檢測系統」與「氣管內管異常警示系統」
2. AI 賦能 XR 智慧醫療照護平台

info.tc: 這款多功能電動輔助椅專為行動不便、長者及照護需求者設計，兼具安全性與舒適性。椅身採用可調式平行舉升系統，能自由調整座椅高度，協助使用者從椅子至護理床間輕鬆轉移，大幅減輕照護負擔。搭載三組德國 OKIN 高品質電機，可獨立調整靠背與腳托，讓使用者依個人習慣調整最舒適的坐臥姿勢。座椅扶手可拆卸設計，提升靈活度與轉換便利性；四輪醫療等級萬向輪則確保移動平穩、安全且省力。靠背與坐墊外罩皆可拆卸清洗，易於維護衛生，也可依需求更換不同材質與軟硬度。產品支援外接電池，即使無電源亦能維持全功能運作，讓照護不中斷。整體承重達150公斤，穩定耐用，滿足多元使用場景，是兼顧設計美學與功能實用的智能輔助椅。
info.en: This multifunctional electric assist chair is designed for seniors and individuals with limited mobility, combining comfort, safety, and intelligent support. The height-adjustable lift system allows easy transfer between a chair and a care bed, reducing caregiver strain. Equipped with three premium OKIN motors, the chair offers independent adjustment of the backrest and footrest for personalized comfort. The detachable armrests provide flexibility, while four medical-grade caster wheels ensure smooth and secure movement. Both the backrest and seat covers are removable for easy cleaning or customization. With an optional backup battery, all functions remain operational without external power. Supporting up to 150 kg, this durable and user-centered assist chair redefines mobility and care comfort.

info.tc:
山拾常青致力於功能醫學領域，以「預防勝於治療」為最核心的概念，探討如何防範疾病發生；協助個案調整營養、生活型諮商態等，進一步從「尋找健康」，走向「早期健康」，從整合角度出發，找出疾病根源
—
山拾常青提供服務如下－
抗老輔療：EECP體外加強反搏、高壓氧、靜脈雷射、血液淨化
女性呵護：女性備孕、更年期症候群 
健康守護：心腦血管問題、慢性疲勞、消化吸收問題、關節疼痛、退化、過敏體質、荷爾蒙失調、抗衰老、自律神經失調/失眠焦慮、免疫調節、腎功能逆轉、重金屬排毒、癌症輔療、肥胖/小兒肥胖 

並透過Tanita身體組成分析報告，可以了解自己的體脂肪率、肌肉量、體水分率、內臟脂肪指數、基礎代謝率和體型判定等，並藉由數據趨勢來掌握健康狀況，例如隱性肥胖或肌肉量不足，進而調整飲食和運動計畫以改善健康。

info.tc: 在生物技術與醫療領域邁入新世紀的此刻，我們積極尋覓全新機會，正面迎接挑戰，力求建設性的突破，企求更高層次的卓越表現以開創生醫新契機。本組強調跨領域之多元整合與建構大健康產業契機，透過管理理論與實務的導入，輔以跨領域的專業暨實務師資與生醫社群平台，兼重技術與產業特色的融合，以深入分析及探討生技醫療產業的機會與挑戰，培養掌握生物科技、醫療產業與大健康專業知能。此次參展要展現政大生醫平台掌握生醫脈動 開創生醫新機，如何整合透過綿密的跨領域運作社團平台，擴大發展生技醫療產學合作機會及成果展現。
info.en: As the biotechnology and medical field enters the new era, we are actively looking for striving for constructive breakthroughs, and striving for higher levels of excellence to create new opportunities in biomedicine. This exhibition will show how the NCCU healthcare platform creates new opportunities for Biotechnology through platform partnering to expand and achievements of industry-academia cooperation integration in biotechnology and medical care.

org.tc: 黛莉貝爾有限公司

info.tc:
黛莉貝爾導入 360°全身紅外線掃描技術，以非接觸式紅外線測量方式，快速建立專屬的 3D 人體模型。
打破傳統內衣以手工量尺為主的方式，能更精準掌握人體各項曲線與比例，並結合 AI 體態分析，同步偵測並判讀常見體態問題，如：
? 骨盆前後傾
? 富貴包
? 脊椎側彎
? 圓肩與駝背

透過長期累積的顧客資料，AI 能不斷學習並優化判讀模型，將個人數據轉化為 專屬體態分析報告。
不只是「掃描身體」，更能讓每位顧客清楚了解自身的身形特徵與改善方向，搭配黛莉貝爾內衣的雕塑設計，
從穿著中自然達成體態微調，讓美麗建立在數據與科學之上。
info.en:
Daily Belle 3D Intelligent Body Scanning

Daily Belle introduces 360° full-body infrared scanning technology, using non-contact infrared measurement to quickly build a personalized 3D body model.
This innovation replaces traditional manual measuring methods, providing far more precise data on body curves and proportions. Combined with AI body posture analysis, it can detect and interpret common posture issues such as:
? Pelvic tilt (anterior/posterior)
? Humpback or neck fat pad
? Spinal curvature (scoliosis)
? Rounded shoulders or slouching

With long-term customer data, our AI continuously learns and refines its analysis, transforming measurements into a personalized body posture report.
It’s not just about scanning — it’s about understanding your body through data.
By matching each customer’s body profile with the most suitable Daily Belle shapewear, our designs help naturally improve posture through everyday wear, blending beauty, comfort, and science.

org.tc: 台灣微生物學會

info.tc:
2025年台灣醫療科技展精準檢測暨大健康主題館，將於南港展覽館一館盛大開幕，並由國家醫療生技產業策進會與台灣微生物學會共同主辦招商。此展覽將集結最新的醫療科技創新，特別聚焦於精準檢測技術與大健康領域，旨在推動醫療、健康管理及生命科學等領域的交流合作與發展。

展會規模宏大，計劃設置100個展位，涵蓋了精準檢測、大健康管理、疾病預防、數位醫療等多項創新科技。參展單位將展示前沿的基因檢測、分子診斷、人工智慧輔助診療、智能健康管理設備等，並提供專業的技術交流平台，為醫療產業的專業人士提供最新的產品與解決方案。

此外，展會還將安排一系列專題講座及論壇，邀請業界專家分享醫療科技的最新趨勢與應用，深入探討如何利用科技提升健康管理與疾病預防效果。展會將成為醫療科技業界的重要交流平台，吸引來自全球的專業觀眾，促進產業間的合作與發展。

這場盛會不僅是台灣醫療產業的一次大規模展示，也將助力台灣在全球醫療科技領域的領先地位。
info.en:
The 2025 Taiwan Healthcare Expo Precision Diagnostics and Big Health Pavilion will be held at Nangang Exhibition Center Hall 1. Co-organized by the Taiwan Society of Microbiology and the National Medical Biotechnology Industry Promotion Association, this event will showcase the latest innovations in precision diagnostics and big health technologies. With 100 exhibition booths, the pavilion will feature cutting-edge advancements in genetic testing, molecular diagnostics, AI-assisted healthcare, and digital health solutions.

The exhibition aims to foster collaboration and knowledge exchange among professionals in the healthcare, biotechnology, and life sciences industries. It will also offer a series of expert talks and forums on the latest trends and applications in healthcare technology, focusing on enhancing health management and disease prevention.

This event will provide a vital platform for international industry leaders and professionals to explore new technologies, expand business networks, and promote Taiwan\'s leadership in the global healthcare sector.

info.tc:
破壁黑芝麻醬精選上等黑芝麻，採用低溫烘焙與破壁技術精製而成，完美釋放芝麻營養精華。質地細膩綿密，香氣濃郁醇厚，完整保留芝麻天然風味與營養價值。富含鈣質、鐵質與維生素E，是日常飲食的營養補充佳品。

黃金腰果醬嚴選越南頂級腰果，經低溫輕焙後細磨而成。腰果醬色澤誘人，口感滑順綿密，帶有腰果天然的清甜與堅果香氣。富含蛋白質、健康脂肪酸與多種微量元素，為身體提供優質能量。

兩款產品皆堅持無添加人工香料、色素與防腐劑，百分百純天然製作。可廣泛應用於塗抹麵包、拌麵、沙拉調醬、烘焙原料或直接食用，為現代追求健康飲食的消費者提供美味與營養兼備的優質選擇。無論是早餐搭配還是烹飪調味，都能為餐桌增添自然風味與營養價值。
info.en:
Black Sesame Spread is crafted from premium black sesame seeds. Using low-temperature roasting and an ultra-fine grinding technique, we break down the seeds to release their full nutritional profile and deep, roasted aroma. This results in a velvety, rich paste packed with natural calcium, iron, and vitamin E, offering a nutritious boost to your daily diet.

Cashew Butter is made from meticulously selected premium cashews. Gently roasted to a golden perfection and stone-ground into a luxuriously smooth butter, it delivers a naturally sweet, creamy taste and delicate crunch. It\'s an excellent source of plant-based protein, healthy fats, and essential minerals.

Both products are 100% natural, containing no artificial additives, colors, or preservatives. Perfect for spreading on toast, blending into smoothies, adding to sauces, or enjoying straight from the jar, they are a delicious and wholesome choice for health-conscious consumers.

org.tc: 健康益友股份有限公司

info.tc:
健康益友正式推出第二代【寶眾APP】，以串聯HIS資訊技術和整合LINE官方帳號服務為開發理念，優化視訊看診流程。持續配合衛福部與健保署推動的數位政策方向，協助診所實現醫療照護數位轉型，改善醫療服務可近性，提供民眾更便利的健康照護。
民眾可由診所官方帳號登入，進行掛號、虛擬健保卡報到、掛號費線上支付、視訊看診及電子處方箋領取等服務。診所端醫生能直接在HIS上進行視訊診療、病歷紀錄、追蹤病人生理量測或檢驗數值、開立處方箋及後續健保申報的流程。
健康益友第一代【健康益友APP】在COVID-19期間攜手急診醫學會、衛福部、僑委會對抗疫情，期間由20多家知名大型醫院、200多家診所以及2000多家社區藥局透過【健康益友APP】提供民眾遠距醫療服務，註冊人數超過百萬、看診人次超過15萬次、送藥到府近5萬次。
info.en:
Eucare Launches the New “Boodion Telemedicine Platform”
Eucare has officially launched the brand-new “Boodion Telemedicine Platform,” developed with the vision of integrating technology and healthcare services. In line with the Ministry of Health and Welfare (MOHW) and the National Health Insurance Administration (NHIA)’s digital transformation initiatives. The platform empowers clinics to modernize their operations, enhance healthcare accessibility, and provide patients with convenient, comprehensive telemedicine services.
Building on the success of the first-generation Eucare App—developed in collaboration with the Ministry of Health and Welfare (MOHW) and the Overseas Community Affairs Council (OCAC) during the COVID-19 pandemic—Eucare partnered with more than 20 major hospitals, 200 clinics, and 2,000 community pharmacies to deliver diverse healthcare services. The app reached over one million registered users, enabled over 150,000 consultations, and completed nearly 50,000 home medication deliveries, helping patients overcome barriers to medical access and prescription fulfillment.
Following the pandemic, Eucare has continued to advance telemedicine innovation. Since 2023, the company has worked with LINE Taiwan and clinic system providers to launch the new “Boodion Telemedicine Platform,” officially introduced in June last year.
By integrating LINE Official Accounts with clinic Hospital Information Systems (HIS), the platform streamlines the entire telemedicine experience—covering online registration, virtual NHI card check-in, online payment, video consultations, and e-prescription services. Physicians can conduct teleconsultations directly through the HIS interface, record medical notes, track patients’ physiological data or lab results, issue prescriptions, and complete subsequent NHI claim submissions in one seamless workflow.

org.tc: 元又興業股份有限公司

info.tc:
元又興業Oriact Taiwan於2012年成立，引進快速且準確的POCT檢測儀器-AQT 90、支氣管磁力導航系統、前列腺健康指數，致力於提供快速、有效、精準的醫療產品，打造以病人為中心的醫療服務。
元又興業Oriact Taiwan也將服務領域拓展至數位遠距醫療，於2019年推出健康益友APP，提供24小時急診諮詢、多方會診、專科門診、心理諮商、藥品諮商等服務，是台灣第一個協助衛福部、僑委會提供國人與僑胞對抗COVID-19疫情的遠距醫療平台。
旗下的達康診所以打造全方位與個人化的醫療服務為核心，提供抗老保養及精準預防醫學服務，同時結合健康益友APP服務需要遠距醫療的患者，整合線上病患所需的各項醫療資源。
Oriact代表我們的創業精神：Ori有周而復始、圓滿達成的意思；Act表示我們充滿能量的行動力。我們將持續引入創新醫療產品、整合醫療資源、改善醫療流程，建立多元便利的線上醫療平台，期許我們能發揮蝴蝶效應協助推進台灣醫療產業的發展。
info.en:
Established in 2012, Oriact Taiwan introduces fast and accurate POCT equipment - AQT 90, bronchial magnetic navigation system, Prostate Health Index (PHI), committing to providing fast, effective and accurate medical products, and creating patient-centered medical services.
Oriact Taiwan has also expanded its service area to digital telemedicine. In 2019, it launched the EUCARE APP, which provides 24-hour emergency consultation, multi-party consultation, specialist outpatient service, psychological consultation, drug consultation and other services. It is the first in Taiwan to assist the Ministry of Health and Welfare, and the Overseas Community Affairs Council providing a telemedicine platform for Chinese and overseas Chinese to fight against the COVID-19 epidemic.
Our Grand Care Clinic focuses on creating all-round and personalized medical services, providing anti-aging care and precision preventive medicine services. At the same time, it combines the EUCARE APP to serve patients who need telemedicine, and integrates all medical resources online patients\' needs.
Oriact stands for our entrepreneurial spirit: Ori means repetition and fulfillment, and Act means our action force with full energy. The wings of the butterfly above the logo hope that we could influence the future development of the industry like a butterfly effect.

org.tc: 穩可生技

info.tc: 嚴選農產品

org.tc: 以法蓮企業有限公司

info.tc:
★Paruah帕路亞產品特色--銅鍋
1.超神奇煎蛋、煎魚，不用鹽就會鹹。
2.可無水無油烹飪。
3.無任何化學塗層，即使不放油，一樣不沾鍋不黑鍋。
4.360度旋風式循環受熱，比一般傳統鍋具受熱時間快一倍，普通鍋燉雞湯需一小時，帕路亞鍋只要30分鐘。
5.帕路亞一體成型，無加一層厚底，導熱均勻又快速。
6.煮湯滾沸後，還可保溫三到四小時（蓋上蓋子）。
7.保持食物的原味及營養，把食材的美味與養份完全鎖住不流失。
無水無油烹調法：健康鍋（炒青菜、煎牛排、片魚、雞排、豬排可全不用放油），讓食物更天然、更鮮甜、更健康。
info.en:
1. Super magical fried eggs and fried fish, they are salty without salt. 
2. Can be cooked without water or oil. 
3. Without any chemical coating, even if no oil is added, it will not stick to the pot or blacken the pot. 
4. 360-degree cyclone circulation heating, heating time is twice as fast as that of ordinary traditional pots. It takes one hour to stew chicken soup in an ordinary pot, but only 30 minutes in a palua pot. 
5. Palua is formed in one piece, without adding a thick bottom, and conducts heat evenly and quickly. 
6. After the soup boils, it can be kept warm for three to four hours (cover the lid). 
7. Maintain the original taste and nutrition of food, and completely lock in the delicious taste and nutrients of the ingredients without losing them. 
Water-free and oil-free cooking method: Healthy pot (no oil is required for frying vegetables, frying steaks, fish fillets, chicken chops, and pork chops), making food more natural, fresher, sweeter, and healthier.

org.tc: 加拿大駐台北貿易辦事處

info.tc: 加拿大駐台北貿易辦事處（CTOT）是加拿大政府在台灣設立的外交代表機構，目標是促進加拿大在台灣的貿易發展，並協助加拿大企業探索本地市場機會，增進加拿大與台灣的商業合作、技術轉移、研發交流和投資方面的合作關係。
info.en: The Canadian Trade Office in Taipei (CTOT) represents Canadian interests in Taiwan in the absence of formal diplomatic relations. Our goal is to promote Canadian economic interests in the region, help Canadian companies explore local market opportunities and facilitate Canada-Taiwan partnerships in business cooperation, technology transfer, R&D exchange, and investment.

org.tc: 8E6 Limited

info.tc: 8E6 Limited 是一家加拿大公司，生產唯一 100% 全天然的外用止痛／肌肉修復產品，配方由 8 種精油組成，並提供噴霧、滾珠及濕巾（拭巾）三種形式，適合所有因發炎而產生疼痛的人群及職業運動員使用，無論是預防性或事後恢復皆可。與大多數競爭對手不同的是，8E6 的產品確實有效，而且安全！
info.en: 8E6 Limited is a Canadian company that manufactures the only 100% all natural topical pain relief/muscle recovery product comprised of 8 essential oils - in Spray, Roll on and Wipe (towelette) formats, for people of all ages experiencing inflammation-generated pain and professional athletes who use it both proactively and reactively. Unlike the majority of our competition, 8E6 works - and is safe!

org.tc: Aeobiome healthcare private limited

info.tc: India’s first precision postbiotics health-tech company, Aeobiome is reimagining preventive healthcare through clinically validated, patented postbiotic formulations that go beyond probiotics — targeting gut health, women’s wellness, metabolic and neuro health with science-driven outcomes.
info.en: India’s first precision postbiotics health-tech company, Aeobiome is reimagining preventive healthcare through clinically validated, patented postbiotic formulations that go beyond probiotics — targeting gut health, women’s wellness, metabolic and neuro health with science-driven outcomes.

org.tc: Arbo3 Inc.

info.tc: Arbo3 Inc. 正在通过其专利的、AI 控制的臭氧消毒系统革新空气净化方式。针对室内空气质量差这一问题，Arbo3 持续中和空气和表面中的病原体，实现医疗级别的消毒。与 HEPA 过滤器或 UV-C 系统不同，Arbo3 的低剂量臭氧（<100ppb）可为医疗、交通、酒店和零售等行业提供安全、自主且可扩展的消毒解决方案。该系统具备实时 AI 自动化、云端管理的网页门户、移动应用，以及免滤网设计，降低了使用成本。Arbo3 已获得 SGS 集团的功效与安全认证，并已在台湾的台湾大车队（55688）和台北一家主要医院部署，展现了强劲的市场发展势头。
info.en: Arbo3 Inc. is revolutionizing air purification with its patented, AI-controlled ozone disinfection system. Tackling poor indoor air quality, Arbo3 delivers medical-grade sterilization by continuously neutralizing pathogens in the air and on surfaces. Unlike HEPA filters or UV-C, Arbo3’s low-dose ozone (<100ppb) offers safe, autonomous, and scalable sanitization for healthcare, transportation, hospitality, and retail. The system features real-time AI-based automation, cloud-managed web-portal, mobile app, and filter-free design for cost efficiency. Certified by SGS Group for efficacy and safety, Arbo3 has demonstrated market traction in Taiwan with deployments in Taiwan Taxi (55688) and the selection for use in a major Taipei hospital.

org.tc: BTNX Inc.

info.tc:
BTNX公司是一家位於加拿大的快速診斷試劑製造商，提供超過100種側向免疫層析與數位即時檢測解決方案，涵蓋廣泛的臨床應用。BTNX的產品包括感染性疾病檢測（例如：COVID-19、登革熱、HIV）、慢性疾病檢測（例如：心臟生物標誌物、癌症）、妊娠與生育檢測、藥物篩檢以及尿液分析等。
BTNX的許多產品均獲得美國食品藥物管理局（FDA）、加拿大衛生部（Health Canada）等主要國際監管機構的認可。BTNX的客戶遍及70多個國家的醫院、診所、實驗室、公共衛生機構及經銷商。該公司擁有通過ISO 13485認證的製造體系，專注於創新，致力於提供可靠且便利的診斷工具，以支援高檢測量及分散式醫療環境中的即時決策。
在即時檢測之外，BTNX亦是快速藥物檢測領域的創新者，推出多種針對芬太尼（fentanyl）、賽拉嗪（xylazine）及約會強暴藥物（如GHB）的快速檢測試劑——這些檢測工具非常適合用於預防藥物過量、執法部門使用以及夜生活安全防護。
info.en:
BTNX Inc. is a Canadian-based manufacturer of rapid diagnostic tests, offering over 100 lateral flow and digital point-of-care solutions across a wide range of clinical applications. BTNX’s products include tests for infectious diseases (e.g., COVID-19, dengue, HIV), chronic conditions (e.g., cardiac markers, cancer), pregnancy and fertility, drug screening, and urinalysis. Many of BTNX’s products are licensed by major global regulatory bodies including the US FDA, Health Canada, and more. BTNX’s clients include hospitals, clinics, labs, public health agencies, and distributors in more than 70 countries. With ISO 13485-certified manufacturing and a focus on innovation, they deliver reliable, accessible diagnostics that support timely decision-making in high-volume and decentralized healthcare environments.
Beyond the point of care, BTNX is an innovator in rapid detection tests for drugs including fentanyl, xylazine and date rape drugs like GHB – these tests are ideal for overdose prevention, law enforcement, and nightlife safety

org.tc: ILLUMIALABS

info.tc:
At illumia labs, we digitize your corporate knowledge, transforming static training materials into a dynamic digital mentor. Our platform is the only solution that can continuously assess an employee\'s 
real-world competence against defined training outcomes, providing immediate, actionable feedback to close the gap between learning and mastery.
Our key differentiator? We are completely sensor agnostic. Whether your operations are tracked in a sophisticated digital twin environment or in a shielded \'black room\' equipped with our 
specialized sensors, illumia labs is engineered to perform, capture  the data, and deliver verifiable results.
We don\'t just track completion; we guarantee competence. Partner with illumia labs to future-proof your workforce and turn knowledge into measurable operational excellence. Let\'s discuss how we can give you a true ROI on your training investment.

org.tc: Karma Medical Products

info.tc: Karma Medical Products is redefining how people build, restore, and protect upper-limb function with FEPSim — a patented, Canadian-made simulator that replicates real-world hand, wrist, and forearm movements. Designed for rehabilitation, prevention, and performance, FEPSim helps patients recover from injury, athletes enhance performance, and professionals maintain strength for demanding work.
info.en: Karma Medical Products is redefining how people build, restore, and protect upper-limb function with FEPSim — a patented, Canadian-made simulator that replicates real-world hand, wrist, and forearm movements. Designed for rehabilitation, prevention, and performance, FEPSim helps patients recover from injury, athletes enhance performance, and professionals maintain strength for demanding work.

org.tc: Life Sciences BC

info.tc: 卑詩省 (British Columbia, BC) 生命科學協會（Life Sciences BC, LSBC）是一個非營利性產業組織，致力於透過在地、全國及國際層面的策略性倡議，推動卑詩省生命科學生態系統的發展。協會以提供領導力、促進投資與夥伴關係、與政府合作，以及推廣卑詩省世界級的生命科學產業為目標，帶動卑詩省經濟成長與創新能量。
info.en: Life Sciences BC (LSBC) is a not-for-profit sector association dedicated to advancing British Columbia’s life sciences ecosystem through strategic initiatives at the local, national, and international levels. We drive economic growth in the province by providing leadership, fostering investment and partnerships, collaborating with government, and promoting BC’s world-class life sciences sector.

org.tc: MindfulGarden

info.tc:
MindfulGarden Digital Health Inc. is a Canadian medical device
company focused on transforming care for hospitalized patients
experiencing agitation and delirium. Our mission is to provide a
non-pharmacological alternative to antipsychotics and physical
restraints.
Founded in 2017, and based in Vancouver, MindfulGarden is privately
owned and led by a team with deep expertise in digital design and
healthcare innovation. The leadership team includes CEO and
Co-founder Catherine Winckler, Head of Product Mark Ross, and
Commercial Lead Ben Brzezynski. Clinical leaders include Dr. Steven
Reynolds (past medical director and ICU director Royal Columbian
Hospital) and Dr. Gloria Gutman, president of the International Society
of Gerontechnology.
info.en:
MindfulGarden Digital Health Inc. is a Canadian medical device company focused on transforming care for hospitalized patients experiencing agitation and delirium. Our mission is to provide a non-pharmacological alternative to antipsychotics and physical restraints.
Founded in 2017, and based in Vancouver, MindfulGarden is privately owned and led by a team with deep expertise in digital design and healthcare innovation. The leadership team includes CEO and Co-founder Catherine Winckler, Head of Product Mark Ross, and Commercial Lead Ben Brzezynski. Clinical leaders include Dr. Steven
Reynolds (past medical director and ICU director Royal Columbian Hospital) and Dr. Gloria Gutman, president of the International Society of Gerontechnology.

org.tc: NVENTRIC, Inc.

info.tc:
我們專注於電生理、神經血管、冠狀動脈、週邊血管和動脈應用的醫療器材開發。
在 Nventric，我們熱衷於突破醫療技術的界限，尋找血管疾病治療的創新解決方案。我們致力於創新和尖端技術，推動我們開發革命性的醫療器械，以革新患者護理，改變生活。
info.en:
We specialize in medical device development for electrophysiology, neurovascular, coronary, peripheral, and arterial applications.
At Nventric, we are passionate about pushing the boundaries of medical technology to find innovative solutions for vascular disease treatment. Our commitment to innovation and cutting-edge technology drives us to develop revolutionary medical devices that transform patient care and changes lives.

org.tc: NZ TECHNOLOGIES INC

info.tc:
Founded in 2009 and based in Vancouver, BC, Canada, NZ Technologies Inc. (NZTech) is an advanced technology and manufacturing firm specializing in the design, development, and production of innovative human-machine interfaces (HMI). The company’s flagship innovations include HoverTap™, a proprietary 
technology enabling 3D touchless interaction, and TIPSO™, a system designed for sterile image manipulation in operating rooms. NZTech has FDA-approved products in clinical use, underscoring its 
commitment to safety and regulatory compliance. With expertise spanning specialized sensor design, embedded systems, rapid prototyping, and gesture recognition algorithms, the company 
maintains a robust intellectual property portfolio with 19 utility patents and strategic filings across North America, Europe, and Asia. Building on established international partnerships in Belgium, 
Japan, and Taiwan, NZTech serves as both the core technology provider and system manufacturer in its collaborations with global industry partners.
info.en:

org.tc: O-Two Medical Technologies Inc.

info.tc:
O-Two Medical Technologies Inc. 與全球的經銷商、醫療設備供應商及政府機構合作，致力於提供高品質的呼吸照護與鎮痛解決方案。
在加拿大，我們的產品廣泛應用於緊急醫療服務（EMS）、醫院及軍事單位。
在國際市場方面，我們的業務遍及 超過 60 個國家，與北美、歐洲、中東、亞洲、拉丁美洲及澳洲的主要經銷夥伴合作。
我們長期的合作關係專注於技術培訓、法規支援及市場開發。
憑藉 超過 40 年的經驗，O-Two 以其在緊急與臨床呼吸照護領域的可靠性、創新性與卓越品質享譽全球。
info.en: O-Two Medical Technologies Inc. partners with a global network of distributors, medical equipment suppliers, and government agencies to deliver high-quality respiratory and analgesia solutions worldwide. In Canada, our products are widely used by emergency medical services (EMS), hospitals, and military organizations. Internationally, we operate in over 60 countries, collaborating with leading distributors across North America, Europe, the Middle East, Asia, Latin America, and Australia. Our long-standing partnerships emphasize technical training, regulatory support, and market development. With over 40 years of experience, O-Two has built a strong reputation for reliability, innovation, and excellence in emergency and clinical respiratory care.

org.tc: OncoHelix

info.tc: OncoHelix is a precision diagnostics company founded and headquartered in Calgary, Alberta in 2019. OncoHelix provides specialty molecular and immune testing services, utilizing cutting edge technologies in the areas of tumour genetic profiling, transplant immunology, reproductive health, and wellness testing. OncoHelix is a proud testing partner of 5 public healthcare programs as well as pharma-sponsored testing programs with companies including AstraZeneca, Roche, Pfizer, Incyte and Esperas. OncoHelix performs R&D at our Calgary headquarters in addition to revenue generating operations, validating diagnostic tests for use in export markets as well as within Canada. OncoHelix is promoting it\'s full menu of testing services, including molecular profiling for oncology, transplant immunology, reproductive health, and wellness. OncoHelix is looking to expand our customer base to new clinics, hospitals, and government health programs across Asia, through our CAP-accredited lab in the UAE.

org.tc: Ontario Ministry of Economic Development, Job Creation and Trade
org.en: Ontario Ministry of Economic Development, Job Creation and Trade

info.en:
Ontario is home to Canada’s largest life sciences cluster, with top-tier research institutions, academic hospitals and companies generating over half of the sector’s total economic activity. Our life sciences companies, many operating in compliance with major health regulatory agencies (Health Canada, the US Food and Drug Administration, the European Medicines Agency) export health care excellence globally.

Fueling global innovation with advanced research, cutting-edge technology, and a collaborative ecosystem, Ontario is your source for next-generation solutions, backed by top global companies and world-class institutions.

org.tc: Pacey MedTech

info.tc: Introducing Pacey MedTech, a pioneer of premium male urinary incontinence management tools. We are a Canadian-owned and operated small business,based and manufacturing all of our devices in Vancouver, BC. The Pacey Cuff is our flagship medical device and we hold patents and regulatory registrations worldwide. It is a unique and effective approach for post-prostatectomy patients looking for leak management solutions. Our commercialization structure is a combination of D2C in North America (via digital marketing channels) and our exclusive B2B partnerships in markets across the globe.

org.tc: SOTI Pty Ltd

info.tc: SOTI
info.en: SOTI is a proven leader at creating innovative solutions that reduce the cost and complexity of business-critical mobility. Thousands of companies around the world depend on us to secure, manage and support their mobile operations. SOTI’s two decades of success has built strong partnerships with leading mobile platform providers and device manufacturers. These relationships give us unparalleled insight into new technology and industry trends before they happen. SOTI is a proven innovator — clear vision, laser focus and a commitment to R&D has made us the market leader at delivering exciting, new business mobility solutions. SOTI helps businesses take mobility to endless possibilities.

org.tc: 亞伯達省駐台辦事處

info.tc:
亞伯達省政府在國外設立辦事處的歷史已逾半世紀。這些駐外機構旨在支持政府一連串的施政方針與重點工作，同時也與亞省政府部門和機構合作及提供協助，具體工作包括：拓展貿易、維護亞伯達省利益、延攬優秀人才、吸引對亞省的投資，並推動雙方的技術合作關係。

亞伯達省駐台辦事處於 1988 年設立。
info.en:
The Government of Alberta has maintained offices abroad for more than half a century. These international offices are designed to support the government\'s array of policy guidelines and key priorities, while also collaborating with and assisting various Alberta government departments and agencies. Their specific work includes: expanding trade, advocating for the interests of Alberta, recruiting exceptional talent, attracting investment to Alberta, and promoting bilateral technology partnerships.

The Alberta Taiwan Office was established in 1988.

org.tc: 加拿大卑詩省台灣辦事處

info.tc: 卑詩省駐台辦事處（BC Taiwan）是卑詩省政府在台灣的官方代表機構，致力於推動卑詩省與台灣之間的貿易、投資及創新合作。該辦事處協助卑詩省企業進入台灣市場、促進台灣企業投資卑詩省，並推動雙方在潔淨能源、生命科學、科技及教育等重點領域的交流與合作。透過在地布局，BC Taiwan 積極強化卑詩省與台灣在經濟、學術與文化方面的連結。
info.en: The British Columbia Taiwan Office (BC Taiwan) serves as the Government of British Columbia’s official representative in Taiwan, promoting trade, investment, and innovation partnerships between B.C. and Taiwan. The office supports B.C. companies in accessing Taiwan’s market, facilitates Taiwanese investment in B.C., and advances collaboration in key sectors such as clean energy, life sciences, technology, and education. Through its on-the-ground presence, BC Taiwan strengthens economic, academic, and cultural ties between B.C. and Taiwan.

org.tc: 恩豪斯 視訊

info.tc:
Enghouse Video 是 Enghouse Systems (TSX: ENGH) 旗下的一個部門，致力於為醫療保健產業提供安全可靠的視訊協作和客戶體驗解決方案

15 年來，VidyoPlatform 一直為歐洲和美洲的醫院和診所提供高品質的遠距醫療、遠端監控和虛擬會診服務。該平台提供靈活的部署選項（雲端、混合或本地部署），可輕鬆與電子病歷 (EHR) 系統集成，並提供可自訂的 API 和 SDK，使醫療保健合作夥伴能夠將視訊直接嵌入到他們的工作流程和應用程式中

VidyoPlatform 支援醫院、診所和虛擬醫療環境之間的無縫視訊通訊。它支援遠距醫療會診、遠距患者觀察和臨床協作等應用，使醫療保健提供者能夠透過任何設備或在任何地點安全地與患者和同行進行溝通

Enghouse Video 提供完全可自訂的白標可擴展視訊會議平台，可與現有醫療保健系統無縫集成，確保無縫的互通性和靈活性。其頻寬自適應視訊技術可在各種網路中提供穩定的效能，而其可擴展的架構支援各種規模的臨床工作流程、醫院和醫療保健系統
info.en:
Enghouse Video, a division of Enghouse Systems (TSX: ENGH), deliver secure and reliable video collaboration and customer experience solutions for the healthcare industry. 

For over 15 years, VidyoPlatform has supported hospitals and clinics across Europe and the Americas with high-quality telehealth, remote monitoring, and virtual consultations. The platform offers flexible deployment options (cloud, hybrid, or on-premises), easy integration with EHR systems, and customizable APIs and SDKs that allow healthcare partners to embed video directly into their workflows and applications.

VidyoPlatform enables seamless video communication across hospitals, clinics, and virtual care environments. It supports applications such as telehealth consultations, remote patient observation, and clinical collaboration, empowering healthcare providers to connect securely with patients and peers from any device or location.

Enghouse Video provides a fully customizable, white-labeled scalable video conferencing platform that seamlessly integrates with existing healthcare systems, ensuring seamless interoperability and flexibility. Its bandwidth-adaptive video technology delivers stable performance across diverse networks, while its scalable architecture supports clinical workflows, hospitals and healthcare systems of all sizes.

org.tc: 美瑞諾康

info.tc: miRoncol Health 將於 2026 年推出首創的基於微 RNA 的多癌預警血檢。微RNA是廣泛認可的疾病標記物，它的發現獲得了2024年諾貝爾生理和醫學獎。這項由人工智慧驅動的血檢有助於更多健康個體利用現有的先進癌症評估計畫更早發現癌症。概念驗證研究顯示，該檢測在早期癌症方面表現卓越，對於乳腺癌以外約 80% 的常見實體腫瘤，敏感度約為 90%，特異性超過 99%。它優於主流的基於循環腫瘤 DNA 的檢測，並且可以使用更實惠的聚合酶鏈反應技術普惠更多人群。
info.en: miRoncol Health will launch the first-of-its-kind microRNA based mutli-cancer risk stratification blood test in 2026. The AI powered blood test will benefit more healthy individuals to leverage existing advanced cancer assessment programs to detect cancers early beyond current cancer screening technologies. The proof of concept studies demonstrated superior performance particularly for early stage cancers with ~90% sensitivity at 99%+ specificity among ~80% common solid tumors other than breast cancer. It outperforms mainstream ctDNA based tests and is also more affordable due to requiring only a few microRNAs and using widely available PCR technology.

info.tc:
2004年美國農業部USDA發表研究報告:木鱉果蘊含豐富多種對人體有益的營養成分⋯根據科學家深入研究,木鱉果的類胡蘿蔔素會與脂肪酸形成一種天然奈米化專有載體系統,可活化營養養素之脂類胡蘿蔔素的形式,
提高類胡蘿蔔素的生物可利用率。相較於一般蔬果中的B-胡蘿蔔素,木鱉果中的B-胡蘿蔔素更容易被吸收,也就是因為木鱉果這種獨特的脂類胡蘿蔔素。而脂類胡蘿蔔素可以吸引及保存重要物質和營養素素,以促進物質和營養素的吸收,使得木鱉果成為活化營養素的媒介物,為食用者帶來很大的益處。
家樂公司於多年前率先將「木鱉果」食品引進來台,受到許多專業人士肯定,現今在市場上也成為營養食品原料的新寵兒。更是全家人最天然、最經濟、最有效率的營養補充首選!
家樂公司除了引進「木鱉果油」產品,也相開發了”木鱉果”相關食品,如:體內環保精力營養餐-「果皇纖食代」、活力充沛-「酵果」(酵素)、皇家極品-「果皇咖啡」、手作烘焙、絕佳風味-頂級「果皇酥」⋯等養生美味食品,搭配全家人的好水「銀河奈米負氫離子能量活水機」,一推出即造成愛用者熱烈搶購、媒體爭相報導、口碑佳評如潮!
木鱉果第一品牌-家樂公司永遠給您「明亮、優質、樂活」的精彩人生!
info.en:
In 2004, the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) published a research report stating that Momordica cochinchinensis contains a rich variety of nutrients beneficial to the human body. Scientists have conducted in-depth research and discovered that the carotenoids inMomordica cochinchinensis form a natural, nano-scale, proprietary carrier system with fatty acids, activating the nutrients in their lipocarotenoid form and increasing their bioavailability. Compared to beta-carotene found in common fruits and vegetables, the beta-carotene in Momordica cochinchinensis is more easily absorbed due to its unique lipid carotenoids. Lipocarotenoids attract and retain important substances and nutrients, promoting their absorption. This makes Momordica cochinchinensis a nutrient-activating vehicle, providing significant benefits to consumers.

pioneered the introduction of Momordica cochinchinensis to Taiwan many years ago, earning widespread recognition from professionals and making it a popular nutritional food ingredient in the market. It\'s the most natural, economical, and effective nutritional supplement for the whole family!

In addition to introducing Gac Oil, Knorr has also developed Gac-related foods. Their immediate release has been a hit with users, generating widespread media coverage and rave reviews!

the leading Gac brand, will always bring you a bright, high-quality, and joyful life!

info.en: Lin Li-ting, Chairperson of the Silver Hair Association, stated that according to statistics, over 90% of elderly people in Taiwan ultimately choose to spend their final years at home. Therefore, the support and convenience that communities can provide are key to the quality of life for the elderly. In 2022, Li Ming-zong, Chairperson of the Chinese Sub-Health Association, introduced far-infrared energy houses, infusing energy into building materials.In December 2023, the Far-Infrared Technology Health Home Concept Pavilion officially entered the Taiwan Architecture Center. It aims to create whole-home far-infrared energy health houses, hoping that beloved family members, from the very moment they step into the house, can experience the continuous, stable warmth of far-infrared rays from natural sunlight. These rays can penetrate 5-8 cm into the body to produce a resonant effect, helping maintain the health cycle of family members. Current products include far-infrared technology flooring, far-infrared health coatings, and more.

「鄰近健康APP」為全台最大社區藥局聯盟平台，分為「民間版」與「藥師版」，實現智慧健康服務無縫整合。

民間版APP：整合250家藥局資源，提供「線上下單、藥局快速取貨」無縫服務。會員可隨時查詢附近藥局、預約藥師諮詢，享受多元健康管理與專業檢測服務，包括睡眠檢測、自律神經檢測等，建構「檢測→諮詢→購物→追蹤」一站式服務鏈。結合長照服務申請與專人到府評估，落實高齡友善與個人化健康促進。

藥師版APP：專為藥師設計的數位轉型工具，串聯全台600位藥師，透過線上預約、健康數據管理、電子商務整合與政府補助申請支援，有效提升營運效率。藥師可24小時線上下單，享受各品牌專屬優惠。結合七大健康主軸，協助藥局轉型為智慧健康中心，擴大專業服務範疇，強化社區健康影響力。

高登智慧科技的核心優勢，不僅在於提供電刺激裝置，而在於建立了一個智慧化、雲端化的電刺激處方整合平台。其獨特之處包括：

醫師可透過軟體自行編寫並上傳專屬處方，形成「電刺激處方館」，讓不同院所醫師能共享、下載或選用合適的處方，避免重複設計並提高治療一致性。

-遠距處方派送與居家應用
病患可自費租賃裝置，在家中透過APP接收醫師遠端派送的處方並完成治療，不必每日往返醫院，減少交通與照護資源負擔。醫師則可在遠端追蹤並調整處方參數，維持治療連續性。

-智慧化與未來擴充性
平台預留結合AI自動處方生成（SaMD）的能力，未來可依據感測器數據（如肌肉收縮狀態）動態建議處方，協助醫師更快速精準地完成調整。這種「醫師專業＋AI輔助」的模式，強化了臨床應用的可行性。
info.en:
1. GSH288EPS: 8-Electrode Body Composition Analyzer + Fall-Risk Detection System Applied Technologies:
   • Body Composition Analysis (BIA, Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis)
   • Postural Stability Analysis (CoP, Center of Pressure)

2. Introduction to the Electrical Stimulation Prescription Remote Integration Platform
Golden Smart Technology’s core strength lies not only in providing electrical stimulation devices, but also in establishing an **intelligent, cloud-based integrated prescription platform**. Its unique features include:
•Electrical Stimulation Prescription Editing Software
Physicians can independently create and upload customized prescriptions through the software, forming a “Prescription Library.” This allows physicians from different institutions to share, download, or select suitable prescriptions—reducing redundant design work and improving treatment consistency.

•Remote Prescription Delivery and Home Application
Patients can rent the device for home use and receive prescribed treatment remotely via the app, without having to travel to the hospital daily—reducing transportation and caregiving burdens. Physicians can monitor and adjust prescription parameters remotely, ensuring treatment continuity.

•Intelligent Design and Future Expandability
The platform is designed to integrate with **AI-assisted automatic prescription generation (SaMD) in the future. Based on sensor data (e.g., muscle contraction status), it can dynamically suggest prescriptions, enabling physicians to adjust parameters more quickly and accurately. This “**Professional Physician + AI Assistance**” model enhances the practicality and precision of clinical applications.

org.tc: 翰群科技有限公司

info.tc:
Warmcare為香港的樂齡科技品牌，旗下三大核心產品涵蓋智能呼叫、防走失與跌倒管理系統，專為提升照護機構營運效能與長者安全設計。
【智能呼叫系統】採用無線即裝即用技術，免除傳統佈線工程，安裝過程零干擾日常照護作業。透過直覺式中央管理平台，照護人員可自主設定警報模式與設備ID，靈活對應不同空間需求。系統支援多設備整合管理，能同步監控無線呼叫器、防跌與防走失裝置，並以差異化警示音效降低誤報率，協助機構優化人力配置與服務品質。
【防走失系統】配備智能感應手環與可調式偵測器，精準設定院區電子圍籄範圍。當佩戴者接近設定區域時，系統即時觸發分級警示，管理平台同步顯示定位資訊。獨家設備防遺失功能搭配多層級出入監控，既能維護長者活動安全，亦有效控管設施資產。
【跌倒管理系統】突破傳統感應墊限制，可採用超薄柔性材質搭配壓力感測技術，可依需求設置於輪椅、床鋪等多元場域。自定義警報閾值設計實現全環境覆蓋，結合無線通報裝置即時傳送意外狀態。創新結構設計在提升感應靈敏度之餘，同時兼顧使用舒適度，適用各類長者生活情境。
三大系統皆具備模組化擴充特性，透過統一管理平台實現跨設備協作，協助照護機構建構智慧安全網。從基礎警報到進階預防，Warmcare以彈性化科技方案滿足不同規模機構需求，實現資源精準投放與風險分級管理，為銀髮照護領域提供全面解決方案。
info.en:
Warmcare, a Hong Kong-based gerontechnology provider, offers three core solutions to enhance elderly care safety and operational efficiency: the Intelligent Nurse Call System, Anti-Wandering System, and Fall Management System.
The Intelligent Nurse Call System utilizes wireless plug-and-play technology, eliminating complex wiring. Its intuitive central management platform allows caregivers to customize alerts and integrate devices like wireless call buttons and fall detectors, reducing false alarms through differentiated signals.
The Anti-Wandering System employs smart sensor bracelets and adjustable detectors to create customizable electronic boundaries. Real-time alerts trigger on the central platform when residents approach restricted zones, while embedded anti-loss features safeguard both seniors and equipment.
The Fall Management System adopts  pressure-sensing mats with customizable alert thresholds, adaptable to wheelchairs, beds, and floors. Wireless reporting ensures immediate incident response. Its flexible design balances sensitivity with comfort across care scenarios.
All systems operate synergistically via a unified platform, enabling modular expansion and cross-device coordination. Warmcare’s solutions empower care facilities to implement precise risk management, optimize resource allocation, and build comprehensive safety networks for elderly residents.

org.tc: 博醫生技有限公司

info.tc:
博醫生技有限公司（DocMed Co., Ltd.）
博醫生技以醫療生技創新為核心，團隊成員平均擁有超過20年的醫療行銷、市場拓展及法規管理經驗，致力於提供專業顧問與智慧解決方案，協助客戶掌握產業趨勢與應用發展。
目前公司推廣 VAJIRA 生物頻率訊息平台，是結合生物振動頻率之大數據擷取與AI分析。透過僅需約6至15分鐘的低頻音波掃描，即可快速獲得全面性的能量結構解析，檢測並揭示身心靈狀態的平衡程度。同時，系統亦能進行多面向比較，包括藥物、營養、情緒與生活方式等能量結構，提供可能的優化成效預測與參考資訊，幫助使用者獲得更完整的自我健康觀照與方向指引。
博醫生技的願景是以 AI科技驅動全人預防健康，透過生物頻率科技與大數據應用，推動智慧健康產業的新生態鏈，實現預防健康、精準化管理與智慧化照護的融合發展。我們相信，未來的健康不僅止於疾病防範，更在於全方位提升人類身心靈的平衡與活力，並推動產業邁向智慧化與國際化。
info.en:
DocMed Co., Ltd.
DocMed Co., Ltd. is committed to advancing biomedical innovation with a team averaging over 20 years of expertise in medical marketing, market development, and regulatory affairs.
We promote the VAJIRA Biofrequency Information Platform, which integrates biological vibration frequency data with AI analysis.  Within just 6–15 minutes of low-frequency scanning, it provides a holistic overview of energy balance across physical, mental, and emotional dimensions. The system also enables comparisons of factors such as nutrition, medication, emotions, and lifestyle, offering predictive insights for enhanced self-awareness and personalized health guidance.
With the vision of AI-driven preventive health, DocMed is building a smart health ecosystem that combines prevention, precision, and intelligent management—empowering individuals and industries toward greater vitality, balance, and global innovation.

info.tc: Pandora Thor運算平台結合Holoscan Sensor Bridge(HSB)為醫療影像與手術輔助帶來強大的AI算力與高頻寬傳輸（AI Performance：2070 TFLOPS，HSB 傳輸：100 G）。多感測器資料可直接進入GPU記憶體，顯著降低延遲並減少CPU負載，支援高解析度即時影像處理與AI推論。標準化Ethernet與完整軟體工具鏈簡化整合與認證流程，讓醫療器材與智慧醫療系統能更快上市，實現高效、安全且可擴充的邊緣AI醫療解決方案。
info.en: The Pandora Thor computing platform, combined with Holoscan Sensor Bridge (HSB), delivers powerful AI performance and high-bandwidth transmission for medical imaging and surgical assistance (AI Performance: 2070 TFLOPS; HSB Transmission: 100 G). Multi-sensor data can be fed directly into GPU memory, significantly reducing latency and CPU load, supporting high-resolution real-time image processing and AI inference. Standardized Ethernet and a complete software toolchain simplify integration and certification, enabling medical devices and intelligent healthcare systems to reach the market faster, providing an efficient, safe, and scalable edge AI medical solution.

info.tc:
我們是 Dr.pen 台灣總代理。Dr.pen 成立於 2014 年，為全球頂尖知名的微針筆品牌，目前行銷超過 130 個國家，累積銷量突破 2,000 萬支，並深受醫美診所與專業沙龍信賴。不但通過 ISO 13485 醫療器材品質體系，更榮獲MDSAP，堅持「精準、安全、專業」的品牌理念。
產品線涵蓋專業微針筆、護膚針匣、射頻微針系統及頭皮護理裝置，提供完整的肌膚修護與抗老解決方案。旗艦型號 A20 採用 AVOS 垂直振盪技術，轉速高達 15,000RPM，具備高速穩定輸出與多段精準調節，搭配人體工學設計，能有效降低操作疲勞並提升治療穩定性，廣泛應用於痘疤修護、細紋淡化、膚質調理與頭皮養護。
此外，Dr.pen 在台灣同步提供 Nano 晶片探頭（Nanoneedling Cartridges），以奈米級表面結構在表皮層形成微通道，促進保養成分滲透並活化肌膚，具備無痛與零恢復期特性，成為專業養護的日常輔助方案。我們同時提供醫療級美容儀器、專業認證課程與完善的售後服務，協助專業端與居家市場實現全方位美膚需求。
info.en:
We are the Taiwan General Agent of Dr.pen, a global leader in microneedling devices founded in 2014. Dr.pen is marketed in over 130 countries, with more than 20 million units sold, and trusted by aesthetic clinics and professional salons worldwide. The brand is ISO 13485 certified and also holds MDSAP, upholding the principles of Precision, Safety, and Professionalism.
Dr.pen’s product line includes professional microneedling pens, cartridges, RF systems, and scalp care devices, offering comprehensive solutions for skin rejuvenation and anti-aging. The flagship A20 utilizes AVOS vertical oscillation technology with speeds up to 15,000 RPM, featuring stable high-speed output, multi-level precision adjustment, and ergonomic design to reduce operator fatigue and enhance treatment stability, suitable for scar repair, fine line reduction, skin conditioning, and scalp care.
In Taiwan, Dr.pen also offers Nano chip cartridges, which create micro-channels at the epidermis to enhance serum absorption and skin activation. With non-invasive, painless, and zero-downtime features, they are ideal for professional care and daily home use. Dr.pen additionally provides medical-grade devices, professional training, and full after-sales support.

org.tc: 慧德科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
1、AI人工智慧急性腎損傷預測輔助軟體
藉由機器學習演算法，提供24小時後病人發生急性腎損傷的機率值。
輔助醫事人員判斷發生急性腎損傷(AKI)的風險，聚焦高風險病人提供照護參考。
早期診斷，早期病因介入，降低急性腎損傷的程度，增加腎功能恢復的機會。

2、AI人工智慧急性呼吸窘迫症輔助偵測軟體
藉由機器學習演算法，提供醫事人員在使用侵襲性呼吸器滿24小時後，推論當下病人發生急性呼吸窘迫症的風險機率值，並呈現預測模型採用的特徵權重值的排序。
輔助醫事人員判斷發生急性呼吸窘迫症(ARDS)的風險，聚焦急性呼吸窘迫症高風險病人，提供醫事人員照護參考。
早期診斷，早期病因介入，降低急性呼吸窘迫症的程度，增加肺功能恢復的機會。

3、AI人工智慧洗手辨識系統
軟體利用AI人工智慧卷積神經網路CNN（convolutional neural network）演算法以及邊緣運算技術，進行標準洗手流程影片圖像辨識的深度學習，達到精準監控正確洗手的6大步驟。

4、AI人工智慧呼吸器脫離時機判斷輔助軟體
藉由機器學習演算法，提供醫事人員在病人使用侵襲性呼吸器滿48小時至21天內，推論病人24小時之內適合拔管的機率值，並呈現預測模型採用的特徵貢獻度的排序。
輔助醫事人員判斷適合拔管的可能性，以便提早進行拔管前置準備，聚焦使用侵襲性呼吸器的高風險病人，提供醫事人員照護參考。
運用SaMD於早期臨床判讀階段，提升醫護判斷效率，促進拔管作業提前準備，進一步降低呼吸器依賴時間。
info.en:
1、AI Aided AKI Prediction Software
Machine learning algorithms provides AKI probability value of the patient after 24 hours.
Assist medical staff in the risk evaluation of AKI and provide care reference for high-risk patients.
Early diagnosis and intervention to reduce the influence of AKI and increase the possibility of renal function recovery.

2、AI Aided ARDS Detection Software
Utilizing machine learning algorithms, this software provides healthcare professionals with a probability score indicating the patient\'s risk of developing ARDS after 24 hours of invasive ventilator use. It also presents a ranked list of feature weights used by the predictive model.
This tool assists medical personnel in assessing the risk of ARDS, allowing them to focus on high-risk patients and offering a valuable reference for clinical decision-making.
Early diagnosis and early intervention in the underlying causes can reduce the severity of ARDS and improve the chances of lung function recovery.

3、AI Artificial Intelligence Hand Hygiene Recognition System
The software uses AI (artificial intelligence) CNN (convolutional neural network) algorithm and edge computing technology to perform deep learning on standard handwashing procedure video images recognition to precisely monitor the 6 major steps of proper handwashing.

4、AI Aided Weaning Trial Software
Using machine learning algorithms, this software helps healthcare professionals estimate the likelihood that a patient on an invasive ventilator for 48 hours to 21 days will be ready for extubation within the next 24 hours. It also displays a ranked list of feature contributions used in the predictive model.
This tool supports clinicians in determining the appropriate timing for extubation, enabling earlier preparation and focusing attention on high-risk ventilated patients, thereby serving as a clinical reference for patient care.
By applying Software as a Medical Device (SaMD) during the early stages of clinical assessment, it enhances decision-making efficiency, facilitates earlier extubation preparation, and ultimately reduces the duration of ventilator dependence.

org.en: HAN DIN DIGITAL TECHNOLOGY Co., Ltd.

info.tc:
翰鼎以「數據驅動健康」為核心理念，致力於將精準醫學與智慧醫療服務結合，提供全方位的健康管理方案。本次醫療展將以翰鼎名義參展，展示最新基因檢測套組與遠距醫療平台。基因檢測部分涵蓋端粒檢測、阿茲海默症風險、粒腺體檢測及高膽固醇血症，協助民眾從基因層面掌握健康風險與老化趨勢，提前部署預防策略，建立專屬的健康藍圖。同時，我們也將呈現翰鼎遠距醫療平台的完整功能，包含線上掛號、症狀提醒、視訊問診、電子病歷同步、健康歷程紀錄以及多元支付，打造便捷、安全的醫療服務流程，突破時間與空間的限制，讓智慧醫療真正走入生活。

此外，翰鼎的合作診所也將共同參展，藉由將基因檢測數據導入臨床診療，形成「檢測—診斷—照護」的閉環式健康管理模式，讓顧客能從檢測結果直接銜接到診所的個人化健康方案，體驗由基因數據延伸至臨床治療的完整路徑。我們希望藉此展出，不僅讓大眾了解翰鼎在智慧醫療與精準檢測上的創新成果，也展現未來醫療整合的發展方向，為健康管理開創新局。
info.en:
Handing Health focuses on “Data-Driven Precision Medicine,” integrating genetic testing with smart healthcare services. At this year’s exhibition, we will showcase advanced genetic panels including Telomere Testing, Alzheimer’s Risk, Mitochondrial Function, and Hypercholesterolemia. These tools help individuals understand health risks and aging trends, supporting early prevention and personalized health planning.

In addition, Handing will present its telemedicine platform featuring online registration, symptom reminders, video consultations, medical record integration, and multi-payment options—making healthcare more accessible and secure. Our partner clinics will also join, demonstrating how genetic insights can directly guide clinical care, creating a seamless “Testing–Diagnosis–Care” pathway. Through this exhibition, Handing aims to highlight innovations in precision medicine and telehealth, while shaping the future of integrated healthcare.

org.tc: 世基生物醫學股份有限公司

info.tc: 世基生醫是精準醫療的先驅者，開發製造的藥物基因檢測試劑，讓用藥更精準、更安全、更有效。世基生醫擁有符合全球醫療器材製造規範的製造廠，提供完整的IVD CDMO服務，從產品開發驗證到量產及法規申請，協助實現發想現實化、產品最佳化、市場全球化的目標。世基生醫創立前瞻研發中心，放眼未來全球精準醫療市場的脈動，結合海內外精英團隊，共同開發新一代精準醫療檢測技術平台，涵蓋細胞治療、基因檢測、功能醫學等領域，落實精準醫療精神。
info.en: Pharmigene, Inc. is a pioneer in precision medicine field. Pharmigene develops and manufactures pharmacogenomics testing reagents to make medication more accurate, safer and more effective. Pharmigene has a manufacturing plant that complies with global medical device manufacturing standards and provides a total solution of IVD CDMO services, from product development and verification to mass production and regulatory applications, helping to achieve the goals of realizing ideas, optimizing products, and globalizing the market. Pharmigene has established an advanced R&D center. By previsualizing the pulse of the global precision medicine market , and combining elite teams worldwide to co-develop a new generation of precision medical testing technology platform, which covering cell therapy, gene testing, functional medicine and other fields, the spirit of precision medicine will be implemented .
