info.tc:
蕾迪詩生技股份有限公司（Ladies Biotech Co., Ltd.）專注於高階保養品研發與代工服務，致力結合醫學美容科技與天然生物活性原料，打造兼具功效與安全的專業配方。公司以「真實科學、誠信製程」為核心理念，擁有完整的研發團隊與GMP認證生產線，服務範圍涵蓋產品企劃、配方研發、包材設計至法規文件建構。
本次於2025台灣醫療科技展中，蕾迪詩生技將展示三大核心技術代工方案：
— 人來源外泌體保養品代工：以先進的外泌體純化技術，搭配低溫冷凍乾燥技術，保留活性成分穩定性，促進肌膚修復與再生。
— 鮭魚PDRN保養品代工：萃取高純度DNA片段，有效啟動肌膚細胞更新與修護機制，實現醫美級逆齡護理。
— 藻針精華保養品代工：結合天然微針機轉與深層滲透科技，強化活性成分導入，提升肌膚吸收效率。
蕾迪詩以深厚的生技實力與市場敏銳度，協助品牌打造具臨床實證與市場競爭力的高效產品，是您值得信賴的專業ODM／OEM合作夥伴。
info.en:
Ladies Biotech Co., Ltd. is a leading ODM/OEM manufacturer specializing in advanced skincare R&D. With a strong foundation in biomedical science and GMP-certified production, we deliver innovative formulations that combine efficacy, safety, and market appeal.
At the 2025 Taiwan Healthcare+ Expo, Ladies Biotech will showcase three key technologies:
— Human Exosome Skincare utilizing advanced purification and low-temperature lyophilization to preserve bioactivity for optimal skin regeneration.
— Salmon PDRN Skincare designed to accelerate skin renewal and repair.
— Algae Microneedle Essence enhancing active delivery and absorption through natural micro-penetration.
Driven by scientific integrity and innovation, Ladies Biotech empowers global brands to transform biotechnology into premium, clinically proven skincare solutions.

org.tc: 捷昇生物科技有限公司

info.tc:
SONICSTEM™ 是專為非酵素法分離基質血管分餾（S.V.F.）細胞設計的超聲波設備。利用超聲波的物理作用取代繁瑣的酵素處理步驟，如混合、加熱與清洗。使用時，只需將含脂肪組織的管子放入超聲波端口，即可快速震盪並分離出脂肪幹細胞，過程無需接觸樣品。整個操作僅需約15分鐘，細胞存活率可達80%以上。
乾式細胞解凍機：一鍵自動解凍，精準控溫確保細胞存活。無需水浴，避免污染，安全便利。標準化流程提升實驗再現性與效率。
info.en:
SONICSTEM™ is an ultrasonic system designed for enzyme-free separation of stromal vascular fraction (S.V.F.) cells. The physical power of ultrasound replaces traditional enzymatic steps such as mixing, heating, and washing. Simply place the tissue-filled tube into the ultrasonic port to separate stem cells efficiently without direct sample contact. The process takes about 15 minutes, achieving over 80% cell viability.
Cell Thawing System: One-touch automated thawing with precise temperature control. Water-free design ensures safety and consistency, maximizing cell viability and efficiency.

org.tc: 健談股份有限公司

info.tc:
「健談健管家 Hach Health＋」是一款 AI 營養辨識 APP，透過影像識別與自然語言處理，幫助使用者快速記錄飲食並獲得精確的營養分析。系統可自動計算熱量、三大營養素與微量營養素，並提供 AI 趨勢分析與提醒，幫助使用者掌握飲食習慣，改善健康狀況。
本產品應用範圍廣泛，涵蓋醫療健康、營養管理與數位健康等領域，可用於糖尿病、腎臟病、高齡營養管理及減重門診，協助個案控制飲食；可於企業導入此工具推動員工健康計畫，亦可讓健身族群依據分析調整營養攝取；能協助醫療機構進行遠端照護，與穿戴裝置結合，打造智慧化健康管理。
「健談健管家 Hach Health＋」透過AI降低飲食記錄門檻，提升營養分析精確度，適用於慢性病照護、減重管理及食品產業。未來，隨著AI模型與健康數據的優化，本產品將持續升級，為健康管理與營養專業提供更高效、智能的解決方案。
info.en: Hach Health+ is an AI-powered nutrition recognition app that uses image recognition and natural language processing to help users easily log meals and receive accurate nutritional analysis. It calculates calories, macronutrients, and micronutrients, and provides trend insights and reminders to improve dietary habits. Applicable in healthcare, corporate wellness, and fitness, it supports chronic disease management, remote care, and personalized nutrition planning. By lowering the barrier to food logging and enhancing precision, Hach Health+ offers a smart, scalable solution for modern health and nutrition management.

info.tc:
新漢智能智慧藥櫃智能導引，結合無線型燈引式電子紙標籤之「智慧調劑台
」充分利用視覺感知智慧提示，符合台灣特有調劑作業需求，軟硬體深度整合。
「智慧取藥指引系統」模組化，一套系統涵蓋藥局、藥庫至護理站，一直到病房
，皆是應用範圍，醫院再也不用到處使用互不相容的系統，維護不易。因是無線
，藥品與電子紙標籤配對相當簡單，所以使新漢智能的電子紙標籤又有可四處挪
移、互相支援之便利性。新漢智能「智慧取藥指引系統」祈能實質輔助藥師減輕
工作負擔，減少出藥錯誤率的發生。

info.tc: SurveyCake 為台灣團隊自主研發的企業級雲端問卷服務，協助醫療院所推動數位轉型與流程自動化。透過問卷數位化、資料整合與自動串接，減少紙本與人工作業，提升行政效率與病患體驗。支援與 HIS 系統、電子簽章及 LINE 官方帳號整合，問卷資料可自動回傳系統，實現醫療服務流程智慧化。提供多層級資安防護與稽核追蹤機制，資料完全落地台灣，符合醫療個資法規。內建 AI 問卷生成功能與情緒分析模組，協助醫療單位快速建立專業表單並掌握回饋趨勢。目前已協助多家醫療院所導入線上滿意度調查與即時負評通知，成功落實無紙化與病患關懷管理。
info.en: SurveyCake is an enterprise-grade cloud survey platform developed in Taiwan to support digital transformation in healthcare. It helps hospitals digitize forms, automate workflows, and enhance patient experience. The platform integrates with HIS systems, e-signature, and LINE OA, enabling automatic data transfer. With multi-layer security, full data residency in Taiwan, and compliance with medical data regulations, it ensures privacy and reliability. AI-powered form generation and sentiment analysis help healthcare institutions capture real-time feedback and improve service quality. Trusted by major hospitals, SurveyCake drives paperless and efficient smart healthcare operations.

org.tc: 佛教慈濟醫療財團法人

info.tc: 慈濟醫療財團法人攜手花蓮慈濟醫學中心、台北慈濟醫學中心、大林慈濟準醫學中心、台中慈濟醫院、慈濟大學、靜思書軒及多家企業聯合參展。慈濟慈善足跡遍布全球128個國家地區，慈濟醫療財團法人39年來在醫療領域中累積的豐碩成果，受到醫界、產官學界以及眾多媒體關注，多年來結合慈善、教育、人文志業，持續為臺灣醫療體系帶來創新與希望。本法人攜手各合作機構共同參展，主題包含遠距醫療、智慧醫療、細胞治療、特色醫療、創新研發、國際醫療、淨斯本草系列等主題，現場提供名醫講座、體驗活動等，敬邀醫療及生技醫藥產業之專業人士、創業投資者、病友及家屬、媒體先進蒞臨。

info.tc: 花蓮慈濟醫學中心與多家企業聯合參展：茂士榮再生科技、宏潤、 智順科技、長春藤生技、一曜再生醫學、遠東醫電、遠傳電信、 國璽、玉山銀行、台灣粒線體、NVIDIA、商之器、松己生技、雄鷹、雅培、長弘、南台科技大學、慈濟大學、靜思書軒。慈濟慈善足跡遍布全球128個國家地區，花蓮慈濟醫院已為國際化醫學中心，35年來在醫療領域中累積的豐碩成果，受到醫界、產官學界以及眾多媒體關注，多年來結合慈善、教育、人文志業，持續為台灣醫療體系帶來創新與希望。本院攜手各合作機構共同參展主題包含遠距醫療、智慧醫療、細胞治療、特色醫療、創新研發、國際醫療、淨斯本草系列等主題，現場亦提供名醫講座、體驗活動等，敬邀醫療及生技醫藥產業之專業人士、創業投資者、病友及家屬、媒體先進蒞臨。
info.en:
Hualien Tzu Chi Medical Center is collaborating with multiple enterprises to participate in the 2024 Taiwan Healthcare+ Expo. Tzu Chi\'s charitable efforts have reached 128 countries and regions worldwide. Over the past 35 years, Hualien Tzu Chi Hospital has evolved into an international medical center, accumulating significant achievements in the medical field. Its integration of charity, education, and humanistic missions has garnered attention from the medical community, government, academia, and media.
The joint exhibition will showcase themes such as telemedicine, smart healthcare, cell therapy, specialized medical treatments, innovative research and development, international healthcare, and the Jing Si Herbal series. The event will also feature lectures by renowned physicians and interactive experiences. Professionals from the medical and biotech industries, investors, patients and their families, as well as media representatives, are cordially invited to attend.

info.tc:
智慧醫療整合解決方案
本次展出「智慧護理資訊白板套組」與「智慧病房床頭卡套組」，導入病房資訊整合顯示與集中管理機制，整合病人狀態、醫囑、排程、派班、設備使用等臨床關鍵資訊，支援多畫面顯示與自動更新，強化團隊協作與照護品質。系統可與院方 HIS 深度介接，實現資料即時同步，並具備權限控管、操作稽核與端點資安防護機制，確保資訊安全與系統穩定性。 
系統具備與 AI 模型整合之潛力，未來可推動智慧病房邁向預測性照護、自動化管理與智慧決策支持，為醫療機構打造高效、安全且具前瞻性的臨床作業環境。透過既有資料架構與即時資訊流，可進一步發展智慧預警、病人風險分析、動態派班優化與臨床決策輔助等應用，建構具自我學習能力的智慧病房，協助醫療團隊全面提升照護品質與營運效率。
info.en:
Smart Healthcare Integration Solution 
This exhibit features the Smart Nursing Info Board and Smart Bedside Card systems, offering real-time patient data display and centralized management. Integrated with HIS, the system synchronizes patient status, orders, schedules, staffing, and equipment usage, enhancing care coordination and data security. Designed with AI integration potential, it lays the foundation for predictive care, automated management, and intelligent decision support. Leveraging existing data architecture and real-time flows, it enables future applications such as risk analysis, dynamic staffing optimization, and clinical alerts—advancing hospital efficiency and care quality.

org.tc: 聖得醫學科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
聖得醫學致力於以跨域醫療資料管理與分析平台，橋接醫療資訊與人工智慧之間的鴻溝。本平台可協助臨床研究與試驗單位降低高達 20% 的營運成本，並顯著提升資料管理與分析效率。

隨著醫療資料型態多元與高度敏感的特性，傳統管理方式往往造成龐大人力負擔與成本增加。聖得醫學針對此挑戰，提出三大創新核心：
(1)  整合式資料管理系統 —— 將多模態的醫療資料整合至單一平台，實現高效率存取與分析。
(2) 聯邦式 AI 共學與驗證機制 —— 以無需程式開發的安全協作環境，支持跨機構與跨國 AI 模型訓練，確保資料不外洩。
(3) MedSync AI 智能助理 —— 結合大型語言模型（LLM），自動化彙整與統合臨床資料格式，完成臨床資料分析與報告生成。

透過本平台，臨床與研究團隊能在單一安全架構下管理多樣化醫療資料，實現跨院、跨國的智慧協作與精準決策。讓臨床研究資料管理邁向智能化，從今天開始！
info.en:
ST Medical is dedicated to bridging the gap between healthcare informatics and AI through our Cross-Domain Medical Data Management and Analysis Platform — Save up to 20% in costs in lab operations, clinical research, and trials.

Today, the variety and sensitivity of medical data make it incredibly difficult to manage. Leading to heavy manual workloads and driving up costs. 

To address these challenges, our platform offers three key innovations:
(1) All-in-One Data Management – Integrates diverse medical data into a single, unified platform for streamlined access and analysis.
(2) Federated AI Co-Learning & Validation – Enables secure, no-code collaboration with local and global partners, ensuring insights without any data leakage.
(3) MedSync AI Agent – Powered by LLMs, it supports clinical data analysis and automated report generation, enhanced with embedded endpoint algorithms.

With our product, clinical teams can efficiently manage diverse datasets within a unified system, supporting secure and streamlined cross-institutional collaboration and analysis. 

Transform your Clinical Study Management into Intelligence — starting today.

info.tc:
沛能戒（Pineal Ring）是一款結合智慧科技與時尚美學的健康穿戴裝置，專為現代人打造全天候的個人健康守護系統。它內建高精度感測晶片與雲端AI演算技術，能即時監測心率、血氧、睡眠、體溫與壓力指數等多項關鍵指標，並透過專屬應用程式生成個人化健康報告，讓使用者隨時掌握身體狀況，提前預防潛在風險。
　　沛能戒的設計兼顧科技與美感，以輕盈耐磨的材質搭配極簡圓弧造型，長時間配戴仍舒適無負擔。不同於傳統手環或手錶，它以戒指形式完美融入日常穿搭，不僅展現品味，更讓健康監測成為生活的一部分。
　　透過AI的數據學習系統，沛能戒可追蹤您的健康趨勢，分析睡眠品質與身體能量變化，並提供貼近個人需求的建議。從日常活動到休息狀態，它都能即時回饋最真實的身體訊號，幫助您養成主動關心健康的習慣。沛能戒，讓科技化為守護力量，讓健康從此握在您指間。
info.en:
Pineal Ring — Redefining Smart Health in Style
The Pineal Ring is an intelligent health wearable that seamlessly blends advanced technology with refined aesthetics, designed to provide 24/7 personal health monitoring. Equipped with high-precision sensors and a cloud-based AI analysis system, it continuously tracks key indicators such as heart rate, blood oxygen, sleep, body temperature, and stress levels. Through its dedicated mobile app, users can generate personalized health reports, monitor changes in real time, and prevent potential health risks before they arise.
The Pineal Ring’s design balances technology and elegance. Crafted from lightweight, durable materials with a smooth, minimalist contour, it offers exceptional comfort for long-term wear. Unlike traditional wristbands or smartwatches, its discreet ring form integrates effortlessly into everyday fashion—turning health tracking into a natural part of modern living.
Powered by AI-driven data learning, the Pineal Ring identifies long-term health trends, analyzes sleep quality and body energy levels, and provides tailored lifestyle recommendations. From daily activity to rest, it delivers instant feedback on your body’s true condition—encouraging proactive self-care. The Pineal Ring transforms technology into a guardian of well-being, placing your health literally at your fingertips.

org.tc: 休憩區
知識睡眠館

info.tc: Power Sleep 知識睡眠館致力以科學與醫學為基礎，重新定義健康睡眠。此次展出亮點包括：「AI智慧床」結合壓力感測與人工智慧分析，提供個人化睡眠調整與體態優化建議；「側睡止鼾枕」專為側睡設計，透過精準支撐頭頸，改善呼吸道通暢性，有效協助減少鼾聲；「水平律動床」則運用全身周期性加速度運動（WBPA運動），促進血液循環與深層放鬆，適合現代人舒緩壓力與提升睡眠品質。Power Sleep 以量身定制理念，打造專屬每一位使用者的完美睡眠體驗，邀請您親臨體驗未來睡眠科技！
info.en: Power Sleep Knowledge Sleep Center redefines healthy sleep with science and medicine. We present the AI Smart Bed with real-time pressure sensing and AI analysis for personalized sleep optimization, the Side Sleeping Anti-Snore Pillow designed to reduce snoring through precise head and neck support, and the Horizontal Rhythmic Bed, applying Whole Body Periodic Acceleration (WBPA) to enhance blood circulation and relaxation. Discover how Power Sleep creates customized, future-ready sleep solutions.

org.tc: 美國在台協會商務組

info.tc: 美國在台協會商務組致力於推動美國出口、強化美國產業，並透過消除貿易障礙、執行貿易法規，以及協助美國企業進入海外市場，確保公平貿易。我們也致力於吸引外國投資進入美國，並防禦不公平的貿易行為。
info.en: The AIT Commercial promotes U.S. exports, strengthens American industries, and ensures fair trade by removing barriers, enforcing trade laws, and helping U.S. businesses access foreign markets. We also work to attract foreign investment into the U.S. and defend against unfair trade practices.

org.tc: 美國印第安納州經濟發展廳

info.tc: 印第安納州經濟發展廳是美國印第安納州政府負責招商與創造就業的主要機構。IEDC積極與全球企業合作，提供量身訂製的投資協助，包括選址諮詢、投資優惠、人才培訓以及與大學及研究機構的合作對接。印第安納州是美國生命科學與生醫製造的重要中心，擁有超過2,400家生命科學相關企業，包含Eli Lilly, Roche Diagnostics, Zimmer Biomet與Cook Medical等世界領導品牌。其產業涵蓋醫療器材、製藥、生技研發、數位健康與委託製造等領域，形成完善的生態系。州內先進的物流網絡及緊密的產學研合作，為企業提供從研發到生產的一站式發展環境。IEDC台灣辦公室致力於協助亞洲企業拓展美國市場，連結印第安納州的產業資源與創新能量，共同打造「美國醫療創新的十字路口」
info.en: The Indiana Economic Development Corporation (IEDC) is the State of Indiana’s lead agency for business investment and job creation. IEDC works with global companies to identify strategic opportunities for growth, providing customized support for site selection, investment incentives, workforce development, and partnerships with universities and research institutions. Indiana is a recognized leader in life sciences, advanced manufacturing, and biomanufacturing, home to more than 2,400 life sciences companies including global innovators such as Eli Lilly, Roche Diagnostics, Zimmer Biomet, and Cook Medical. The state’s strengths extend across medical devices, pharmaceuticals, digital health, and contract manufacturing. With world-class logistics infrastructure and strong collaborations between industry, government, and academia, Indiana offers a uniquely integrated ecosystem for innovation and production. Through its office in Taiwan, IEDC actively engages with Asian companies exploring opportunities in the United States, helping them connect with local partners and establish a sustainable presence in Indiana - America’s Crossroads for Health Innovation.

org.tc: 美國各州政府辦事處協會

info.tc:
以促進並加強台美雙邊關係為宗旨，美國館由美國各州政府駐台代表處共同組成，作為推廣雙邊經貿合作與投資機會的重要平台。
美國館致力於協助台灣企業赴美投資、拓展市場，同時支持美國商品與技術進入台灣市場。除投資與貿易外，美國館也積極主辦、協辦及參與教育、旅遊等相關活動，持續深化人民與產業之間的連結，促進台美關係的多面向發展。
info.en: With the mission of strengthening U.S.–Taiwan relations, the U.S. Pavilion serves as a joint platform for state offices in Taiwan to promote bilateral trade and investment opportunities. It assists Taiwanese companies in investing in the United States and supports U.S. products entering the Taiwan market. The Pavilion also regularly organizes and participates in events related to trade, investment, education, and tourism to further enhance people-to-people and industry connections.

org.tc: 美國維吉尼亞州駐臺灣辦事處

info.tc: 選擇維吉尼亞州－國際企業成功落地美國的關鍵據點！在這個聯邦政府、高科技產業和生物技術交會的機會之地，開啟您成功進軍美國市場的旅程。近年生命科學產業快速成長，吸引Eli Lilly投資 50 億美元、AstraZeneca投資45億美元、Merck投資30億美元，打造先進製藥與研發基地，創造數千就業機會。維州鄰近美國首都，便於銜接 FDA、NIH、BARDA，加速新藥開發與臨床研究，更是進入聯邦採購市場和引進創新技術的首選。維州擁有頂尖人才、全美第一的教育、卓越物流、具競爭力的成本及全美最佳經商環境。作為全美前十生技聚落之一，維州3,500家生命科學企業，推動生物技術、人工智慧、生物健康和航太融合技術的發展。維州臺灣辦事處提供選址、獎勵與落地一站式服務，助您成功拓展美國市場！
info.en:
Virginia – Where Global Success Takes Off
Start your successful entry into the U.S. market with Virginia – the land of opportunity where the federal government, high-tech industries, and biotechnology intersect. Top companies in Life Science industry choose to locate in Virginia — and flourish here — because of its top talent, renowned universities and research institutions, outstanding logistical advantages, competitive costs, and consistently top-ranked business climate. Virginia’s life sciences sector has gained strong momentum in recent years, highlighted by major new investment announcements from Eli Lilly (US$5 billion), AstraZeneca (US$4.5 billion), and Merck (US$3 billion) — showcasing Virginia’s strength in biopharmaceutical manufacturing, R&D, and innovation.
Located near Washington, D.C., Virginia offers prime access to federal procurement markets and agencies – including FDA, NIH, and BARDA – facilitating new drug development, clinical trials, and advanced research. The state features a 6% corporate tax rate, no franchise or inventory tax, and a global logistics network through the Port of Virginia, Dulles International Airport, and major rail systems.
Ranked among top 10 biopharmaceutical clusters in the U.S. with 3,500 companies and 30,000 jobs, Virginia continues to fuel growth in bio, AI, biohealth, and aerospace technologies. Virginia - Taiwan Office offers one-stop service, site selection assistance, incentives, and investment support.

org.tc: 美國纽约州貿易與外商投資駐台灣辦事處

info.tc:
紐約州在 Empire State Development（ESD） 的帶領下，積極發展生物技術與生命科學產業，已成為美國重要的創新樞紐。州政府投入超過 6.2 億美元 推動「生命科學倡議」，涵蓋生物製藥、基因與細胞療法、醫療器材及健康科技等領域，建立完整的研發與產業鏈。

紐約州擁有全美第二高的 NIH 撥款金額 與頂尖學研資源，透過 NYSTAR 與多所大學設立先進技術中心（CATs），促進研發成果商業化。ESD 並與 NewYorkBIO 及 NYCEDC 合作推出 「New York Bio Connect」 平台，整合資金、設施、人才與合作機會，打造全州創新生態系統。

同時，紐約州提供多項 研發與製造稅賦抵免及補助政策，吸引全球企業進駐設立研發中心與製造基地。憑藉強大的科研基礎、創新人才與政府支持，紐約州正成為全球生命科學與生物技術產業的核心據點。
info.en:
Under the leadership of ESD, New York State has emerged as a leading hub for biotechnology and life sciences on the U.S. East Coast. The state has invested more than $620 million USD in its Life Science Initiative, covering biopharmaceuticals, gene and cell therapy, medical devices, and health technology—creating an integrated R&D and industrial ecosystem.
With the second-highest NIH funding in the U.S., New York supports innovation through NYSTAR and its Centers for Advanced Technology (CATs), which translate research into commercial applications. ESD, together with NewYorkBIO and NYCEDC, launched New York Bio Connect to unify statewide resources—capital, facilities, talent, and partnership opportunities—into a cohesive innovation ecosystem.
The state also offers R&D and manufacturing tax credits and grant programs, encouraging global companies to establish research and production facilities in New York. With its robust scientific foundation, skilled workforce, and pro-innovation policies, New York is solidifying its position as a global leader in biotechnology and life sciences.

org.tc: 永鼎醫藥股份有限公司

info.tc:
永鼎醫藥股份有限公司 YD Bio Limited（Nasdaq: YDES）為專注精準醫療與創新診斷之生技公司。
本次醫療科技展擬展示聚焦未來癌症醫療的三大核心布局：
(一) 早期癌症偵測：運用 DNA 甲基化與多重生物標記技術開發非侵入性癌症檢測，可應用於乳癌、胰臟癌、大腸癌等多種癌別，並取得 EG BioMed 之胰臟癌與乳癌檢測授權，協助臨床在更早期發現高風險病人；
(二) 創新健康診斷：傳統「一體適用」醫療正被新一代精準診斷所取代，透過更細緻的分層與個人化分析，協助醫師做出更快速、精準的治療決策；
(三) 先進細胞治療與外泌體療法：結合幹細胞與外泌體技術，聚焦眼科及相關疾病之修復與保護，打造新世代眼科照護解決方案。
我們不是單一公司，而是一個串連研發、臨床與產業化的生醫鏈，讓生醫技術不再停留在實驗室，而能更快速、更有效率地落地到病人身上。

生技醫藥產業最有影響力的資訊集團，我們的使命是“Accelerate Life Science Business Without Boundary”——  打破生技醫藥產業中的邊界，將全球最新的研究成果、技術應用與市場趨勢無縫對接，推動產業的跨領域合作。
我們不僅是媒體資訊的匯聚地，更是促進創新、交流與合作的橋樑。透過AI數據驅動的洞察，我們為行業提供未來的方向，助力每一位業界夥伴在生技醫藥領域加速前行。除了作為提供深度洞察與前瞻性分析的媒體公司，我們還擁有亞洲最完整的AI生技醫藥數據平台——BIODND。
info.en:
The most influential information group in the biotech industry，our mission is to  \'Accelerate Life Science Business Without Boundary\' — breaking the boundaries in the biotech industry, seamlessly connecting the latest global research findings, technological applications, and market trends, while promoting cross-disciplinary collaboration within the industry.

info.tc: 惠家智醫致力於研發、設計、製造醫療器材，並透過AIOT及雲端技術，完整分析數據，達到資源共享、精準健康促進的目標，我們的產品：1.「SECP體外反搏治療系統」通過採集患者的心電信號，進行R波即時檢測，並由R波觸發控制氣囊充、排氣的動作。充氣是按照從患者的小腿、大腿到臀部、上臂進行三級序貫加壓，使上、下肢血液在心臟舒張期灌注於上半身，並通過靜脈返回心臟，以促進心、腦等器官的血液循環，改善缺血組織的血液供應。2.「氧昇艙」可容納1-2人的水平長型高壓氧艙，透過將艙內氣壓提升至約1.3 ATA，可使動脈血中的氧氣供應大幅增強，拼裝型高壓氧艙打破空間限制、操作簡潔，將為您帶來創新氧活體驗。
info.en:
HJ DigiHealth is dedicated to the research, design, and manufacturing of medical devices. Through the integration of AIoT and cloud technologies, we provide comprehensive data analysis to achieve resource sharing and promote precision health management.Our products include: 
1.SECP External Counterpulsation (EECP) Therapy System — This system collects the patient’s ECG signals for real-time R-wave detection. The R-wave triggers inflation and deflation of air cuffs that sequentially compress the calves, thighs, and buttocks during diastole. This three-stage compression enhances blood flow from the lower and upper limbs toward the heart, improving circulation to vital organs such as the heart and brain and increasing perfusion in ischemic tissues.
2.OxyRise Chamber — A horizontal, modular hyperbaric oxygen chamber designed for one to two people. By increasing internal pressure to approximately 1.3 ATA, it significantly enhances arterial oxygen supply. Its modular design overcomes spatial limitations, offers simple operation, and delivers an innovative oxygen life experience.

info.tc:
醫百科技為一專業醫療器材品牌，秉持微創手術領域領導者的自信，堅信「安心醫療、智慧精準、創新效率」的價值，以3D光學定位及專業醫學軟體為核心，目前已開發出手術用機械手臂與外科手術導航系統供應國內各醫院並行銷至全球醫療臨床機構，致力全面提升醫療品質與安全。客戶遍及歐美、亞洲、非洲區域。
展出產品：
1.	醫擘EPROB機械手臂立體定位輔助手術系統
結合精密機械手臂與智慧醫學影像軟體，完成腦神經外科困難案例的高效率微創手術。
2.	RETINA雷帝納手術導航系統
應用於神經外科、耳鼻喉科、顱顏整形外科手術導航，達成高精準度微創手術。 
3.	RETINA Elite 經顱磁刺激精準定位系統
提供身心科、神經內科與復健科rTMS重覆經顱磁刺激治療的即時檢視與精準定位。
4.	Pvix Inj MR靜脈注射/抽血訓練考核系統
運用MR混合實境技術，結合仿生模型與注射/抽血即時模擬訓練，打造最佳數位臨床訓練技能環境。
info.en:
EPED Inc. is a leading company in the field of minimally invasive surgery. Upholding the values of “safety, precision, and efficiency”, we strive constantly to develop innovative medical navigation solutions, including robotic arm for brain surgery and surgery navigation system. We are dedicated to enhancing the quality and safety of medical treatment on all levels with customers based in almost every continent, always in the search for, new partners all over the world.
Featured Products:
1.	EPROB Robotic Arm for Brain Surgery
Combining precision robotics with intelligent medical imaging software, EPROB enables high-efficiency, minimally invasive procedures for complex neurosurgical cases.
2.	RETINA Stereotactic Surgery Navigation System
Designed for neurosurgery, ENT, and craniofacial plastic surgery, RETINA delivers highly accurate navigation support for precise and minimally invasive operations.
3.	RETINA Elite Navigation System for rTMS
Engineered for Psychiatry, Neurology, and Rehabilitation departments, RETINA Elite offers real-time visualization and pinpoint targeting for rTMS therapy.
4.	Pvix Inj MR Injection Training & Assessment System
Integrating MR technology with lifelike anatomical models, this system offers immersive, real-time simulation for injection training—empowering a new era of digital clinical skill education.

org.tc: 麥德凱生科股份有限公司

info.tc:
打破醫材研發與法規的重重界限！麥德凱生科推出「醫療器材生物相容性一條龍服務」，協助您快速跨越審查門檻、加速產品上市，讓創新醫材更快走向全球市場。
面對日益複雜的國際法規，許多企業常因生物相容性規劃不完整，導致時程延誤或需補件重測。麥德凱整合多年實務經驗，以專業團隊提供從前期策略到完整試驗的全方位支援。服務內容涵蓋：上市前法規規劃、ISO 10993 系列生物相容性試驗、毒理風險評估（ISO 10993-17）、化學特性分析（ISO 10993-18），以及臨床前動物安全性試驗。我們的實驗室具備 ISO 17025 與 GLP 認證，確保數據具國際公信力，可直接用於 TFDA、FDA 510(k)、EU MDR 等主要市場的醫材申請。
憑藉與國內外醫材廠長期合作的經驗，麥德凱已協助眾多企業降低合規風險、縮短開發時程，成功取得全球上市許可。我們深知每款醫材的特性與挑戰，能提供最貼合產品實際需求的測試策略，避免不必要的試驗成本與時間浪費。
在醫材競爭激烈的時代，選對夥伴就是搶得先機。麥德凱不僅提供技術與法規的堅實後盾，更致力於推動醫療技術創新與安全提升。
立即了解我們如何為您的產品打造更安全、更高效的生物相容性解決方案！讓您的醫材競爭力，從麥德凱開始全面提升。
info.en:
Break through the barriers of medical device development and regulation! Medgaea Life Sciences offers an One-stop Biocompatibility Service to help you navigate regulatory hurdles, accelerate approvals, and bring innovative devices to market faster.
As global requirements grow more complex, many companies face delays caused by incomplete biocompatibility planning. Medgaea provides end-to-end support, including regulatory strategy, ISO 10993 testing, toxicological risk assessment (ISO 10993-17), chemical characterization (ISO 10993-18), and preclinical safety studies. With our ISO 17025 and GLP-certified laboratories, all data is trusted for TFDA, FDA 510(k), and EU MDR submissions.
With extensive experience supporting global manufacturers, we help reduce compliance risks, shorten timelines, and avoid unnecessary testing costs. Every device is unique, and we tailor the optimal strategy for your product.
Choose Medgaea as your expert partner and enhance your device’s safety, speed, and global competitiveness—starting today.

org.tc: 光鼎生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
Qsep100 2.0 生物片段分析儀結合專利 LEDIF 偵測技術與全自動化流程，為毛細管凝膠電泳帶來全新效能。系統可提供高解析度、高靈敏度且高度重現性的分析結果，並廣泛應用於 DNA、RNA 及蛋白質片段檢測，滿足多領域研究需求。
儀器搭配使用專利筆型號材，使用者可直接將標準 PCR 管或 96 孔盤置入儀器，從準備到啟動分析僅需三分鐘，同時可彈性設定進樣量、電壓與各項運行條件。Qsep100 2.0 支援從單一樣本至 96 個樣本（並可擴充至 384 孔）的通量，為現代實驗室提供卓越的擴充能力與操作效率。
info.en: Qsep100 2.0 Bio-Fragment Analyzer ushers in a new era of capillary gel electrophoresis, combining patented LEDIF detection with full automation to deliver high-resolution, high-sensitivity, and highly reproducible analysis. Its versatile applications cover DNA, RNA, and protein fragments, empowering research across multiple fields. With ready-to-use cartridges, samples in standard PCR tubes or 96-well plates can be directly placed into the instrument for analysis, enabling preparation and operation within three minutes with flexible control of injection, voltage, and run conditions. The system supports throughput from a single sample up to 96 (expandable to 384-well), offering unmatched scalability and efficiency for modern laboratories.

org.tc: 福摩沙文化事業有限公司

info.tc:
FMH在其遍布40個市場的業務重點領域之一，始終是運用最新的醫療健康技術，為客戶提供最佳的技術和廣告平台。為了實現這個目標，我們需要不斷拓展展覽業務，2015年我們持續加大投入，在更多發展中國家舉辦展覽。
FMH 堅信，企業應像重視純粹的商業績效一樣重視永續發展和社會責任。我們非常重視企業社會責任措施能夠對我們的員工以及我們營運所在國家/地區的社區產生正面影響。多年來，FMH 在推動醫療健康領域的成長方面發揮了關鍵作用，並實踐了 FMH 「創造美好世界」的品牌承諾。
info.en:
One of FMH’s key focus areas across its 40 markets has always been the utilization of the latest medical and health technology to provide our customers with the best technologies and advertising platforms available. In order to achieve this goal, we are required to constantly expand our exhibition horizons and this continued throughout 2015 as we invested heavily in doing exhibitions in more developing countries in the world.

FMH operates under the firm belief that organizations should focus as much on sustainability and social responsibility as on pure business performance. It is important to us that our corporate social responsibility initiatives have a positive impact on our employees and the communities of all the countries in which we operate. FMH has played a pivotal role over the years in helping to facilitate the growth in medical and healthy sector and fulfill FMH’s brand promise of creating ‘A wonderful world’.
